plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--verticalAl.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--verticalAl.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--verticalAl.description: The vertical alignment of the data label.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--hei.name: plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--hei.title: height
plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--hei.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover--lineWi.name: plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover--lineWi.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover--lineWi.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-area--visible.name: plotOptions-area--visible

plotOptions-area--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.name: plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.title: width
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-spline--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-spline--lineWidth
plotOptions-spline--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-spline--lineWidth.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-errorbar--turboThreshold.name: plotOptions-errorbar--turboThreshold
plotOptions-errorbar--turboThreshold.title: turboThreshold
plotOptions-errorbar--turboThreshold.description: When a series contains a data array that is longer than this, only one dimensional arrays of numbers, or two dimensional arrays with x and y values are allowed. Also, only the first point is tested, and the rest are assumed to be the same format. This saves expensive data checking and indexing in long series. Set it to 0 disable.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-series--turboThreshold.name: plotOptions-series--turboThreshold
plotOptions-series--turboThreshold.title: turboThreshold
plotOptions-series--turboThreshold.description: When a series contains a data array that is longer than this, only one dimensional arrays of numbers, or two dimensional arrays with x and y values are allowed. Also, only the first point is tested, and the rest are assumed to be the same format. This saves expensive data checking and indexing in long series. Set it to 0 disable.

plotOptions-area-marker--symbol.name: plotOptions-area-marker--symbol
plotOptions-area-marker--symbol.title: symbol
plotOptions-area-marker--symbol.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-column--pointPlacement.name: plotOptions-column--pointPlacement
plotOptions-column--pointPlacement.title: pointPlacement
plotOptions-column--pointPlacement.description:
Possible values: null, "on", "between".

In a column chart, when pointPlacement is "on", the point will not create any padding of the X axis. In a polar column chart this means that the first column points directly north. If the pointPlacement is "between", the columns will be laid out between ticks. This is useful for example for visualising an amount between two points in time or in a certain sector of a polar chart.

Since Highcharts 3.0.2, the point placement can also be numeric, where 0 is on the axis value, -0.5 is between this value and the previous, and 0.5 is between this value and the next. Unlike the textual options, numeric point placement options won't affect axis padding.

Defaults to null in cartesian charts, "between" in polar charts.

plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--followTouch.name: plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--followTouch.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--followTouch.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

chart--ignoreHiddenSeries.name: chart--ignoreHiddenSeries
chart--ignoreHiddenSeries.title: ignoreHiddenSeries
chart--ignoreHiddenSeries.description: If true, the axes will scale to the remaining visible series once one series is hidden. If false, hiding and showing a series will not affect the axes or the other series. For stacks, once one series within the stack is hidden, the rest of the stack will close in around it even if the axis is not affected.

plotOptions-series-tooltip--pointFormat.name: plotOptions-series-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-series-tooltip--pointFormat.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-series-tooltip--pointFormat.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.name: plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.title: enabled
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.title: width
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--valueDecima.name: plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--valueDecima.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--valueDecima.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-spline--shadow.name: plotOptions-spline--shadow
plotOptions-spline--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-spline--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the graph line. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.title: radius
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-column-tooltip--headerFormat.name: plotOptions-column-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-column-tooltip--headerFormat.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-column-tooltip--headerFormat.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.title: width
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-area-zones--value.name: plotOptions-area-zones--value
plotOptions-area-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-area-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-areaspline--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-areaspline--stickyTracking
plotOptions-areaspline--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-areaspline--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series. Defaults to true for line and area type series, but to false for columns, pies etc.

plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-halo--opa.name: plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-halo--opa.title: opacity
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-halo--opa.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.title: lineColor
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.name: plotOptions-series-marker-states-select--fillColor
plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.title: fillColor
plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.description: The fill color of the point marker.

plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover--lin.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover--lin.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover--lin.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-bubble--allowPointSelect.name: plotOptions-bubble--allowPointSelect
plotOptions-bubble--allowPointSelect.title: allowPointSelect
plotOptions-bubble--allowPointSelect.description: Allow this series' points to be selected by clicking on the markers, bars or pie slices.

plotOptions-spline--pointStart.name: plotOptions-spline--pointStart
plotOptions-spline--pointStart.title: pointStart
plotOptions-spline--pointStart.description: If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointStart defines on what value to start. For example, if a series contains one yearly value starting from 1945, set pointStart to 1945.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--borderWid.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--borderWid.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--borderWid.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-column-zones--value.name: plotOptions-column-zones--value
plotOptions-column-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-column-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-heatmap--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-heatmap--zoneAxis
plotOptions-heatmap--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-heatmap--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

xAxis-title--text.name: xAxis-title--text
xAxis-title--text.title: text
xAxis-title--text.description: The actual text of the axis title. It can contain basic HTML text markup like <b>, <i> and spans with style.

plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--xDateFormat.name: plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--xDateFormat.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--xDateFormat.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

legend-navigation--activeColor.name: legend-navigation--activeColor
legend-navigation--activeColor.title: activeColor
legend-navigation--activeColor.description: The color for the active up or down arrow in the legend page navigation.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--connector.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--connectorWidth
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--connector.title: connectorWidth
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--connector.description: The width of the line connecting the data label to the pie slice.

plotOptions-treemap-states-hover--enable.name: plotOptions-treemap-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover--enable.title: enabled
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover--enable.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--headerF.name: plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--headerF.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--headerF.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover--enable.name: plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover--enable.title: enabled
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover--enable.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

xAxis--tickInterval.name: xAxis--tickInterval
xAxis--tickInterval.title: tickInterval
xAxis--tickInterval.description:
The interval of the tick marks in axis units. When null, the tick interval is computed to approximately follow the tickPixelInterval on linear and datetime axes. On categorized axes, a null tickInterval will default to 1, one category. Note that datetime axes are based on milliseconds, so for example an interval of one day is expressed as 24 * 3600 * 1000.

On logarithmic axes, the tickInterval is based on powers, so a tickInterval of 1 means one tick on each of 0.1, 1, 10, 100 etc. A tickInterval of 2 means a tick of 0.1, 10, 1000 etc. A tickInterval of 0.2 puts a tick on 0.1, 0.2, 0.4, 0.6, 0.8, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 20, 40 etc.

If the tickInterval is too dense for labels to be drawn, Highcharts may remove ticks.

plotOptions-area--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-area--showInLegend
plotOptions-area--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-area--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

plotOptions-funnel--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-funnel--zoneAxis
plotOptions-funnel--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-funnel--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-series-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-series-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-series-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-series-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-bar-states-hover--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-bar-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-bar-states-hover--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-bar-states-hover--lineWidth.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-bubble--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-bubble--linkedTo
plotOptions-bubble--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-bubble--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-area-tooltip--headerFormat.name: plotOptions-area-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-area-tooltip--headerFormat.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-area-tooltip--headerFormat.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolS.name: exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolStrokeWidth
exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolS.title: symbolStrokeWidth
exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolS.description: The pixel stroke width of the symbol on the button.

plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--footerFor.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--footerFor.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--lineWidth
plotOptions-areasplinerange--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-areasplinerange--lineWidth.description: Pixel width of the arearange graph line.

plotOptions-arearange-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-arearange-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-arearange-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-arearange-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-bar--depth.name: plotOptions-bar--depth
plotOptions-bar--depth.title: depth
plotOptions-bar--depth.description: Depth of the columns in a 3D column chart. Requires highcharts-3d.js.

legend--itemWidth.name: legend--itemWidth
legend--itemWidth.title: itemWidth
legend--itemWidth.description: The width for each legend item. This is useful in a horizontal layout with many items when you want the items to align vertically.  .

plotOptions-columnrange-zones--color.name: plotOptions-columnrange-zones--color
plotOptions-columnrange-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-columnrange-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-waterfall--groupPadding.name: plotOptions-waterfall--groupPadding
plotOptions-waterfall--groupPadding.title: groupPadding
plotOptions-waterfall--groupPadding.description: Padding between each value groups, in x axis units.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--forma.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--forma.title: format
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--forma.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--valueDe.name: plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--valueDe.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--valueDe.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--valueSu.name: plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--valueSu.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--valueSu.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--fi.name: plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--fi.title: fillColor
plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--fi.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-bar-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-bar-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.title: enabled
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-heatmap--borderColor.name: plotOptions-heatmap--borderColor
plotOptions-heatmap--borderColor.title: borderColor
plotOptions-heatmap--borderColor.description: The color of the border surrounding each column or bar.

plotOptions-arearange--enableMouseTracki.name: plotOptions-arearange--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-arearange--enableMouseTracki.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-arearange--enableMouseTracki.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--en.name: plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--en.title: enabled
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--en.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-area--turboThreshold.name: plotOptions-area--turboThreshold
plotOptions-area--turboThreshold.title: turboThreshold
plotOptions-area--turboThreshold.description: When a series contains a data array that is longer than this, only one dimensional arrays of numbers, or two dimensional arrays with x and y values are allowed. Also, only the first point is tested, and the rest are assumed to be the same format. This saves expensive data checking and indexing in long series. Set it to 0 disable.

plotOptions-column--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-column--borderWidth
plotOptions-column--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-column--borderWidth.description: The width of the border surrounding each column or bar.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--borderWi.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--borderWi.title: borderWidth

plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--li.title: lineWidth

plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--valueSuff.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-line-marker--radius.name: plotOptions-line-marker--radius
plotOptions-line-marker--radius.title: radius
plotOptions-line-marker--radius.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-boxplot--whiskerLength.name: plotOptions-boxplot--whiskerLength

plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-select.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-select.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--y.title: y

plotOptions-line-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-spline-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--shape.title: shape

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--allowOve.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--allowOve.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-scatter--allowPointSelect.title: allowPointSelect

plotOptions-gauge-pivot--backgroundColor.description: The background color or fill of the pivot.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.title: height
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.title: height
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-line--threshold.name: plotOptions-line--threshold
plotOptions-line--threshold.title: threshold
plotOptions-line--threshold.description: The threshold, also called zero level or base level. For line type series this is only used in conjunction with negativeColor.

plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--f.name: plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--fillColor
plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--f.title: fillColor
plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--f.description: The fill color of the point marker.

xAxis--type.name: xAxis--type
xAxis--type.title: type
xAxis--type.description: The type of axis. Can be one of "linear", "logarithmic", "datetime" or "category". In a datetime axis, the numbers are given in milliseconds, and tick marks are placed on appropriate values like full hours or days. In a category axis, the point names of the chart's series are used for categories, if not a categories array is defined.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--cropThresho.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--cropThreshold
plotOptions-areasplinerange--cropThresho.title: cropThreshold
plotOptions-areasplinerange--cropThresho.description: When the series contains less points than the crop threshold, all points are drawn,  event if the points fall outside the visible plot area at the current zoom. The advantage of drawing all points (including markers and columns), is that animation is performed on updates. On the other hand, when the series contains more points than the crop threshold, the series data is cropped to only contain points that fall within the plot area. The advantage of cropping away invisible points is to increase performance on large series.  .

tooltip--valueSuffix.name: tooltip--valueSuffix
tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--backgroundCo.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--backgroundCo.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--backgroundCo.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-gauge-dial--radius.name: plotOptions-gauge-dial--radius
plotOptions-gauge-dial--radius.title: radius
plotOptions-gauge-dial--radius.description: The radius or length of the dial, in percentages relative to the radius of the gauge itself.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--rotation.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--rotation.title: rotation
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: The vertical alignment of a data label. Can be one of top, middle or bottom. The default value depends on the data, for instance in a column chart, the label is above positive values and below negative values.

legend--padding.name: legend--padding
legend--padding.title: padding
legend--padding.description: The inner padding of the legend box.

plotOptions-area-tooltip--xDateFormat.name: plotOptions-area-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-area-tooltip--xDateFormat.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-area-tooltip--xDateFormat.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-funnel--shadow.name: plotOptions-funnel--shadow
plotOptions-funnel--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-funnel--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the graph line. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--pointFormat.name: plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--pointFormat.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--pointFormat.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--dateTimeL.name: plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--dateTimeL.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--dateTimeL.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-series--animation.name: plotOptions-series--animation
plotOptions-series--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-series--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.name: plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-columnrange--colorByPoint.name: plotOptions-columnrange--colorByPoint
plotOptions-columnrange--colorByPoint.title: colorByPoint
plotOptions-columnrange--colorByPoint.description: When using automatic point colors pulled from the options.colors collection, this option determines whether the chart should receive one color per series or one color per point.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--rota.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--rota.title: rotation
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--rota.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--inside.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-line--selected.name: plotOptions-line--selected
plotOptions-line--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-line--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--val.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--val.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--val.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-series-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-series-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-series-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-series-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

legend--labelFormat.name: legend--labelFormat
legend--labelFormat.title: labelFormat
legend--labelFormat.description: A format string for each legend label. Available variables relates to properties on the series, or the point in case of pies.

plotOptions-area--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-area--showCheckbox
plotOptions-area--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-area--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

xAxis--tickColor.name: xAxis--tickColor
xAxis--tickColor.title: tickColor
xAxis--tickColor.description: Color for the main tick marks.

plotOptions-treemap--cursor.name: plotOptions-treemap--cursor
plotOptions-treemap--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-treemap--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--headerForma.name: plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--headerForma.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--headerForma.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-bar--selected.name: plotOptions-bar--selected
plotOptions-bar--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-bar--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-spline-tooltip--followTouchM.name: plotOptions-spline-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--followTouchM.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--followTouchM.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-column-states-hover--lineWid.name: plotOptions-column-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-column-states-hover--lineWid.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-column-states-hover--lineWid.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--e.name: plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--enabled
plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--e.title: enabled
plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--e.description: Enable or disable visible feedback for selection.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--rotation.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--rotation.title: rotation
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-polygon--color.name: plotOptions-polygon--color
plotOptions-polygon--color.title: color
plotOptions-polygon--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-series-marker--radius.name: plotOptions-series-marker--radius
plotOptions-series-marker--radius.title: radius
plotOptions-series-marker--radius.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-bar--borderRadius.name: plotOptions-bar--borderRadius
plotOptions-bar--borderRadius.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-bar--borderRadius.description: The corner radius of the border surrounding each column or bar.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--allowOverl.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--allowOverl.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--allowOverl.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--li.name: plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--li.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--li.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

yAxis--endOnTick.name: yAxis--endOnTick
yAxis--endOnTick.title: endOnTick
yAxis--endOnTick.description: Whether to force the axis to end on a tick. Use this option with the maxPadding option to control the axis end.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-funnel--colors.name: plotOptions-funnel--colors
plotOptions-funnel--colors.title: colors
plotOptions-funnel--colors.description: A series specific or series type specific color set to use instead of the global colors.

plotOptions-treemap-levels--level.name: plotOptions-treemap-levels--level
plotOptions-treemap-levels--level.title: level
plotOptions-treemap-levels--level.description: Decides which level takes effect from the options set in the levels object.

plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--lineColor
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.title: lineColor
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-boxplot--visible.name: plotOptions-boxplot--visible
plotOptions-boxplot--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-boxplot--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

chart--borderWidth.name: chart--borderWidth
chart--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
chart--borderWidth.description: The pixel width of the outer chart border.

plotOptions-spline-states-hover-halo--si.name: plotOptions-spline-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-halo--si.title: size
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-halo--si.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--enabled.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--headerForma.name: plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--headerForma.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--headerForma.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-boxplot-zones--color.name: plotOptions-boxplot-zones--color
plotOptions-boxplot-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-boxplot-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

yAxis--gridLineInterpolation.name: yAxis--gridLineInterpolation
yAxis--gridLineInterpolation.title: gridLineInterpolation
yAxis--gridLineInterpolation.description: Polar charts only. Whether the grid lines should draw as a polygon with straight lines between categories, or as circles. Can be either circle or polygon.

plotOptions-bar-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-bar-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

chart--height.name: chart--height
chart--height.title: height
chart--height.description: An explicit height for the chart. By default the height is calculated from the offset height of the containing element, or 400 pixels if the containing element's height is 0.

chart--borderColor.name: chart--borderColor
chart--borderColor.title: borderColor
chart--borderColor.description: The color of the outer chart border.

plotOptions-arearange--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-arearange--lineWidth
plotOptions-arearange--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-arearange--lineWidth.description: Pixel width of the arearange graph line.

plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--pointFo.name: plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--pointFo.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--pointFo.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-polygon-states-hover--lineWi.name: plotOptions-polygon-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover--lineWi.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover--lineWi.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-polygon-marker--radius.name: plotOptions-polygon-marker--radius
plotOptions-polygon-marker--radius.title: radius
plotOptions-polygon-marker--radius.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-column-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-column-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-column-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-column-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-area-states-hover-halo--opac.name: plotOptions-area-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-area-states-hover-halo--opac.title: opacity
plotOptions-area-states-hover-halo--opac.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-bar--edgeColor.name: plotOptions-bar--edgeColor
plotOptions-bar--edgeColor.title: edgeColor
plotOptions-bar--edgeColor.description: 3D columns only. The color of the edges. Similar to borderColor, except it defaults to the same color as the column.

plotOptions-column--pointInterval.name: plotOptions-column--pointInterval
plotOptions-column--pointInterval.title: pointInterval
plotOptions-column--pointInterval.description:
If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointInterval defines the interval of the x values. For example, if a series contains one value every decade starting from year 0, set pointInterval to 10.

Since Highcharts 4.1, it can be combined with pointIntervalUnit to draw irregular intervals.

plotOptions-series-states-hover-halo--op.name: plotOptions-series-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-series-states-hover-halo--op.title: opacity
plotOptions-series-states-hover-halo--op.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-boxplot--stemWidth.name: plotOptions-boxplot--stemWidth
plotOptions-boxplot--stemWidth.title: stemWidth
plotOptions-boxplot--stemWidth.description: The width of the stem, the vertical line extending from the box to the whiskers. If null, the width is inherited from the lineWidth option.

plotOptions-funnel--center.name: plotOptions-funnel--center
plotOptions-funnel--center.title: center
plotOptions-funnel--center.description: The center of the series. By default, it is centered in the middle of the plot area, so it fills the plot area height.

plotOptions-boxplot--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-boxplot--zoneAxis
plotOptions-boxplot--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-boxplot--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--borderColor.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--borderColor.title: borderColor
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--borderColor.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-area-states-hover-halo--attr.name: plotOptions-area-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-area-states-hover-halo--attr.title: attributes
plotOptions-area-states-hover-halo--attr.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--vert.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--vert.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--vert.description: The vertical alignment of a data label. Can be one of top, middle or bottom. The default value depends on the data, for instance in a column chart, the label is above positive values and below negative values.

yAxis--tickInterval.name: yAxis--tickInterval
yAxis--tickInterval.title: tickInterval
yAxis--tickInterval.description:
The interval of the tick marks in axis units. When null, the tick interval is computed to approximately follow the tickPixelInterval on linear and datetime axes. On categorized axes, a null tickInterval will default to 1, one category. Note that datetime axes are based on milliseconds, so for example an interval of one day is expressed as 24 * 3600 * 1000.

On logarithmic axes, the tickInterval is based on powers, so a tickInterval of 1 means one tick on each of 0.1, 1, 10, 100 etc. A tickInterval of 2 means a tick of 0.1, 10, 1000 etc. A tickInterval of 0.2 puts a tick on 0.1, 0.2, 0.4, 0.6, 0.8, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 20, 40 etc.

If the tickInterval is too dense for labels to be drawn, Highcharts may remove ticks.

plotOptions-treemap--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-treemap--showCheckbox
plotOptions-treemap--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-treemap--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-pyramid--height.name: plotOptions-pyramid--height
plotOptions-pyramid--height.title: height
plotOptions-pyramid--height.description: The height of the funnel or pyramid. If it is a number it defines the pixel height, if it is a percentage string it is the percentage of the plot area height.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--zIndex.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--zIndex.title: zIndex
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--zIndex.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

plotOptions-pie--cursor.name: plotOptions-pie--cursor
plotOptions-pie--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-pie--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.title: width
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-arearange--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-arearange--dashStyle
plotOptions-arearange--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-arearange--dashStyle.description:
A name for the dash style to use for the graph. Applies only to series type having a graph, like line, spline, area and scatter in case it has a lineWidth. The value for the dashStyle include:
  • Solid
  • ShortDash
  • ShortDot
  • ShortDashDot
  • ShortDashDotDot
  • Dot
  • Dash
  • LongDash
  • DashDot
  • LongDashDot
  • LongDashDotDot

legend--symbolPadding.name: legend--symbolPadding
legend--symbolPadding.title: symbolPadding
legend--symbolPadding.description: The pixel padding between the legend item symbol and the legend item text.

plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--he.name: plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--he.title: height
plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--he.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-heatmap--borderRadius.name: plotOptions-heatmap--borderRadius
plotOptions-heatmap--borderRadius.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-heatmap--borderRadius.description: The corner radius of the border surrounding each column or bar.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--xLow.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--xLow
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--xLow.title: xLow
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--xLow.description: X offset of the lower data labels relative to the point value.

plotOptions-columnrange--selected.name: plotOptions-columnrange--selected
plotOptions-columnrange--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-columnrange--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-line-tooltip--followTouchMov.name: plotOptions-line-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-line-tooltip--followTouchMov.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-line-tooltip--followTouchMov.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--sy.name: plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--sy.title: symbol
plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--sy.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--followPoin.name: plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--followPoin.title: followPointer
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--followPoin.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.title: height
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

xAxis--startOnTick.name: xAxis--startOnTick
xAxis--startOnTick.title: startOnTick
xAxis--startOnTick.description: Whether to force the axis to start on a tick. Use this option with the maxPadding option to control the axis start.

plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.title: fillColor
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--.title: enabled
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

yAxis-stackLabels--verticalAlign.name: yAxis-stackLabels--verticalAlign
yAxis-stackLabels--verticalAlign.title: verticalAlign
yAxis-stackLabels--verticalAlign.description: Defines the vertical alignment of the stack total label. Can be one of "top", "middle" or "bottom". The default value is calculated at runtime and depends on orientation and whether the stack is positive or negative.

tooltip--followPointer.name: tooltip--followPointer
tooltip--followPointer.title: followPointer
tooltip--followPointer.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-column--selected.name: plotOptions-column--selected
plotOptions-column--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-column--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-funnel--depth.name: plotOptions-funnel--depth
plotOptions-funnel--depth.title: depth
plotOptions-funnel--depth.description: The thickness of a 3D pie. Requires highcharts-3d.js

plotOptions-heatmap--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-heatmap--showInLegend
plotOptions-heatmap--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-heatmap--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

plotOptions-area--connectNulls.name: plotOptions-area--connectNulls
plotOptions-area--connectNulls.title: connectNulls
plotOptions-area--connectNulls.description: Whether to connect a graph line across null points.

plotOptions-pie-states-hover--lineWidthP.name: plotOptions-pie-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-pie-states-hover--lineWidthP.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-pie-states-hover--lineWidthP.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.name: plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover--lineColor
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.title: lineColor
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--followPointe.name: plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--followPointe.title: followPointer
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--followPointe.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-waterfall--edgeColor.name: plotOptions-waterfall--edgeColor
plotOptions-waterfall--edgeColor.title: edgeColor
plotOptions-waterfall--edgeColor.description: 3D columns only. The color of the edges. Similar to borderColor, except it defaults to the same color as the column.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

xAxis--endOnTick.name: xAxis--endOnTick
xAxis--endOnTick.title: endOnTick
xAxis--endOnTick.description: Whether to force the axis to end on a tick. Use this option with the maxPadding option to control the axis end.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

tooltip--useHTML.name: tooltip--useHTML
tooltip--useHTML.title: useHTML
tooltip--useHTML.description: Use HTML to render the contents of the tooltip instead of SVG. Using HTML allows advanced formatting like tables and images in the tooltip. It is also recommended for rtl languages as it works around rtl bugs in early Firefox.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--poi.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--poi.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--poi.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-boxplot-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-boxplot-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-boxplot-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-boxplot-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-boxplot--groupPadding.name: plotOptions-boxplot--groupPadding
plotOptions-boxplot--groupPadding.title: groupPadding
plotOptions-boxplot--groupPadding.description: Padding between each value groups, in x axis units.

plotOptions-bar--visible.name: plotOptions-bar--visible
plotOptions-bar--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-bar--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.title: lineColor
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

chart-resetZoomButton--relativeTo.name: chart-resetZoomButton--relativeTo
chart-resetZoomButton--relativeTo.title: relativeTo
chart-resetZoomButton--relativeTo.description: What frame the button should be placed related to. Can be either "plot" or "chart".

plotOptions-bubble--negativeColor.name: plotOptions-bubble--negativeColor
plotOptions-bubble--negativeColor.title: negativeColor
plotOptions-bubble--negativeColor.description: When a point's Z value is below the zThreshold setting, this color is used.

plotOptions-solidgauge--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-solidgauge--zoneAxis
plotOptions-solidgauge--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-solidgauge--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

yAxis-breaks--repeat.name: yAxis-breaks--repeat
yAxis-breaks--repeat.title: repeat
yAxis-breaks--repeat.description: Defines an interval after which the break appears again. By default the breaks do not repeat.

title--useHTML.name: title--useHTML
title--useHTML.title: useHTML
title--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the text.

yAxis-stackLabels--rotation.name: yAxis-stackLabels--rotation
yAxis-stackLabels--rotation.title: rotation
yAxis-stackLabels--rotation.description: Rotation of the labels in degrees.

plotOptions-bar-tooltip--footerFormat.name: plotOptions-bar-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--footerFormat.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--footerFormat.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-series--stacking.name: plotOptions-series--stacking
plotOptions-series--stacking.title: stacking
plotOptions-series--stacking.description: Whether to stack the values of each series on top of each other. Possible values are null to disable, "normal" to stack by value or "percent".

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--padding.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--padding.title: padding
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--padding.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

yAxis-labels--enabled.name: yAxis-labels--enabled
yAxis-labels--enabled.title: enabled
yAxis-labels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the axis labels.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-columnrange--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-columnrange--showCheckbox
plotOptions-columnrange--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-columnrange--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.title: enabled
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

series--type.name: series--type
series--type.title: type
series--type.description: The type of series. Can be one of area, areaspline, bar, column, line, pie, scatter or spline. From version 2.3, arearange, areasplinerange and columnrange are supported with the highcharts-more.js component.

plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select-.name: plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select--fillColor
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select-.title: fillColor
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select-.description: The fill color of the point marker.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: crop
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.title: radius
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-areaspline--fillOpacity.name: plotOptions-areaspline--fillOpacity
plotOptions-areaspline--fillOpacity.title: fillOpacity
plotOptions-areaspline--fillOpacity.description: Fill opacity for the area. Note that when you set an explicit fillColor, the fillOpacity is not applied. Instead, you should define the opacity in the fillColor with an rgba color definition.

plotOptions-waterfall--pointPlacement.name: plotOptions-waterfall--pointPlacement
plotOptions-waterfall--pointPlacement.title: pointPlacement
plotOptions-waterfall--pointPlacement.description:
Possible values: null, "on", "between".

In a column chart, when pointPlacement is "on", the point will not create any padding of the X axis. In a polar column chart this means that the first column points directly north. If the pointPlacement is "between", the columns will be laid out between ticks. This is useful for example for visualising an amount between two points in time or in a certain sector of a polar chart.

Since Highcharts 3.0.2, the point placement can also be numeric, where 0 is on the axis value, -0.5 is between this value and the previous, and 0.5 is between this value and the next. Unlike the textual options, numeric point placement options won't affect axis padding.

Defaults to null in cartesian charts, "between" in polar charts.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--yHigh
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: yHigh
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: Y offset of the higher data labels relative to the point value.

plotOptions-arearange--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-arearange--linkedTo
plotOptions-arearange--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-arearange--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.title: enabled
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--borderCol.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--borderCol.title: borderColor
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--borderCol.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-pyramid--shadow.name: plotOptions-pyramid--shadow
plotOptions-pyramid--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-pyramid--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the graph line. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

xAxis--min.name: xAxis--min
xAxis--min.title: min
xAxis--min.description: The minimum value of the axis. If null the min value is automatically calculated. If the startOnTick option is true, the min value might be rounded down.

plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select--enabled
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select.title: enabled
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select.description: Enable or disable visible feedback for selection.

yAxis-labels--align.name: yAxis-labels--align
yAxis-labels--align.title: align
yAxis-labels--align.description: What part of the string the given position is anchored to. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right".

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--backgroundC.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--backgroundC.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--backgroundC.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the center of the gauge.

yAxis--lineColor.name: yAxis--lineColor
yAxis--lineColor.title: lineColor
yAxis--lineColor.description: The color of the line marking the axis itself.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.title: width
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.title: symbol
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.name: plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

lang--printChart.name: lang--printChart
lang--printChart.title: printChart
lang--printChart.description: Exporting module only. The text for the menu item to print the chart.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--verti.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--verti.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--verti.description: The vertical alignment of a data label. Can be one of top, middle or bottom. The default value depends on the data, for instance in a column chart, the label is above positive values and below negative values.

plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--rotation.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--rotation.title: rotation
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--rotati.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--rotati.title: rotation
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--rotati.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--borderCol.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--borderCol.title: borderColor
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--borderCol.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--zIndex.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--zIndex.title: zIndex
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--zIndex.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--vertic.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--vertic.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--vertic.description: The vertical alignment of a data label. Can be one of top, middle or bottom. The default value depends on the data, for instance in a column chart, the label is above positive values and below negative values.

xAxis--showLastLabel.name: xAxis--showLastLabel
xAxis--showLastLabel.title: showLastLabel
xAxis--showLastLabel.description: Whether to show the last tick label.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--borderRad.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--borderRad.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--borderRad.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

yAxis--tickPosition.name: yAxis--tickPosition
yAxis--tickPosition.title: tickPosition
yAxis--tickPosition.description: The position of the major tick marks relative to the axis line. Can be one of inside and outside.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--border.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--border.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--border.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-pie-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFo.name: plotOptions-pie-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFo.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFo.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-treemap--layoutAlgorithm.name: plotOptions-treemap--layoutAlgorithm
plotOptions-treemap--layoutAlgorithm.title: layoutAlgorithm
plotOptions-treemap--layoutAlgorithm.description: This option decides which algorithm is used for setting position and dimensions of the points. Can be one of sliceAndDice, stripes, squarified or strip.

plotOptions-pyramid--minSize.name: plotOptions-pyramid--minSize
plotOptions-pyramid--minSize.title: minSize
plotOptions-pyramid--minSize.description: The minimum size for a pie in response to auto margins. The pie will try to shrink to make room for data labels in side the plot area, but only to this size.

plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--xDateFo.name: plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--xDateFo.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--xDateFo.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-bubble--minSize.name: plotOptions-bubble--minSize
plotOptions-bubble--minSize.title: minSize
plotOptions-bubble--minSize.description: Minimum bubble size. Bubbles will automatically size between the minSize and maxSize to reflect the z value of each bubble. Can be either pixels (when no unit is given), or a percentage of the smallest one of the plot width and height.

plotOptions-pie-tooltip--valueDecimals.name: plotOptions-pie-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--valueDecimals.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--valueDecimals.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.name: plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-column-tooltip--valueDecimal.name: plotOptions-column-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-column-tooltip--valueDecimal.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-column-tooltip--valueDecimal.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--shape.title: shape
