plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--xDateFormat.name: plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--xDateFormat.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--xDateFormat.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

legend-title--style.name: legend-title--style
legend-title--style.title: style

plotOptions-column--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-column--zoneAxis
plotOptions-column--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-column--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-areaspline--step.name: plotOptions-areaspline--step
plotOptions-areaspline--step.title: step
plotOptions-areaspline--step.description: Whether to apply steps to the line. Possible values are left, center and right. Prior to 2.3.5, only left was supported.

plotOptions-series-marker--symbol.name: plotOptions-series-marker--symbol
plotOptions-series-marker--symbol.title: symbol
plotOptions-series-marker--symbol.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

legend--verticalAlign.name: legend--verticalAlign
legend--verticalAlign.title: verticalAlign
legend--verticalAlign.description: The vertical alignment of the legend box. Can be one of "top", "middle" or "bottom". Vertical position can be further determined by the y option.

chart--plotBackgroundColor.name: chart--plotBackgroundColor
chart--plotBackgroundColor.title: plotBackgroundColor
chart--plotBackgroundColor.description: The background color or gradient for the plot area.

plotOptions-pie--borderColor.name: plotOptions-pie--borderColor
plotOptions-pie--borderColor.title: borderColor
plotOptions-pie--borderColor.description: The color of the border surrounding each slice.

plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.name: plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.title: radius
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.description: The radius of the point marker.

navigation-buttonOptions--y.name: navigation-buttonOptions--y
navigation-buttonOptions--y.title: y
navigation-buttonOptions--y.description: The vertical offset of the button's position relative to its verticalAlign. .

plotOptions-arearange--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-arearange--zoneAxis
plotOptions-arearange--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-arearange--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-gauge--overshoot.name: plotOptions-gauge--overshoot
plotOptions-gauge--overshoot.title: overshoot
plotOptions-gauge--overshoot.description: Allow the dial to overshoot the end of the perimeter axis by this many degrees. Say if the gauge axis goes from 0 to 60, a value of 100, or 1000, will show 5 degrees beyond the end of the axis.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--rotation.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--rotation.title: rotation
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-series--threshold.name: plotOptions-series--threshold
plotOptions-series--threshold.title: threshold
plotOptions-series--threshold.description: The threshold, also called zero level or base level. For line type series this is only used in conjunction with negativeColor.

plotOptions-polygon--turboThreshold.name: plotOptions-polygon--turboThreshold
plotOptions-polygon--turboThreshold.title: turboThreshold
plotOptions-polygon--turboThreshold.description: When a series contains a data array that is longer than this, only one dimensional arrays of numbers, or two dimensional arrays with x and y values are allowed. Also, only the first point is tested, and the rest are assumed to be the same format. This saves expensive data checking and indexing in long series. Set it to 0 disable.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--borderWid.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--borderWid.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--borderWid.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--rad.name: plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--rad.title: radius
plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--rad.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

chart--pinchType.name: chart--pinchType
chart--pinchType.title: pinchType
chart--pinchType.description: Equivalent to zoomType, but for multitouch gestures only. By default, the pinchType is the same as the zoomType setting. However, pinching can be enabled separately in some cases, for example in stock charts where a mouse drag pans the chart, while pinching is enabled.

plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--pointFormat.name: plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--pointFormat.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--pointFormat.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--ra.name: plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--radiusPlus
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--ra.title: radiusPlus
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--ra.description: The number of pixels to increase the radius of the hovered point.

plotOptions-polygon--enableMouseTracking.name: plotOptions-polygon--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-polygon--enableMouseTracking.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-polygon--enableMouseTracking.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

xAxis-labels--align.name: xAxis-labels--align
xAxis-labels--align.title: align
xAxis-labels--align.description: What part of the string the given position is anchored to. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right". Defaults to an intelligent guess based on which side of the chart the axis is on and the rotation of the label.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--rotation.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--rotation.title: rotation
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-line-tooltip--headerFormat.name: plotOptions-line-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-line-tooltip--headerFormat.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-line-tooltip--headerFormat.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--insid.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--insid.title: inside
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--insid.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.name: plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.title: lineColor
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-line--allowPointSelect.name: plotOptions-line--allowPointSelect
plotOptions-line--allowPointSelect.title: allowPointSelect
plotOptions-line--allowPointSelect.description: Allow this series' points to be selected by clicking on the markers, bars or pie slices.

plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover-.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover--radius
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover-.title: radius
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover-.description: The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults to the normal state's radius + 2 as per the radiusPlus option.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--borderRadius.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--borderRadius.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--borderRadius.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-bar-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-bar-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-waterfall--colorByPoint.name: plotOptions-waterfall--colorByPoint
plotOptions-waterfall--colorByPoint.title: colorByPoint
plotOptions-waterfall--colorByPoint.description: When using automatic point colors pulled from the options.colors collection, this option determines whether the chart should receive one color per series or one color per point.

xAxis--maxPadding.name: xAxis--maxPadding
xAxis--maxPadding.title: maxPadding
xAxis--maxPadding.description: Padding of the max value relative to the length of the axis. A padding of 0.05 will make a 100px axis 5px longer. This is useful when you don't want the highest data value to appear on the edge of the plot area. When the axis' max option is set or a max extreme is set using axis.setExtremes(), the maxPadding will be ignored.

plotOptions-scatter-marker--enabled.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker--enabled
plotOptions-scatter-marker--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-scatter-marker--enabled.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-polygon-states-hover--lineWi.name: plotOptions-polygon-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover--lineWi.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover--lineWi.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

legend-navigation--arrowSize.name: legend-navigation--arrowSize
legend-navigation--arrowSize.title: arrowSize
legend-navigation--arrowSize.description: The pixel size of the up and down arrows in the legend paging navigation.  .

plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-halo--s.name: plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-halo--s.title: size
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-halo--s.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.title: radius
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-bar-tooltip--followTouchMove.name: plotOptions-bar-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--followTouchMove.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--followTouchMove.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-series--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-series--showCheckbox
plotOptions-series--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-series--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--dashS.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--dashS.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--dashS.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--shadow.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--shadow.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-series-tooltip--footerFormat.name: plotOptions-series-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-series-tooltip--footerFormat.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-series-tooltip--footerFormat.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-area-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-area-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-area-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-area-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-pyramid--visible.name: plotOptions-pyramid--visible
plotOptions-pyramid--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-pyramid--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

plotOptions-polygon-marker--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-polygon-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-polygon-marker--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-polygon-marker--lineWidth.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-waterfall--upColor.name: plotOptions-waterfall--upColor
plotOptions-waterfall--upColor.title: upColor
plotOptions-waterfall--upColor.description: The color used specifically for positive point columns. When not specified, the general series color is used.

loading--hideDuration.name: loading--hideDuration
loading--hideDuration.title: hideDuration
loading--hideDuration.description: The duration in milliseconds of the fade out effect.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--vertical.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--vertical.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--vertical.description: The vertical alignment of a data label. Can be one of top, middle or bottom. The default value depends on the data, for instance in a column chart, the label is above positive values and below negative values.

plotOptions-funnel-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-funnel-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-funnel-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-funnel-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

xAxis-labels--format.name: xAxis-labels--format
xAxis-labels--format.title: format
xAxis-labels--format.description: A format string for the axis label.

plotOptions-arearange--negativeFillColor.name: plotOptions-arearange--negativeFillColor
plotOptions-arearange--negativeFillColor.title: negativeFillColor
plotOptions-arearange--negativeFillColor.description: A separate color for the negative part of the area.

plotOptions-column--pointStart.name: plotOptions-column--pointStart
plotOptions-column--pointStart.title: pointStart
plotOptions-column--pointStart.description: If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointStart defines on what value to start. For example, if a series contains one yearly value starting from 1945, set pointStart to 1945.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--back.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--back.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--back.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-arearange--pointInterval.name: plotOptions-arearange--pointInterval
plotOptions-arearange--pointInterval.title: pointInterval
plotOptions-arearange--pointInterval.description:
If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointInterval defines the interval of the x values. For example, if a series contains one value every decade starting from year 0, set pointInterval to 10.

Since Highcharts 4.1, it can be combined with pointIntervalUnit to draw irregular intervals.

plotOptions-spline--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-spline--zoneAxis
plotOptions-spline--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-spline--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-areaspline--pointIntervalUni.name: plotOptions-areaspline--pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-areaspline--pointIntervalUni.title: pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-areaspline--pointIntervalUni.description: On datetime series, this allows for setting the pointInterval to the two irregular time units, month and year. Combine it with pointInterval to draw quarters, 6 months, 10 years etc.

plotOptions-heatmap--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-heatmap--stickyTracking
plotOptions-heatmap--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-heatmap--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series. Defaults to true for line and area type series, but to false for columns, pies etc.

plotOptions-heatmap--animation.name: plotOptions-heatmap--animation
plotOptions-heatmap--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-heatmap--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover--enable.name: plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover--enable.title: enabled
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover--enable.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover--li.name: plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover--li.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover--li.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

yAxis--tickPixelInterval.name: yAxis--tickPixelInterval
yAxis--tickPixelInterval.title: tickPixelInterval
yAxis--tickPixelInterval.description: If tickInterval is null this option sets the approximate pixel interval of the tick marks. Not applicable to categorized axis. Defaults to 72 for the Y axis and 100 for the X axis.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--allowOverla.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--allowOverla.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--allowOverla.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--pointFormat.name: plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--pointFormat.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--pointFormat.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

chart--marginRight.name: chart--marginRight
chart--marginRight.title: marginRight
chart--marginRight.description: The margin between the right outer edge of the chart and the plot area. Use this to set a fixed pixel value for the margin as opposed to the default dynamic margin. See also spacingRight.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--borde.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--borde.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--borde.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--background.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--background.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--background.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--zInde.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--zInde.title: zIndex
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--zInde.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--padding.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--padding.title: padding
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--padding.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-errorbar--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-errorbar--stickyTracking
plotOptions-errorbar--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-errorbar--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series. Defaults to true for line and area type series, but to false for columns, pies etc.

plotOptions-boxplot--pointInterval.name: plotOptions-boxplot--pointInterval
plotOptions-boxplot--pointInterval.title: pointInterval
plotOptions-boxplot--pointInterval.description:
If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointInterval defines the interval of the x values. For example, if a series contains one value every decade starting from year 0, set pointInterval to 10.

Since Highcharts 4.1, it can be combined with pointIntervalUnit to draw irregular intervals.

plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.title: lineColor
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.title: width
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--inside.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--align.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--align
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--align.title: align
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--align.description: Alignment of the data label relative to the data point.

plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-halo--.name: plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-halo--.title: size
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-halo--.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-area-marker--fillColor.name: plotOptions-area-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-area-marker--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-area-marker--fillColor.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-errorbar--pointStart.name: plotOptions-errorbar--pointStart
plotOptions-errorbar--pointStart.title: pointStart
plotOptions-errorbar--pointStart.description: If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointStart defines on what value to start. For example, if a series contains one yearly value starting from 1945, set pointStart to 1945.

plotOptions-waterfall--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-waterfall--stickyTracking
plotOptions-waterfall--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-waterfall--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series. Defaults to true for line and area type series, but to false for columns, pies etc.

plotOptions-gauge-states-hover--lineWidt.name: plotOptions-gauge-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover--lineWidt.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover--lineWidt.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

xAxis-breaks--from.name: xAxis-breaks--from
xAxis-breaks--from.title: from
xAxis-breaks--from.description: The point where the break starts.

plotOptions-spline-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-spline-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-spline-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-spline-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-spline-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-spline-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-series--visible.name: plotOptions-series--visible
plotOptions-series--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-series--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

plotOptions-columnrange--pointInterval.name: plotOptions-columnrange--pointInterval
plotOptions-columnrange--pointInterval.title: pointInterval
plotOptions-columnrange--pointInterval.description:
If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointInterval defines the interval of the x values. For example, if a series contains one value every decade starting from year 0, set pointInterval to 10.

Since Highcharts 4.1, it can be combined with pointIntervalUnit to draw irregular intervals.

plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--valueSuf.name: plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--valueSuf.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--valueSuf.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-arearange--pointPlacement.name: plotOptions-arearange--pointPlacement
plotOptions-arearange--pointPlacement.title: pointPlacement
plotOptions-arearange--pointPlacement.description:
Possible values: null, "on", "between".

In a column chart, when pointPlacement is "on", the point will not create any padding of the X axis. In a polar column chart this means that the first column points directly north. If the pointPlacement is "between", the columns will be laid out between ticks. This is useful for example for visualising an amount between two points in time or in a certain sector of a polar chart.

Since Highcharts 3.0.2, the point placement can also be numeric, where 0 is on the axis value, -0.5 is between this value and the previous, and 0.5 is between this value and the next. Unlike the textual options, numeric point placement options won't affect axis padding.

Defaults to null in cartesian charts, "between" in polar charts.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--showInLegen.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--showInLegend
plotOptions-areasplinerange--showInLegen.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-areasplinerange--showInLegen.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

legend--shadow.name: legend--shadow
legend--shadow.title: shadow
legend--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the legend. A backgroundColor also needs to be applied for this to take effect. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--padd.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--padd.title: padding
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--padd.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-waterfall--allowPointSelect.name: plotOptions-waterfall--allowPointSelect
plotOptions-waterfall--allowPointSelect.title: allowPointSelect
plotOptions-waterfall--allowPointSelect.description: Allow this series' points to be selected by clicking on the markers, bars or pie slices.

plotOptions-pyramid--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-pyramid--stickyTracking
plotOptions-pyramid--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-pyramid--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series.

plotOptions-area-states-hover-halo--size.name: plotOptions-area-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-area-states-hover-halo--size.title: size
plotOptions-area-states-hover-halo--size.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--rotation.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--rotation.title: rotation
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-spline-marker--height.name: plotOptions-spline-marker--height
plotOptions-spline-marker--height.title: height
plotOptions-spline-marker--height.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-area-states-hover--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-area-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-area-states-hover--lineWidth.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-area-states-hover--lineWidth.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--lin.name: plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--lin.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--lin.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

legend--maxHeight.name: legend--maxHeight
legend--maxHeight.title: maxHeight
legend--maxHeight.description: Maximum pixel height for the legend. When the maximum height is extended, navigation will show.

plotOptions-bubble-marker--enabled.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker--enabled
plotOptions-bubble-marker--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-bubble-marker--enabled.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-scatter--enableMouseTracking.name: plotOptions-scatter--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-scatter--enableMouseTracking.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-scatter--enableMouseTracking.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-heatmap-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-heatmap-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-heatmap-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-heatmap-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--allowOve.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--allowOve.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--allowOve.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--valuePr.name: plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--valuePr.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--valuePr.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-bubble--shadow.name: plotOptions-bubble--shadow
plotOptions-bubble--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-bubble--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the graph line. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

xAxis--minorGridLineDashStyle.name: xAxis--minorGridLineDashStyle
xAxis--minorGridLineDashStyle.title: minorGridLineDashStyle
xAxis--minorGridLineDashStyle.description: The dash or dot style of the minor grid lines. For possible values, see this demonstration.

legend--itemDistance.name: legend--itemDistance
legend--itemDistance.title: itemDistance
legend--itemDistance.description: In a legend with horizontal layout, the itemDistance defines the pixel distance between each item.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--enabled.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker--radius.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker--radius
plotOptions-areaspline-marker--radius.title: radius
plotOptions-areaspline-marker--radius.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-columnrange--visible.name: plotOptions-columnrange--visible
plotOptions-columnrange--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-columnrange--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

plotOptions-spline--color.name: plotOptions-spline--color
plotOptions-spline--color.title: color
plotOptions-spline--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-series-tooltip--valueDecimal.name: plotOptions-series-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-series-tooltip--valueDecimal.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-series-tooltip--valueDecimal.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-halo--a.name: plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-halo--a.title: attributes
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-halo--a.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--enabled.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-line-tooltip--followPointer.name: plotOptions-line-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-line-tooltip--followPointer.title: followPointer
plotOptions-line-tooltip--followPointer.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--backgrou.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--backgrou.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--backgrou.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolX.name: exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolX
exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolX.title: symbolX
exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolX.description: The x position of the center of the symbol inside the button.

exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolY.name: exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolY
exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolY.title: symbolY
exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolY.description: The y position of the center of the symbol inside the button.

plotOptions-heatmap-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-heatmap-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-heatmap-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-heatmap-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-bar--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-bar--showCheckbox
plotOptions-bar--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-bar--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--hea.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--hea.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--hea.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-series-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-series-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-series-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-series-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-area--threshold.name: plotOptions-area--threshold
plotOptions-area--threshold.title: threshold
plotOptions-area--threshold.description: The Y axis value to serve as the base for the area, for distinguishing between values above and below a threshold. If null, the area behaves like a line series with fill between the graph and the Y axis minimum.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--pointInterv.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--pointInterval
plotOptions-areasplinerange--pointInterv.title: pointInterval
plotOptions-areasplinerange--pointInterv.description:
If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointInterval defines the interval of the x values. For example, if a series contains one value every decade starting from year 0, set pointInterval to 10.

Since Highcharts 4.1, it can be combined with pointIntervalUnit to draw irregular intervals.

plotOptions-pyramid--depth.name: plotOptions-pyramid--depth
plotOptions-pyramid--depth.title: depth
plotOptions-pyramid--depth.description: The thickness of a 3D pie. Requires highcharts-3d.js

plotOptions-errorbar--edgeWidth.name: plotOptions-errorbar--edgeWidth
plotOptions-errorbar--edgeWidth.title: edgeWidth
plotOptions-errorbar--edgeWidth.description: 3D columns only. The width of the colored edges.

plotOptions-series--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-series--lineWidth
plotOptions-series--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-series--lineWidth.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

yAxis-title--offset.name: yAxis-title--offset
yAxis-title--offset.title: offset
yAxis-title--offset.description: The distance of the axis title from the axis line. By default, this distance is  computed from the offset width of the labels, the labels' distance from  the axis and the title's margin. However when the offset option is set, it overrides all this.

plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.title: lineColor
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-boxplot--selected.name: plotOptions-boxplot--selected
plotOptions-boxplot--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-boxplot--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

yAxis--minorGridLineColor.name: yAxis--minorGridLineColor
yAxis--minorGridLineColor.title: minorGridLineColor
yAxis--minorGridLineColor.description: Color of the minor, secondary grid lines.

plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.name: plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover--radiusPlus
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.title: radiusPlus
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.description: The number of pixels to increase the radius of the hovered point.

chart-options3d--alpha.name: chart-options3d--alpha
chart-options3d--alpha.title: alpha
chart-options3d--alpha.description: One of the two rotation angles for the chart.

plotOptions-gauge--wrap.name: plotOptions-gauge--wrap
plotOptions-gauge--wrap.title: wrap
plotOptions-gauge--wrap.description: When this option is true, the dial will wrap around the axes. For instance, in a full-range gauge going from 0 to 360, a value of 400 will point to 40. When wrap is false, the dial stops at 360.

plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--lineColor
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.title: lineColor
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--distance.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--distance
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--distance.title: distance
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--distance.description: The distance of the data label from the pie's edge. Negative numbers put the data label on top of the pie slices. Connectors are only shown for data labels outside the pie.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--allowOverlap.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--allowOverlap.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--allowOverlap.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover-.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover--radiusPlus
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover-.title: radiusPlus
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover-.description: The number of pixels to increase the radius of the hovered point.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--backg.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--backg.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--backg.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-area--animation.name: plotOptions-area--animation
plotOptions-area--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-area--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

plotOptions-gauge--threshold.name: plotOptions-gauge--threshold
plotOptions-gauge--threshold.title: threshold
plotOptions-gauge--threshold.description: The threshold, also called zero level or base level. For line type series this is only used in conjunction with negativeColor.

plotOptions-series-marker--height.name: plotOptions-series-marker--height
plotOptions-series-marker--height.title: height
plotOptions-series-marker--height.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select-.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select--radius
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select-.title: radius
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select-.description:
The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults
		to the normal state's radius + 2.

plotOptions-spline--pointIntervalUnit.name: plotOptions-spline--pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-spline--pointIntervalUnit.title: pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-spline--pointIntervalUnit.description: On datetime series, this allows for setting the pointInterval to the two irregular time units, month and year. Combine it with pointInterval to draw quarters, 6 months, 10 years etc.

plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.name: plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

yAxis--minorTickLength.name: yAxis--minorTickLength
yAxis--minorTickLength.title: minorTickLength
yAxis--minorTickLength.description: The pixel length of the minor tick marks.

xAxis--ceiling.name: xAxis--ceiling
xAxis--ceiling.title: ceiling
xAxis--ceiling.description: The highest allowed value for automatically computed axis extremes.

plotOptions-bar--edgeWidth.name: plotOptions-bar--edgeWidth
plotOptions-bar--edgeWidth.title: edgeWidth
plotOptions-bar--edgeWidth.description: 3D columns only. The width of the colored edges.

plotOptions-funnel-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-funnel-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-funnel-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-funnel-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-waterfall--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-waterfall--linkedTo
plotOptions-waterfall--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-waterfall--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-area-tooltip--dateTimeLabelF.name: plotOptions-area-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-area-tooltip--dateTimeLabelF.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-area-tooltip--dateTimeLabelF.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--footerF.name: plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--footerF.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--footerF.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-errorbar--edgeColor.name: plotOptions-errorbar--edgeColor
plotOptions-errorbar--edgeColor.title: edgeColor
plotOptions-errorbar--edgeColor.description: 3D columns only. The color of the edges. Similar to borderColor, except it defaults to the same color as the column.

plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.name: plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.title: height
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.title: enabled
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--rotation.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--rotation.title: rotation
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--l.name: plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--lineWidth
plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--l.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--l.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-boxplot-zones--value.name: plotOptions-boxplot-zones--value
plotOptions-boxplot-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-boxplot-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

xAxis-labels--rotation.name: xAxis-labels--rotation
xAxis-labels--rotation.title: rotation
xAxis-labels--rotation.description: Rotation of the labels in degrees.

tooltip--xDateFormat.name: tooltip--xDateFormat
tooltip--xDateFormat.title: xDateFormat
tooltip--xDateFormat.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-bubble--pointStart.name: plotOptions-bubble--pointStart
plotOptions-bubble--pointStart.title: pointStart
plotOptions-bubble--pointStart.description: If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointStart defines on what value to start. For example, if a series contains one yearly value starting from 1945, set pointStart to 1945.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--allow.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--allow.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--allow.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-line--pointIntervalUnit.name: plotOptions-line--pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-line--pointIntervalUnit.title: pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-line--pointIntervalUnit.description: On datetime series, this allows for setting the pointInterval to the two irregular time units, month and year. Combine it with pointInterval to draw quarters, 6 months, 10 years etc.

plotOptions-waterfall--minPointLength.name: plotOptions-waterfall--minPointLength
plotOptions-waterfall--minPointLength.title: minPointLength
plotOptions-waterfall--minPointLength.description: The minimal height for a column or width for a bar. By default, 0 values are not shown. To visualize a 0 (or close to zero) point, set the minimal point length to a  pixel value like 3. In stacked column charts, minPointLength might not be respected for tightly packed values.

chart--borderRadius.name: chart--borderRadius
chart--borderRadius.title: borderRadius
chart--borderRadius.description: The corner radius of the outer chart border.

plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

xAxis--gridLineDashStyle.name: xAxis--gridLineDashStyle
xAxis--gridLineDashStyle.title: gridLineDashStyle
xAxis--gridLineDashStyle.description: The dash or dot style of the grid lines. For possible values, see this demonstration.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--enable.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--enable.title: enabled
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--enable.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-polygon-zones--value.name: plotOptions-polygon-zones--value
plotOptions-polygon-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-polygon-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-spline--turboThreshold.name: plotOptions-spline--turboThreshold
plotOptions-spline--turboThreshold.title: turboThreshold
plotOptions-spline--turboThreshold.description: When a series contains a data array that is longer than this, only one dimensional arrays of numbers, or two dimensional arrays with x and y values are allowed. Also, only the first point is tested, and the rest are assumed to be the same format. This saves expensive data checking and indexing in long series. Set it to 0 disable.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-polygon-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-polygon-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-polygon-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-polygon-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-halo-.name: plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-halo-.title: attributes
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-halo-.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.name: plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.title: height
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--overfl.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--overfl.title: overflow
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--overfl.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-funnel--visible.name: plotOptions-funnel--visible
plotOptions-funnel--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-funnel--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--showCheckbo.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--showCheckbox
plotOptions-areasplinerange--showCheckbo.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-areasplinerange--showCheckbo.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-column--cursor.name: plotOptions-column--cursor
plotOptions-column--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-column--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.title: symbol
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-pie--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-pie--zoneAxis
plotOptions-pie--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-pie--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-funnel--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-funnel--borderWidth
plotOptions-funnel--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-funnel--borderWidth.description: The width of the border surrounding each slice.

plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-halo--s.name: plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-halo--s.title: size
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-halo--s.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-polygon--visible.name: plotOptions-polygon--visible
plotOptions-polygon--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-polygon--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--over.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--over.title: overflow
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--over.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.title: fillColor
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-pyramid-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-pyramid-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-pyramid-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-pyramid-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-areasplinerange--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--zoneAxis
plotOptions-areasplinerange--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-areasplinerange--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-waterfall--pointStart.name: plotOptions-waterfall--pointStart
plotOptions-waterfall--pointStart.title: pointStart
plotOptions-waterfall--pointStart.description: If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointStart defines on what value to start. For example, if a series contains one yearly value starting from 1945, set pointStart to 1945.

plotOptions-series--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-series--stickyTracking
plotOptions-series--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-series--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series. Defaults to true for line and area type series, but to false for columns, pies etc.

plotOptions-column-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.name: plotOptions-column-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-column-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-column-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

yAxis--gridZIndex.name: yAxis--gridZIndex
yAxis--gridZIndex.title: gridZIndex
yAxis--gridZIndex.description: The Z index of the grid lines.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: enabled
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-errorbar-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-errorbar-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-errorbar-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-errorbar-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-errorbar--whiskerLength.name: plotOptions-errorbar--whiskerLength
plotOptions-errorbar--whiskerLength.title: whiskerLength
plotOptions-errorbar--whiskerLength.description: The length of the whiskers, the horizontal lines marking low and high values. It can be a numerical pixel value, or a percentage value of the box width. Set 0 to disable whiskers.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--xLow
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: xLow
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: X offset of the lower data labels relative to the point value.

plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--l.name: plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--lineWidth
plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--l.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--l.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-halo--a.name: plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-halo--a.title: attributes
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-halo--a.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-gauge-zones--color.name: plotOptions-gauge-zones--color
plotOptions-gauge-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-gauge-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-areaspline--color.name: plotOptions-areaspline--color
plotOptions-areaspline--color.title: color
plotOptions-areaspline--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-pie-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-pie-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--en.name: plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--en.title: enabled
plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--en.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

legend--symbolWidth.name: legend--symbolWidth
legend--symbolWidth.title: symbolWidth
legend--symbolWidth.description: The pixel width of the legend item symbol.

plotOptions-gauge--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-gauge--showInLegend
plotOptions-gauge--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-gauge--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. Defaults to false for gauge series.

yAxis--gridLineDashStyle.name: yAxis--gridLineDashStyle
yAxis--gridLineDashStyle.title: gridLineDashStyle
yAxis--gridLineDashStyle.description: The dash or dot style of the grid lines. For possible values, see this demonstration.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

lang--drillUpText.name: lang--drillUpText
lang--drillUpText.title: drillUpText
lang--drillUpText.description: The text for the button that appears when drilling down, linking back to the parent series. The parent series' name is inserted for {series.name}.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbol.name: exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbol
exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbol.title: symbol
exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbol.description: The symbol for the button. Points to a definition function in the Highcharts.Renderer.symbols collection. The default exportIcon function is part of the exporting module.

plotOptions-area-marker--width.name: plotOptions-area-marker--width
plotOptions-area-marker--width.title: width
plotOptions-area-marker--width.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-bubble-marker--lineColor.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-bubble-marker--lineColor.title: lineColor
plotOptions-bubble-marker--lineColor.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-pie-tooltip--followPointer.name: plotOptions-pie-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--followPointer.title: followPointer
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--followPointer.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.name: plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.title: height
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-waterfall--pointWidth.name: plotOptions-waterfall--pointWidth
plotOptions-waterfall--pointWidth.title: pointWidth
plotOptions-waterfall--pointWidth.description: A pixel value specifying a fixed width for each column or bar. When null, the width is calculated from the pointPadding and groupPadding.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--headerFormat.name: plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--headerFormat.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--headerFormat.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-columnrange--colors.name: plotOptions-columnrange--colors
plotOptions-columnrange--colors.title: colors
plotOptions-columnrange--colors.description: A series specific or series type specific color set to apply instead of the global colors when colorByPoint is true.

plotOptions-spline-tooltip--valueDecimal.name: plotOptions-spline-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--valueDecimal.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--valueDecimal.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--align.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--align
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--align.title: align
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--align.description: The alignment of the data label compared to the point. If right, the right side of the label should be touching the point. For points with an extent, like columns, the alignments also dictates how to align it inside the box, as given with the inside option. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right".

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--zIndex.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--zIndex.title: zIndex
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--zIndex.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--radius
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.title: radius
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.description: The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults to the normal state's radius + 2 as per the radiusPlus option.

plotOptions-column--borderRadius.name: plotOptions-column--borderRadius
plotOptions-column--borderRadius.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-column--borderRadius.description: The corner radius of the border surrounding each column or bar.

plotOptions-boxplot--pointPadding.name: plotOptions-boxplot--pointPadding
plotOptions-boxplot--pointPadding.title: pointPadding
plotOptions-boxplot--pointPadding.description: Padding between each column or bar, in x axis units.

title--align.name: title--align
title--align.title: align
title--align.description: The horizontal alignment of the title. Can be one of "left", "center" and "right".

plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-arearange--color.name: plotOptions-arearange--color
plotOptions-arearange--color.title: color
plotOptions-arearange--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--align.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--align
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--align.title: align
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--align.description: The alignment of the data label compared to the point. If right, the right side of the label should be touching the point. For points with an extent, like columns, the alignments also dictates how to align it inside the box, as given with the inside option. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right".

plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select-.name: plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select--enabled
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select-.title: enabled
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select-.description: Enable or disable visible feedback for selection.

plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.title: enabled
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.title: enabled
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-bar--pointStart.name: plotOptions-bar--pointStart
plotOptions-bar--pointStart.title: pointStart
