plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--shadow.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--shadow.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker--width.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker--width
plotOptions-areaspline-marker--width.title: width
plotOptions-areaspline-marker--width.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--padding.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--padding.title: padding
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--padding.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--allowO.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--allowO.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--allowO.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-series--negativeColor.name: plotOptions-series--negativeColor
plotOptions-series--negativeColor.title: negativeColor
plotOptions-series--negativeColor.description: The color for the parts of the graph or points that are below the threshold.

plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--borderCo.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--borderCo.title: borderColor
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--borderCo.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-line-tooltip--valueDecimals.name: plotOptions-line-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-line-tooltip--valueDecimals.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-line-tooltip--valueDecimals.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-line-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-line-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-line-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-line-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--yLow.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--yLow
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--yLow.title: yLow
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--yLow.description: Y offset of the lower data labels relative to the point value.

yAxis--minPadding.name: yAxis--minPadding
yAxis--minPadding.title: minPadding
yAxis--minPadding.description: Padding of the min value relative to the length of the axis. A padding of 0.05 will make a 100px axis 5px longer. This is useful when you don't want the lowest data value to appear on the edge of the plot area.

plotOptions-line--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-line--stickyTracking
plotOptions-line--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-line--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series. Defaults to true for line and area type series, but to false for columns, pies etc.

plotOptions-treemap--cropThreshold.name: plotOptions-treemap--cropThreshold
plotOptions-treemap--cropThreshold.title: cropThreshold
plotOptions-treemap--cropThreshold.description: When the series contains less points than the crop threshold, all points are drawn, event if the points fall outside the visible plot area at the current zoom. The advantage of drawing all points (including markers and columns), is that animation is performed on updates. On the other hand, when the series contains more points than the crop threshold, the series data is cropped to only contain points that fall within the plot area. The advantage of cropping away invisible points is to increase performance on large series.

plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--dateTimeLa.name: plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--dateTimeLa.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--dateTimeLa.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--valuePre.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--valuePre.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--valuePre.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-area-marker--radius.name: plotOptions-area-marker--radius
plotOptions-area-marker--radius.title: radius
plotOptions-area-marker--radius.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--shadow.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--shadow.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

tooltip--pointFormat.name: tooltip--pointFormat
tooltip--pointFormat.title: pointFormat
tooltip--pointFormat.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-areaspline--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-areaspline--lineWidth
plotOptions-areaspline--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-areaspline--lineWidth.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--connector.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--connectorColor
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--connector.title: connectorColor
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--connector.description: The color of the line connecting the data label to the pie slice. The default color is the same as the point's color.

yAxis--allowDecimals.name: yAxis--allowDecimals
yAxis--allowDecimals.title: allowDecimals
yAxis--allowDecimals.description: Whether to allow decimals in this axis' ticks. When counting integers, like persons or hits on a web page, decimals must be avoided in the axis tick labels.

yAxis-labels--staggerLines.name: yAxis-labels--staggerLines
yAxis-labels--staggerLines.title: staggerLines
yAxis-labels--staggerLines.description: Horizontal axes only. The number of lines to spread the labels over to make room or tighter labels.  .

plotOptions-bar--pointWidth.name: plotOptions-bar--pointWidth
plotOptions-bar--pointWidth.title: pointWidth
plotOptions-bar--pointWidth.description: A pixel value specifying a fixed width for each column or bar. When null, the width is calculated from the pointPadding and groupPadding.

plotOptions-boxplot--colorByPoint.name: plotOptions-boxplot--colorByPoint
plotOptions-boxplot--colorByPoint.title: colorByPoint
plotOptions-boxplot--colorByPoint.description: When using automatic point colors pulled from the options.colors collection, this option determines whether the chart should receive one color per series or one color per point.

plotOptions-bar--colors.name: plotOptions-bar--colors
plotOptions-bar--colors.title: colors
plotOptions-bar--colors.description: A series specific or series type specific color set to apply instead of the global colors when colorByPoint is true.

plotOptions-line-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-line-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-line-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-line-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

yAxis--units.name: yAxis--units
yAxis--units.title: units

plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-treemap-levels--layoutStarti.name: plotOptions-treemap-levels--layoutStartingDirection
plotOptions-treemap-levels--layoutStarti.title: layoutStartingDirection
plotOptions-treemap-levels--layoutStarti.description: Can set the layoutStartingDirection option on a specific level.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--distance.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--distance
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--distance.title: distance
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--distance.description: The distance of the data label from the pie's edge. Negative numbers put the data label on top of the pie slices. Connectors are only shown for data labels outside the pie.

plotOptions-column-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-column-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-column-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-column-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

chart--style.name: chart--style
chart--style.title: style
chart--style.defaults: {"fontFamily":"\"Lucida Grande\", \"Lucida Sans Unicode\", Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif","fontSize":"12px"}

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--backgrou.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--backgrou.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--backgrou.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.title: lineColor
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-bar--cropThreshold.name: plotOptions-bar--cropThreshold
plotOptions-bar--cropThreshold.title: cropThreshold
plotOptions-bar--cropThreshold.description: When the series contains less points than the crop threshold, all points are drawn,  event if the points fall outside the visible plot area at the current zoom. The advantage of drawing all points (including markers and columns), is that animation is performed on updates. On the other hand, when the series contains more points than the crop threshold, the series data is cropped to only contain points that fall within the plot area. The advantage of cropping away invisible points is to increase performance on large series.  .

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

xAxis-labels--zIndex.name: xAxis-labels--zIndex
xAxis-labels--zIndex.title: zIndex
xAxis-labels--zIndex.description: The Z index for the axis labels.

plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--footerForm.name: plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--footerForm.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--footerForm.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-line-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-line-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-line-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-line-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--align.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--align
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--align.title: align
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--align.description: The alignment of the data label compared to the point. If right, the right side of the label should be touching the point. For points with an extent, like columns, the alignments also dictates how to align it inside the box, as given with the inside option. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right".

chart-options3d--beta.name: chart-options3d--beta
chart-options3d--beta.title: beta
chart-options3d--beta.description: One of the two rotation angles for the chart.

plotOptions-bubble--displayNegative.name: plotOptions-bubble--displayNegative
plotOptions-bubble--displayNegative.title: displayNegative
plotOptions-bubble--displayNegative.description: Whether to display negative sized bubbles. The threshold is given by the zThreshold option, and negative bubbles can be visualized by setting negativeColor.

plotOptions-errorbar--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-errorbar--linkedTo
plotOptions-errorbar--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-errorbar--linkedTo.description: The parent series of the error bar. The default value links it to the previous series. Otherwise, use the id of the parent series.

plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--valueDec.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--valueDec.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--valueDec.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-pie-tooltip--followTouchMove.name: plotOptions-pie-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--followTouchMove.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--followTouchMove.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-area--allowPointSelect.name: plotOptions-area--allowPointSelect
plotOptions-area--allowPointSelect.title: allowPointSelect
plotOptions-area--allowPointSelect.description: Allow this series' points to be selected by clicking on the markers, bars or pie slices.

plotOptions-bubble-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-bubble-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-bubble-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-bubble-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--valueDecima.name: plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--valueDecima.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--valueDecima.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

yAxis-labels--rotation.name: yAxis-labels--rotation
yAxis-labels--rotation.title: rotation
yAxis-labels--rotation.description: Rotation of the labels in degrees.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--borderCo.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--borderCo.title: borderColor
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--borderCo.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

navigation-buttonOptions--text.name: navigation-buttonOptions--text
navigation-buttonOptions--text.title: text
navigation-buttonOptions--text.description: A text string to add to the individual button.

plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.title: fillColor
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-bubble-marker--radius.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker--radius
plotOptions-bubble-marker--radius.title: radius
plotOptions-bubble-marker--radius.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

tooltip--followTouchMove.name: tooltip--followTouchMove
tooltip--followTouchMove.title: followTouchMove
tooltip--followTouchMove.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.description: The additional line width for a hovered point.

plotOptions-bubble-states-hover--lineWid.name: plotOptions-bubble-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover--lineWid.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover--lineWid.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-pie--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-pie--borderWidth
plotOptions-pie--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-pie--borderWidth.description: The width of the border surrounding each slice.

plotOptions-boxplot--enableMouseTracking.name: plotOptions-boxplot--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-boxplot--enableMouseTracking.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-boxplot--enableMouseTracking.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-waterfall--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-waterfall--dashStyle
plotOptions-waterfall--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-waterfall--dashStyle.description:
A name for the dash style to use for the line connecting the columns of the waterfall series. Possible values:
  • Solid
  • ShortDash
  • ShortDot
  • ShortDashDot
  • ShortDashDotDot
  • Dot
  • Dash
  • LongDash
  • DashDot
  • LongDashDot
  • LongDashDotDot
.

plotOptions-waterfall--selected.name: plotOptions-waterfall--selected
plotOptions-waterfall--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-waterfall--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

chart--spacingBottom.name: chart--spacingBottom
chart--spacingBottom.title: spacingBottom
chart--spacingBottom.description: The space between the bottom edge of the chart and the content (plot area, axis title and labels, title, subtitle or legend in top position).

plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--val.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--val.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--val.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

xAxis--minorTickLength.name: xAxis--minorTickLength
xAxis--minorTickLength.title: minorTickLength
xAxis--minorTickLength.description: The pixel length of the minor tick marks.

plotOptions-pie-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-pie-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover--en.name: plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover--en.title: enabled
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover--en.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-polygon--pointIntervalUnit.name: plotOptions-polygon--pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-polygon--pointIntervalUnit.title: pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-polygon--pointIntervalUnit.description: On datetime series, this allows for setting the pointInterval to the two irregular time units, month and year. Combine it with pointInterval to draw quarters, 6 months, 10 years etc.

plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--ena.name: plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--ena.title: enabled
plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--ena.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-errorbar--selected.name: plotOptions-errorbar--selected
plotOptions-errorbar--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-errorbar--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-bar--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-bar--linkedTo
plotOptions-bar--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-bar--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-line-marker--symbol.name: plotOptions-line-marker--symbol
plotOptions-line-marker--symbol.title: symbol
plotOptions-line-marker--symbol.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-polygon--cropThreshold.name: plotOptions-polygon--cropThreshold
plotOptions-polygon--cropThreshold.title: cropThreshold
plotOptions-polygon--cropThreshold.description: When the series contains less points than the crop threshold, all points are drawn,  event if the points fall outside the visible plot area at the current zoom. The advantage of drawing all points (including markers and columns), is that animation is performed on updates. On the other hand, when the series contains more points than the crop threshold, the series data is cropped to only contain points that fall within the plot area. The advantage of cropping away invisible points is to increase performance on large series.  .

plotOptions-spline-states-hover--enabled.name: plotOptions-spline-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-spline-states-hover--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-spline-states-hover--enabled.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--pointInterv.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-areasplinerange--pointInterv.title: pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-areasplinerange--pointInterv.description: On datetime series, this allows for setting the pointInterval to the two irregular time units, month and year. Combine it with pointInterval to draw quarters, 6 months, 10 years etc.

lang--noData.name: lang--noData
lang--noData.title: noData
lang--noData.description: The text to display when the chart contains no data. Requires the no-data module, see noData.

plotOptions-area--fillColor.name: plotOptions-area--fillColor
plotOptions-area--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-area--fillColor.description: Fill color or gradient for the area. When null, the series' color is used with the series' fillOpacity.

plotOptions-pie-tooltip--footerFormat.name: plotOptions-pie-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--footerFormat.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--footerFormat.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-heatmap-zones--value.name: plotOptions-heatmap-zones--value
plotOptions-heatmap-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-heatmap-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-line-zones--value.name: plotOptions-line-zones--value
plotOptions-line-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-line-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

yAxis--reversedStacks.name: yAxis--reversedStacks
yAxis--reversedStacks.title: reversedStacks
yAxis--reversedStacks.description: If true, the first series in a stack will be drawn on top in a positive, non-reversed Y axis. If false, the first series is in the base of the stack.

plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--r.name: plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--r.title: radius
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--r.description: The radius of the point marker.

yAxis--tickLength.name: yAxis--tickLength
yAxis--tickLength.title: tickLength
yAxis--tickLength.description: The pixel length of the main tick marks.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--padding.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--padding.title: padding
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--padding.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--bord.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--bord.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--bord.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select-.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select--enabled
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select-.title: enabled
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select-.description: Enable or disable visible feedback for selection.

global--canvasToolsURL.name: global--canvasToolsURL
global--canvasToolsURL.title: canvasToolsURL
global--canvasToolsURL.description: The URL to the additional file to lazy load for Android 2.x devices. These devices don't support SVG, so we download a helper file that contains canvg, its dependency rbcolor, and our own CanVG Renderer class. To avoid hotlinking to our site, you can install canvas-tools.js on your own server and change this option accordingly.

plotOptions-bubble--maxSize.name: plotOptions-bubble--maxSize
plotOptions-bubble--maxSize.title: maxSize
plotOptions-bubble--maxSize.description: Maximum bubble size. Bubbles will automatically size between the minSize and maxSize to reflect the z value of each bubble. Can be either pixels (when no unit is given), or a percentage of the smallest one of the plot width and height.

plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-hal.name: plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-hal.title: opacity
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-hal.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--borderWi.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--borderWi.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--borderWi.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-treemap-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-treemap-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-treemap-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-treemap-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

xAxis-title--style.name: xAxis-title--style
xAxis-title--style.title: style
xAxis-title--style.description: CSS styles for the title. When titles are rotated they are rendered using vector graphic techniques and not all styles are applicable.

plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--pointForm.name: plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--pointForm.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--pointForm.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--backgroun.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--backgroun.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--backgroun.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-spline--connectNulls.name: plotOptions-spline--connectNulls
plotOptions-spline--connectNulls.title: connectNulls
plotOptions-spline--connectNulls.description: Whether to connect a graph line across null points.

plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.title: enabled
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-heatmap--selected.name: plotOptions-heatmap--selected
plotOptions-heatmap--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-heatmap--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-waterfall-zones--value.name: plotOptions-waterfall-zones--value
plotOptions-waterfall-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-waterfall-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--xDateForm.name: plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--xDateForm.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--xDateForm.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-columnrange--cropThreshold.name: plotOptions-columnrange--cropThreshold
plotOptions-columnrange--cropThreshold.title: cropThreshold
plotOptions-columnrange--cropThreshold.description: When the series contains less points than the crop threshold, all points are drawn,  event if the points fall outside the visible plot area at the current zoom. The advantage of drawing all points (including markers and columns), is that animation is performed on updates. On the other hand, when the series contains more points than the crop threshold, the series data is cropped to only contain points that fall within the plot area. The advantage of cropping away invisible points is to increase performance on large series.  .

plotOptions-area-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-area-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-area-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-area-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.name: plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.title: width
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-spline-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.name: plotOptions-spline-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

yAxis-stackLabels--align.name: yAxis-stackLabels--align
yAxis-stackLabels--align.title: align
yAxis-stackLabels--align.description: Defines the horizontal alignment of the stack total label. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right". The default value is calculated at runtime and depends on orientation and whether the stack is positive or negative.

yAxis--tickPositions.name: yAxis--tickPositions
yAxis--tickPositions.title: tickPositions
yAxis--tickPositions.description: An array defining where the ticks are laid out on the axis. This overrides the default behaviour of tickPixelInterval and tickInterval.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--backgroun.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--backgroun.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--backgroun.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover--line.name: plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover--line.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover--line.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--fil.name: plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--fil.title: fillColor
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--fil.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--paddin.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--paddin.title: padding
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--paddin.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.name: plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.title: radius
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-areaspline-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-areaspline-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-areaspline-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-areaspline-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-scatter-marker--lineColor.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-scatter-marker--lineColor.title: lineColor
plotOptions-scatter-marker--lineColor.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-boxplot-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-boxplot-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-boxplot-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-boxplot-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-spline--threshold.name: plotOptions-spline--threshold
plotOptions-spline--threshold.title: threshold
plotOptions-spline--threshold.description: The threshold, also called zero level or base level. For line type series this is only used in conjunction with negativeColor.

plotOptions-bar--pointInterval.name: plotOptions-bar--pointInterval
plotOptions-bar--pointInterval.title: pointInterval
plotOptions-bar--pointInterval.description:
If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointInterval defines the interval of the x values. For example, if a series contains one value every decade starting from year 0, set pointInterval to 10.

Since Highcharts 4.1, it can be combined with pointIntervalUnit to draw irregular intervals.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--bord.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--bord.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--bord.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover--lineWi.name: plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover--lineWi.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover--lineWi.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

subtitle--floating.name: subtitle--floating
subtitle--floating.title: floating
subtitle--floating.description: When the subtitle is floating, the plot area will not move to make space for it.

plotOptions-bar--threshold.name: plotOptions-bar--threshold
plotOptions-bar--threshold.title: threshold
plotOptions-bar--threshold.description: The Y axis value to serve as the base for the columns, for distinguishing between values above and below a threshold. If null, the columns extend from the padding Y axis minimum.

plotOptions-column--pointPadding.name: plotOptions-column--pointPadding
plotOptions-column--pointPadding.title: pointPadding
plotOptions-column--pointPadding.description: Padding between each column or bar, in x axis units.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--align.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--align
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--align.title: align
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--align.description: The alignment of the data label compared to the point. If right, the right side of the label should be touching the point. For points with an extent, like columns, the alignments also dictates how to align it inside the box, as given with the inside option. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right".

plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-spline-marker--fillColor.name: plotOptions-spline-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-spline-marker--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-spline-marker--fillColor.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-arearange--visible.name: plotOptions-arearange--visible
plotOptions-arearange--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-arearange--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--defe.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--defe.title: defer
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--defe.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

yAxis--opposite.name: yAxis--opposite
yAxis--opposite.title: opposite
yAxis--opposite.description: Whether to display the axis on the opposite side of the normal. The normal is on the left side for vertical axes and bottom for horizontal, so the opposite sides will be right and top respectively. This is typically used with dual or multiple axes.

plotOptions-solidgauge--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-solidgauge--showInLegend
plotOptions-solidgauge--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-solidgauge--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. Defaults to false for gauge series.

plotOptions-scatter-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-scatter-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-scatter-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-scatter-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--yLow.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--yLow
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--yLow.title: yLow
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--yLow.description: Y offset of the lower data labels relative to the point value.

plotOptions-boxplot--negativeColor.name: plotOptions-boxplot--negativeColor
plotOptions-boxplot--negativeColor.title: negativeColor
plotOptions-boxplot--negativeColor.description: The color for the parts of the graph or points that are below the threshold.

plotOptions-spline-states-hover--lineWid.name: plotOptions-spline-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-spline-states-hover--lineWid.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-spline-states-hover--lineWid.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.name: plotOptions-series-marker-states-select--lineColor
plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.title: lineColor
plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.name: plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover--radius
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.title: radius
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.description: The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults to the normal state's radius + 2 as per the radiusPlus option.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--zIndex.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--zIndex.title: zIndex
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--zIndex.description: The Z index of the data labels. A value of 2 display them behind the dial.

plotOptions-treemap-levels--borderDashSt.name: plotOptions-treemap-levels--borderDashStyle
plotOptions-treemap-levels--borderDashSt.title: borderDashStyle
plotOptions-treemap-levels--borderDashSt.description: Set the dash style of the border of all the point which lies on the level. See plotOptions.scatter.dashStyle for possible options.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--padding.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--padding.title: padding
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--padding.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--shadow.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--shadow
plotOptions-areasplinerange--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-areasplinerange--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the graph line. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--xDateFormat.name: plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--xDateFormat.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--xDateFormat.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-areaspline--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-areaspline--dashStyle
plotOptions-areaspline--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-areaspline--dashStyle.description:
A name for the dash style to use for the graph. Applies only to series type having a graph, like line, spline, area and scatter in case it has a lineWidth. The value for the dashStyle include:
  • Solid
  • ShortDash
  • ShortDot
  • ShortDashDot
  • ShortDashDotDot
  • Dot
  • Dash
  • LongDash
  • DashDot
  • LongDashDot
  • LongDashDotDot

plotOptions-column--pointRange.name: plotOptions-column--pointRange
plotOptions-column--pointRange.title: pointRange
plotOptions-column--pointRange.description: The X axis range that each point is valid for. This determines the width of the column. On a categorized axis, the range will be 1 by default (one category unit). On linear and datetime axes, the range will be computed as the distance between the two closest data points.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--align.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--align
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--align.title: align
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--align.description: The alignment of the data label compared to the point. If right, the right side of the label should be touching the point. For points with an extent, like columns, the alignments also dictates how to align it inside the box, as given with the inside option. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right".

yAxis--showFirstLabel.name: yAxis--showFirstLabel
yAxis--showFirstLabel.title: showFirstLabel
yAxis--showFirstLabel.description: Whether to show the first tick label.

yAxis--minColor.name: yAxis--minColor
yAxis--minColor.title: minColor
yAxis--minColor.description: Solid gauge only. Unless stops are set, the color to represent the minimum value of the Y axis.

plotOptions-area-tooltip--footerFormat.name: plotOptions-area-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-area-tooltip--footerFormat.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-area-tooltip--footerFormat.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-treemap--enableMouseTracking.name: plotOptions-treemap--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-treemap--enableMouseTracking.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-treemap--enableMouseTracking.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-treemap--turboThreshold.name: plotOptions-treemap--turboThreshold
plotOptions-treemap--turboThreshold.title: turboThreshold
plotOptions-treemap--turboThreshold.description: When a series contains a data array that is longer than this, only one dimensional arrays of numbers, or two dimensional arrays with x and y values are allowed. Also, only the first point is tested, and the rest are assumed to be the same format. This saves expensive data checking and indexing in long series. Set it to 0 disable.

plotOptions-spline-marker--lineColor.name: plotOptions-spline-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-spline-marker--lineColor.title: lineColor
plotOptions-spline-marker--lineColor.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--enabled.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-treemap-states-hover--lineWi.name: plotOptions-treemap-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover--lineWi.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover--lineWi.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--alig.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--align
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--alig.title: align
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--alig.description: The alignment of the data label compared to the point. If right, the right side of the label should be touching the point. For points with an extent, like columns, the alignments also dictates how to align it inside the box, as given with the inside option. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right".

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--backgroun.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--backgroun.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--backgroun.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.name: plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.title: lineColor
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--allowOver.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--allowOver.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--allowOver.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-boxplot--allowPointSelect.name: plotOptions-boxplot--allowPointSelect
plotOptions-boxplot--allowPointSelect.title: allowPointSelect
plotOptions-boxplot--allowPointSelect.description: Allow this series' points to be selected by clicking on the markers, bars or pie slices.

plotOptions-errorbar--colors.name: plotOptions-errorbar--colors
plotOptions-errorbar--colors.title: colors
plotOptions-errorbar--colors.description: A series specific or series type specific color set to apply instead of the global colors when colorByPoint is true.

plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--followTou.name: plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--followTou.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--followTou.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

tooltip--shared.name: tooltip--shared
tooltip--shared.title: shared
tooltip--shared.description: When the tooltip is shared, the entire plot area will capture mouse movement or touch events. Tooltip texts for series types with ordered data (not pie, scatter, flags etc) will be shown in a single bubble. This is recommended for single series charts and for tablet/mobile optimized charts.

plotOptions-area--cropThreshold.name: plotOptions-area--cropThreshold
plotOptions-area--cropThreshold.title: cropThreshold
plotOptions-area--cropThreshold.description: When the series contains less points than the crop threshold, all points are drawn,  event if the points fall outside the visible plot area at the current zoom. The advantage of drawing all points (including markers and columns), is that animation is performed on updates. On the other hand, when the series contains more points than the crop threshold, the series data is cropped to only contain points that fall within the plot area. The advantage of cropping away invisible points is to increase performance on large series.  .

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--borderColor.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--borderColor.title: borderColor
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--borderColor.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

yAxis-breaks--breakSize.name: yAxis-breaks--breakSize
yAxis-breaks--breakSize.title: breakSize
yAxis-breaks--breakSize.description: A number indicating how much space should be left between the start and the end of the break.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--align.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--align
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--align.title: align
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--align.description: The alignment of the data label compared to the point. If right, the right side of the label should be touching the point. For points with an extent, like columns, the alignments also dictates how to align it inside the box, as given with the inside option. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right".

yAxis-breaks--to.name: yAxis-breaks--to
yAxis-breaks--to.title: to
yAxis-breaks--to.description: The point where the break ends.

plotOptions-waterfall--colors.name: plotOptions-waterfall--colors
plotOptions-waterfall--colors.title: colors
plotOptions-waterfall--colors.description: A series specific or series type specific color set to apply instead of the global colors when colorByPoint is true.

plotOptions-polygon--allowPointSelect.name: plotOptions-polygon--allowPointSelect
plotOptions-polygon--allowPointSelect.title: allowPointSelect
plotOptions-polygon--allowPointSelect.description: Allow this series' points to be selected by clicking on the markers, bars or pie slices.

plotOptions-column--minPointLength.name: plotOptions-column--minPointLength
plotOptions-column--minPointLength.title: minPointLength
plotOptions-column--minPointLength.description: The minimal height for a column or width for a bar. By default, 0 values are not shown. To visualize a 0 (or close to zero) point, set the minimal point length to a  pixel value like 3. In stacked column charts, minPointLength might not be respected for tightly packed values.

plotOptions-pie-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-pie-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-pie-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-pie-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--borderWi.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--borderWi.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--borderWi.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-spline-zones--color.name: plotOptions-spline-zones--color
plotOptions-spline-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-spline-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-spline--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-spline--showInLegend
plotOptions-spline--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-spline--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.title: width
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-bar--color.name: plotOptions-bar--color
plotOptions-bar--color.title: color
plotOptions-bar--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--connecto.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--connectorWidth
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--connecto.title: connectorWidth
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--connecto.description: The width of the line connecting the data label to the pie slice.

plotOptions-area--pointInterval.name: plotOptions-area--pointInterval
plotOptions-area--pointInterval.title: pointInterval
plotOptions-area--pointInterval.description:
If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointInterval defines the interval of the x values. For example, if a series contains one value every decade starting from year 0, set pointInterval to 10.

Since Highcharts 4.1, it can be combined with pointIntervalUnit to draw irregular intervals.

plotOptions-treemap--colors.name: plotOptions-treemap--colors
plotOptions-treemap--colors.title: colors
plotOptions-treemap--colors.description: A series specific or series type specific color set to apply instead of the global colors when colorByPoint is true.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--backg.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--backg.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--backg.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-bar--turboThreshold.name: plotOptions-bar--turboThreshold
plotOptions-bar--turboThreshold.title: turboThreshold
plotOptions-bar--turboThreshold.description: When a series contains a data array that is longer than this, only one dimensional arrays of numbers, or two dimensional arrays with x and y values are allowed. Also, only the first point is tested, and the rest are assumed to be the same format. This saves expensive data checking and indexing in long series. Set it to 0 disable.

yAxis--max.name: yAxis--max
yAxis--max.title: max
yAxis--max.description: The maximum value of the axis. If null, the max value is automatically calculated. If the endOnTick option is true, the max value might be rounded up. The actual maximum value is also influenced by chart.alignTicks.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--inside.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--footerFormat.name: plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--footerFormat.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--footerFormat.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

xAxis-breaks--breakSize.name: xAxis-breaks--breakSize
xAxis-breaks--breakSize.title: breakSize
xAxis-breaks--breakSize.description: A number indicating how much space should be left between the start and the end of the break.

data--parseDate.name: data--parseDate
data--parseDate.title: parseDate
data--parseDate.description: A callback function to parse string representations of dates into JavaScript timestamps. Should return an integer timestamp on success.

plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-halo.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-halo.title: attributes
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-halo.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

legend--borderColor.name: legend--borderColor
legend--borderColor.title: borderColor
legend--borderColor.description: The color of the drawn border around the legend.

plotOptions-line--cursor.name: plotOptions-line--cursor
plotOptions-line--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-line--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--useHT.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--useHT.title: useHTML
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--useHT.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.description: The additional line width for a hovered point.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--align.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--align
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--align.title: align
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--align.description: The alignment of the data label compared to the point. If right, the right side of the label should be touching the point. For points with an extent, like columns, the alignments also dictates how to align it inside the box, as given with the inside option. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right".

plotOptions-waterfall--pointRange.name: plotOptions-waterfall--pointRange
plotOptions-waterfall--pointRange.title: pointRange
plotOptions-waterfall--pointRange.description: The X axis range that each point is valid for. This determines the width of the column. On a categorized axis, the range will be 1 by default (one category unit). On linear and datetime axes, the range will be computed as the distance between the two closest data points.

xAxis-labels--useHTML.name: xAxis-labels--useHTML
xAxis-labels--useHTML.title: useHTML
xAxis-labels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

legend--itemHiddenStyle.name: legend--itemHiddenStyle
legend--itemHiddenStyle.title: itemHiddenStyle

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--borderWi.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--borderWi.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--borderWi.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.name: plotOptions-series-marker-states-select--enabled
plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.title: enabled
plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.description: Enable or disable visible feedback for selection.

plotOptions-errorbar--depth.name: plotOptions-errorbar--depth
plotOptions-errorbar--depth.title: depth
plotOptions-errorbar--depth.description: Depth of the columns in a 3D column chart. Requires highcharts-3d.js.

xAxis--reversed.name: xAxis--reversed
xAxis--reversed.title: reversed
xAxis--reversed.description: Whether to reverse the axis so that the highest number is closest to the origin. If the chart is inverted, the x axis is reversed by default.

plotOptions-columnrange--color.name: plotOptions-columnrange--color
plotOptions-columnrange--color.title: color
plotOptions-columnrange--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--inside.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

credits--href.name: credits--href
credits--href.title: href
credits--href.description: The URL for the credits label.

plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--li.name: plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--li.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--li.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-boxplot--pointWidth.name: plotOptions-boxplot--pointWidth
plotOptions-boxplot--pointWidth.title: pointWidth
plotOptions-boxplot--pointWidth.description: A pixel value specifying a fixed width for each column or bar. When null, the width is calculated from the pointPadding and groupPadding.

plotOptions-solidgauge-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-solidgauge-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-solidgauge-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-area-tooltip--followTouchMov.name: plotOptions-area-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-area-tooltip--followTouchMov.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-area-tooltip--followTouchMov.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-boxplot--groupZPadding.name: plotOptions-boxplot--groupZPadding
plotOptions-boxplot--groupZPadding.title: groupZPadding
plotOptions-boxplot--groupZPadding.description: The spacing between columns on the Z Axis in a 3D chart. Requires highcharts-3d.js.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--distance.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--distance
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--distance.title: distance
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--distance.description: The distance of the data label from the pie's edge. Negative numbers put the data label on top of the pie slices. Connectors are only shown for data labels outside the pie.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--rotation.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--rotation.title: rotation
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-gauge-dial--baseWidth.name: plotOptions-gauge-dial--baseWidth
plotOptions-gauge-dial--baseWidth.title: baseWidth
plotOptions-gauge-dial--baseWidth.description: The pixel width of the base of the gauge dial. The base is the part closest to the pivot, defined by baseLength.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

lang--downloadSVG.name: lang--downloadSVG
lang--downloadSVG.title: downloadSVG
lang--downloadSVG.description: Exporting module only. The text for the SVG download menu item.

yAxis-title--text.name: yAxis-title--text
yAxis-title--text.title: text
yAxis-title--text.description: The actual text of the axis title. Horizontal texts can contain HTML, but rotated texts are painted using vector techniques and must be clean text. The Y axis title is disabled by setting the text option to null.

series--id.name: series--id
series--id.title: id
series--id.description: An id for the series. This can be used after render time to get a pointer to the series object through chart.get().

plotOptions-areaspline--animation.name: plotOptions-areaspline--animation
plotOptions-areaspline--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-areaspline--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

title--y.name: title--y
title--y.title: y
title--y.description: The y position of the title relative to the alignment within chart.spacingTop and chart.spacingBottom. By default it depends on the font size.

title--x.name: title--x
title--x.title: x
title--x.description: The x position of the title relative to the alignment within chart.spacingLeft and chart.spacingRight.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--padding.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--padding.title: padding
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--padding.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-area--color.name: plotOptions-area--color
plotOptions-area--color.title: color
plotOptions-area--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-line-marker--height.name: plotOptions-line-marker--height
plotOptions-line-marker--height.title: height
plotOptions-line-marker--height.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

yAxis--ceiling.name: yAxis--ceiling
yAxis--ceiling.title: ceiling
yAxis--ceiling.description: The highest allowed value for automatically computed axis extremes.

plotOptions-bar-tooltip--followPointer.name: plotOptions-bar-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--followPointer.title: followPointer
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--followPointer.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--borderRa.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--borderRa.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--borderRa.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--followTou.name: plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--followTou.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--followTou.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-spline-tooltip--followPointe.name: plotOptions-spline-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--followPointe.title: followPointer
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--followPointe.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-column-tooltip--followPointe.name: plotOptions-column-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-column-tooltip--followPointe.title: followPointer
plotOptions-column-tooltip--followPointe.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover--lineWi.name: plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover--lineWi.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover--lineWi.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-bar--minPointLength.name: plotOptions-bar--minPointLength
plotOptions-bar--minPointLength.title: minPointLength
plotOptions-bar--minPointLength.description: The minimal height for a column or width for a bar. By default, 0 values are not shown. To visualize a 0 (or close to zero) point, set the minimal point length to a  pixel value like 3. In stacked column charts, minPointLength might not be respected for tightly packed values.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--enabl.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--enabl.title: enabled
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--enabl.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-columnrange--animation.name: plotOptions-columnrange--animation
plotOptions-columnrange--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-columnrange--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--shadow.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--shadow.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--inside.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-areaspline--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-areaspline--showInLegend
plotOptions-areaspline--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-areaspline--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--enabled.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

yAxis--startOfWeek.name: yAxis--startOfWeek
yAxis--startOfWeek.title: startOfWeek
yAxis--startOfWeek.description: For datetime axes, this decides where to put the tick between weeks. 0 = Sunday, 1 = Monday.

legend--borderRadius.name: legend--borderRadius
legend--borderRadius.title: borderRadius
legend--borderRadius.description: The border corner radius of the legend.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--xHigh.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--xHigh
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--xHigh.title: xHigh
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--xHigh.description: X offset of the higher data labels relative to the point value.

plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--valueDecimal.name: plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--valueDecimal.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--valueDecimal.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-bar--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-bar--borderWidth
plotOptions-bar--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-bar--borderWidth.description: The width of the border surrounding each column or bar.

noData--attr.name: noData--attr
noData--attr.title: attr
noData--attr.description: An object of additional SVG attributes for the no-data label.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--borderWidth.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--padding.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--padding.title: padding
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--padding.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-funnel--height.name: plotOptions-funnel--height
plotOptions-funnel--height.title: height
plotOptions-funnel--height.description: The height of the funnel or pyramid. If it is a number it defines the pixel height, if it is a percentage string it is the percentage of the plot area height.

plotOptions-polygon-marker--height.name: plotOptions-polygon-marker--height
plotOptions-polygon-marker--height.title: height
plotOptions-polygon-marker--height.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--followPointer.name: plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--followPointer
