plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--followPointer.title: followPointer
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--followPointer.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-spline-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-spline-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--followTouc.name: plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--followTouc.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--followTouc.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--shadow.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--shadow.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--headerForma.name: plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--headerForma.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--headerForma.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--dateTimeLab.name: plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--dateTimeLab.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--dateTimeLab.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--footerFor.name: plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--footerFor.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--footerFor.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-spline-marker--enabled.name: plotOptions-spline-marker--enabled
plotOptions-spline-marker--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-spline-marker--enabled.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--rotation.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--rotation.title: rotation
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.title: radius
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-bar--groupZPadding.name: plotOptions-bar--groupZPadding
plotOptions-bar--groupZPadding.title: groupZPadding
plotOptions-bar--groupZPadding.description: The spacing between columns on the Z Axis in a 3D chart. Requires highcharts-3d.js.

plotOptions-column--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-column--showInLegend
plotOptions-column--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-column--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--inside.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-waterfall-zones--color.name: plotOptions-waterfall-zones--color
plotOptions-waterfall-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-waterfall-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--r.name: plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--radius
plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--r.title: radius
plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--r.description:
The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults
		to the normal state's radius + 2.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.title: enabled
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--padding.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--padding.title: padding
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--padding.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolS.name: exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolStroke
exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolS.title: symbolStroke
exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolS.description: The color of the symbol's stroke or line.

plotOptions-area-tooltip--pointFormat.name: plotOptions-area-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-area-tooltip--pointFormat.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-area-tooltip--pointFormat.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--dashStyle
plotOptions-areasplinerange--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-areasplinerange--dashStyle.description:
A name for the dash style to use for the graph. Applies only to series type having a graph, like line, spline, area and scatter in case it has a lineWidth. The value for the dashStyle include:
  • Solid
  • ShortDash
  • ShortDot
  • ShortDashDot
  • ShortDashDotDot
  • Dot
  • Dash
  • LongDash
  • DashDot
  • LongDashDot
  • LongDashDotDot

plotOptions-area--lineColor.name: plotOptions-area--lineColor
plotOptions-area--lineColor.title: lineColor
plotOptions-area--lineColor.description: A separate color for the graph line. By default the line takes the color of the series, but the lineColor setting allows setting a separate color for the line without altering the fillColor.

chart--showAxes.name: chart--showAxes
chart--showAxes.title: showAxes
chart--showAxes.description: Whether to show the axes initially. This only applies to empty charts where series are added dynamically, as axes are automatically added to cartesian series.

plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--fillColor
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.title: fillColor
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.description: The fill color of the marker in hover state.

colors.name: colors
colors.title: colors
colors.description:
An array containing the default colors for the chart's series. When all colors are used, new colors are pulled from the start again. Defaults to: 

colors: ['#7cb5ec', '#434348', '#90ed7d', '#f7a35c', '#8085e9', 
   '#f15c80', '#e4d354', '#2b908f', '#f45b5b', '#91e8e1']
Default colors can also be set on a series or series.type basis, see column.colors, pie.colors.

Legacy

In Highcharts 3.x, the default colors were: 

colors: ['#2f7ed8', '#0d233a', '#8bbc21', '#910000', '#1aadce', 
   '#492970', '#f28f43', '#77a1e5', '#c42525', '#a6c96a']

In Highcharts 2.x, the default colors were: 

colors: ['#4572A7', '#AA4643', '#89A54E', '#80699B', '#3D96AE', 
   '#DB843D', '#92A8CD', '#A47D7C', '#B5CA92']

plotOptions-polygon--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-polygon--showInLegend
plotOptions-polygon--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-polygon--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

legend--backgroundColor.name: legend--backgroundColor
legend--backgroundColor.title: backgroundColor
legend--backgroundColor.description: The background color of the legend.

plotOptions-area--fillOpacity.name: plotOptions-area--fillOpacity
plotOptions-area--fillOpacity.title: fillOpacity
plotOptions-area--fillOpacity.description: Fill opacity for the area. Note that when you set an explicit fillColor, the fillOpacity is not applied. Instead, you should define the opacity in the fillColor with an rgba color definition.

xAxis--minRange.name: xAxis--minRange
xAxis--minRange.title: minRange
xAxis--minRange.description:
The minimum range to display on this axis. The entire axis will not be allowed to span over a smaller interval than this. For example, for a datetime axis the main unit is milliseconds. If minRange is set to 3600000, you can't zoom in more than to one hour.

The default minRange for the x axis is five times the smallest interval between any of the data points.

On a logarithmic axis, the unit for the minimum range is the power. So a minRange of 1 means that the axis can be zoomed to 10-100, 100-1000, 1000-10000 etc.

plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--footerForma.name: plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--footerForma.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--footerForma.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--xLow.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--xLow
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--xLow.title: xLow
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--xLow.description: X offset of the lower data labels relative to the point value.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--softConne.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--softConnector
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--softConne.title: softConnector
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--softConne.description: Whether to render the connector as a soft arc or a line with sharp break.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--borderColor.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--borderColor.title: borderColor
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--borderColor.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-treemap-levels--borderColor.name: plotOptions-treemap-levels--borderColor
plotOptions-treemap-levels--borderColor.title: borderColor
plotOptions-treemap-levels--borderColor.description: Can set borderColor on all points which lies on the same level.

plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.name: plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.title: lineColor
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker--enabled.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker--enabled
plotOptions-areaspline-marker--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-areaspline-marker--enabled.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.name: plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.description: The additional line width for a hovered point.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.title: symbol
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--ra.name: plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--radius
plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--ra.title: radius
plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--ra.description: The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults to the normal state's radius + 2 as per the radiusPlus option.

plotOptions-gauge--cursor.name: plotOptions-gauge--cursor
plotOptions-gauge--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-gauge--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--yHig.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--yHigh
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--yHig.title: yHigh
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--yHig.description: Y offset of the higher data labels relative to the point value.

exporting-buttons-contextButton--width.name: exporting-buttons-contextButton--width
exporting-buttons-contextButton--width.title: width
exporting-buttons-contextButton--width.description: The pixel width of the button.

plotOptions-bar--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-bar--stickyTracking
plotOptions-bar--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-bar--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series. Defaults to true for line and area type series, but to false for columns, pies etc.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--allo.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--allo.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--allo.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

xAxis--minTickInterval.name: xAxis--minTickInterval
xAxis--minTickInterval.title: minTickInterval
xAxis--minTickInterval.description: The minimum tick interval allowed in axis values. For example on zooming in on an axis with daily data, this can be used to prevent the axis from showing hours. Defaults to the closest distance between two points on the axis.

plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.title: fillColor
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--wi.name: plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--wi.title: width
plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--wi.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--li.name: plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--lineColor
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--li.title: lineColor
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--li.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.title: lineColor
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-boxplot--edgeWidth.name: plotOptions-boxplot--edgeWidth
plotOptions-boxplot--edgeWidth.title: edgeWidth
plotOptions-boxplot--edgeWidth.description: 3D columns only. The width of the colored edges.

lang--contextButtonTitle.name: lang--contextButtonTitle
lang--contextButtonTitle.title: contextButtonTitle
lang--contextButtonTitle.description: Exporting module menu. The tooltip title for the context menu holding print and export menu items.

plotOptions-columnrange--borderRadius.name: plotOptions-columnrange--borderRadius
plotOptions-columnrange--borderRadius.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-columnrange--borderRadius.description: The corner radius of the border surrounding each column or bar.

plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--dateTimeLab.name: plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--dateTimeLab.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--dateTimeLab.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

yAxis-stackLabels--textAlign.name: yAxis-stackLabels--textAlign
yAxis-stackLabels--textAlign.title: textAlign
yAxis-stackLabels--textAlign.description: The text alignment for the label. While align determines where the texts anchor point is placed with regards to the stack, textAlign determines how the text is aligned against its anchor point. Possible values are "left", "center" and "right". The default value is calculated at runtime and depends on orientation and whether the stack is positive or negative.

data--googleSpreadsheetWorksheet.name: data--googleSpreadsheetWorksheet
data--googleSpreadsheetWorksheet.title: googleSpreadsheetWorksheet
data--googleSpreadsheetWorksheet.description: The Google Spreadsheet worksheet to use in combination with googleSpreadsheetKey. The available id's from your sheet can be read from https://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds/worksheets/{key}/public/basic

plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.title: height
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hover--fillColor
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.title: fillColor
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.description: The fill color of the marker in hover state.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-waterfall--visible.name: plotOptions-waterfall--visible
plotOptions-waterfall--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-waterfall--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.title: symbol
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-pie--animation.name: plotOptions-pie--animation
plotOptions-pie--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-pie--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

yAxis--minorGridLineDashStyle.name: yAxis--minorGridLineDashStyle
yAxis--minorGridLineDashStyle.title: minorGridLineDashStyle
yAxis--minorGridLineDashStyle.description: The dash or dot style of the minor grid lines. For possible values, see this demonstration.

plotOptions-pyramid--selected.name: plotOptions-pyramid--selected
plotOptions-pyramid--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-pyramid--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

data--endRow.name: data--endRow
data--endRow.title: endRow
data--endRow.description: In tabular input data, the last row (indexed by 0) to use. Defaults to the last row containing data.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--backgr.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--backgr.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--backgr.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-columnrange-zones--value.name: plotOptions-columnrange-zones--value
plotOptions-columnrange-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-columnrange-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-arearange-states-hover--line.name: plotOptions-arearange-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover--line.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover--line.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-column--edgeColor.name: plotOptions-column--edgeColor
plotOptions-column--edgeColor.title: edgeColor
plotOptions-column--edgeColor.description: 3D columns only. The color of the edges. Similar to borderColor, except it defaults to the same color as the column.

plotOptions-scatter-states-hover--lineWi.name: plotOptions-scatter-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover--lineWi.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover--lineWi.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

tooltip--animation.name: tooltip--animation
tooltip--animation.title: animation
tooltip--animation.description: Enable or disable animation of the tooltip. In slow legacy IE browsers the animation is disabled by default.

plotOptions-line-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-line-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-line-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-line-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-series-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-series-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-series-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-series-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

yAxis--minorTickColor.name: yAxis--minorTickColor
yAxis--minorTickColor.title: minorTickColor
yAxis--minorTickColor.description: Color for the minor tick marks.

plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--xDateFormat.name: plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--xDateFormat.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--xDateFormat.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--vertical.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--vertical.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--vertical.description: The vertical alignment of a data label. Can be one of top, middle or bottom. The default value depends on the data, for instance in a column chart, the label is above positive values and below negative values.

plotOptions-series-marker--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-series-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-series-marker--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-series-marker--lineWidth.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-line-states-hover-halo--size.name: plotOptions-line-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-line-states-hover-halo--size.title: size
plotOptions-line-states-hover-halo--size.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--pointFor.name: plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--pointFor.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--pointFor.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

yAxis--reversed.name: yAxis--reversed
yAxis--reversed.title: reversed
yAxis--reversed.description: Whether to reverse the axis so that the highest number is closest to the origin. If the chart is inverted, the x axis is reversed by default.

xAxis--minorGridLineColor.name: xAxis--minorGridLineColor
xAxis--minorGridLineColor.title: minorGridLineColor
xAxis--minorGridLineColor.description: Color of the minor, secondary grid lines.

yAxis--minorTickWidth.name: yAxis--minorTickWidth
yAxis--minorTickWidth.title: minorTickWidth
yAxis--minorTickWidth.description: The pixel width of the minor tick mark.

plotOptions-spline-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-spline-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

legend--lineHeight.name: legend--lineHeight
legend--lineHeight.title: lineHeight
legend--lineHeight.description: Line height for the legend items. Deprecated as of 2.1. Instead, the line height for each  item can be set using itemStyle.lineHeight, and the padding between items using itemMarginTop and itemMarginBottom.

plotOptions-heatmap--colors.name: plotOptions-heatmap--colors
plotOptions-heatmap--colors.title: colors
plotOptions-heatmap--colors.description: A series specific or series type specific color set to apply instead of the global colors when colorByPoint is true.

plotOptions-column--shadow.name: plotOptions-column--shadow
plotOptions-column--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-column--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the graph line. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-columnrange--grouping.name: plotOptions-columnrange--grouping
plotOptions-columnrange--grouping.title: grouping
plotOptions-columnrange--grouping.description: Whether to group non-stacked columns or to let them render independent of each other. Non-grouped columns will be laid out individually and overlap each other.

plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.title: lineColor
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-treemap--levelIsConstant.name: plotOptions-treemap--levelIsConstant
plotOptions-treemap--levelIsConstant.title: levelIsConstant
plotOptions-treemap--levelIsConstant.description: Used together with the levels and allowDrillToNode options. When set to false the first level visible when drilling is considered to be level one. Otherwise the level will be the same as the tree structure.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--borderColo.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--borderColo.title: borderColor
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--borderColo.description: The border color for the data label.

plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.title: enabled
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

xAxis-labels--distance.name: xAxis-labels--distance
xAxis-labels--distance.title: distance
xAxis-labels--distance.description: Polar charts only. The label's pixel distance from the perimeter of the plot area.

plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.title: height
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--headerForm.name: plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--headerForm.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--headerForm.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.title: symbol
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--yLow
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: yLow
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: Y offset of the lower data labels relative to the point value.

plotOptions-columnrange--depth.name: plotOptions-columnrange--depth
plotOptions-columnrange--depth.title: depth
plotOptions-columnrange--depth.description: Depth of the columns in a 3D column chart. Requires highcharts-3d.js.

navigation-buttonOptions--symbolSize.name: navigation-buttonOptions--symbolSize
navigation-buttonOptions--symbolSize.title: symbolSize
navigation-buttonOptions--symbolSize.description: The pixel size of the symbol on the button.

plotOptions-column-states-hover--lineWid.name: plotOptions-column-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-column-states-hover--lineWid.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-column-states-hover--lineWid.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--zIndex.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--zIndex.title: zIndex
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--zIndex.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

navigation-buttonOptions--theme.name: navigation-buttonOptions--theme
navigation-buttonOptions--theme.title: theme
navigation-buttonOptions--theme.description: A configuration object for the button theme. The object accepts SVG properties like stroke-width, stroke and fill. Tri-state button styles are supported by the states.hover and states.select objects.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--allowOver.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--allowOver.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--allowOver.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--enabled.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--pointFormat.name: plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--pointFormat.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--pointFormat.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--rotation.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--rotation.title: rotation
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--fi.name: plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--fi.title: fillColor
plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--fi.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--enable.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--enable.title: enabled
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--enable.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-gauge--color.name: plotOptions-gauge--color
plotOptions-gauge--color.title: color
plotOptions-gauge--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

yAxis-stackLabels--useHTML.name: yAxis-stackLabels--useHTML
yAxis-stackLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
yAxis-stackLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-columnrange--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-columnrange--showInLegend
plotOptions-columnrange--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-columnrange--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-halo--.name: plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-halo--.title: attributes
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-halo--.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

exporting--filename.name: exporting--filename
exporting--filename.title: filename
exporting--filename.description: The filename, without extension, to use for the exported chart.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--verticalA.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--verticalA.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--verticalA.description: The vertical alignment of a data label. Can be one of top, middle or bottom. The default value depends on the data, for instance in a column chart, the label is above positive values and below negative values.

plotOptions-treemap-levels--layoutAlgori.name: plotOptions-treemap-levels--layoutAlgorithm
plotOptions-treemap-levels--layoutAlgori.title: layoutAlgorithm
plotOptions-treemap-levels--layoutAlgori.description: Can set the layoutAlgorithm option on a specific level.

plotOptions-line-tooltip--pointFormat.name: plotOptions-line-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-line-tooltip--pointFormat.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-line-tooltip--pointFormat.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover--enable.name: plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover--enable.title: enabled
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover--enable.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--borderWidth.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--footerForma.name: plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--footerForma.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--footerForma.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-bubble--enableMouseTracking.name: plotOptions-bubble--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-bubble--enableMouseTracking.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-bubble--enableMouseTracking.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-errorbar--negativeColor.name: plotOptions-errorbar--negativeColor
plotOptions-errorbar--negativeColor.title: negativeColor
plotOptions-errorbar--negativeColor.description: The color for the parts of the graph or points that are below the threshold.

plotOptions-line--animation.name: plotOptions-line--animation
plotOptions-line--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-line--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-columnrange--pointPadding.name: plotOptions-columnrange--pointPadding
plotOptions-columnrange--pointPadding.title: pointPadding
plotOptions-columnrange--pointPadding.description: Padding between each column or bar, in x axis units.

plotOptions-scatter--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-scatter--stickyTracking
plotOptions-scatter--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-scatter--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--rotat.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--rotat.title: rotation
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--rotat.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-heatmap-zones--color.name: plotOptions-heatmap-zones--color
plotOptions-heatmap-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-heatmap-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--visible.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--visible
plotOptions-areasplinerange--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-areasplinerange--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

yAxis--minorGridLineWidth.name: yAxis--minorGridLineWidth
yAxis--minorGridLineWidth.title: minorGridLineWidth
yAxis--minorGridLineWidth.description: Width of the minor, secondary grid lines.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--zIndex.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--zIndex.title: zIndex
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--zIndex.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

plotOptions-pyramid-zones--value.name: plotOptions-pyramid-zones--value
plotOptions-pyramid-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-pyramid-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--padding.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--padding.title: padding
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--padding.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-bubble--cursor.name: plotOptions-bubble--cursor
plotOptions-bubble--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-bubble--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--align.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--align
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--align.title: align
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--align.description: The alignment of the data label compared to the point. If right, the right side of the label should be touching the point. For points with an extent, like columns, the alignments also dictates how to align it inside the box, as given with the inside option. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right".

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--borderRa.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--borderRa.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--borderRa.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.title: width
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-heatmap--rowsize.name: plotOptions-heatmap--rowsize
plotOptions-heatmap--rowsize.title: rowsize
plotOptions-heatmap--rowsize.description: The row size - how many Y axis units each heatmap row should span.

plotOptions-waterfall-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-waterfall-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-waterfall-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-waterfall-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--xDateForma.name: plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--xDateForma.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--xDateForma.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--xDateFormat.name: plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--xDateFormat.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--xDateFormat.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-bubble--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-bubble--lineWidth
plotOptions-bubble--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-bubble--lineWidth.description: The width of the line connecting the data points.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.title: fillColor
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-line-marker--fillColor.name: plotOptions-line-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-line-marker--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-line-marker--fillColor.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.description: The additional line width for a hovered point.

plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--headerFor.name: plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--headerFor.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--headerFor.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

legend-navigation--inactiveColor.name: legend-navigation--inactiveColor
legend-navigation--inactiveColor.title: inactiveColor
legend-navigation--inactiveColor.description: The color of the inactive up or down arrow in the legend page navigation.  .

yAxis--min.name: yAxis--min
yAxis--min.title: min
yAxis--min.description: The minimum value of the axis. If null the min value is automatically calculated. If the startOnTick option is true, the min value might be rounded down.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

xAxis--tickPosition.name: xAxis--tickPosition
xAxis--tickPosition.title: tickPosition
xAxis--tickPosition.description: The position of the major tick marks relative to the axis line. Can be one of inside and outside.

plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.title: lineColor
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

navigation-buttonOptions--symbolX.name: navigation-buttonOptions--symbolX
navigation-buttonOptions--symbolX.title: symbolX
navigation-buttonOptions--symbolX.description: The x position of the center of the symbol inside the button.

plotOptions-treemap-zones--color.name: plotOptions-treemap-zones--color
plotOptions-treemap-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-treemap-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

navigation-buttonOptions--symbolY.name: navigation-buttonOptions--symbolY
navigation-buttonOptions--symbolY.title: symbolY
navigation-buttonOptions--symbolY.description: The y position of the center of the symbol inside the button.

plotOptions-bubble-zones--color.name: plotOptions-bubble-zones--color
plotOptions-bubble-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-bubble-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-gauge--selected.name: plotOptions-gauge--selected
plotOptions-gauge--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-gauge--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-series-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.name: plotOptions-series-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-series-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-series-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-bubble-marker--height.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker--height
plotOptions-bubble-marker--height.title: height
plotOptions-bubble-marker--height.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--inside.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--xDateFor.name: plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--xDateFor.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--xDateFor.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-arearange--animation.name: plotOptions-arearange--animation
plotOptions-arearange--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-arearange--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

plotOptions-column--edgeWidth.name: plotOptions-column--edgeWidth
plotOptions-column--edgeWidth.title: edgeWidth
plotOptions-column--edgeWidth.description: 3D columns only. The width of the colored edges.

xAxis-title--offset.name: xAxis-title--offset
xAxis-title--offset.title: offset
xAxis-title--offset.description: The distance of the axis title from the axis line. By default, this distance is  computed from the offset width of the labels, the labels' distance from  the axis and the title's margin. However when the offset option is set, it overrides all this.

plotOptions-line--connectNulls.name: plotOptions-line--connectNulls
plotOptions-line--connectNulls.title: connectNulls
plotOptions-line--connectNulls.description: Whether to connect a graph line across null points.

yAxis--gridLineWidth.name: yAxis--gridLineWidth
yAxis--gridLineWidth.title: gridLineWidth
yAxis--gridLineWidth.description: The width of the grid lines extending the ticks across the plot area.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-pie--colors.name: plotOptions-pie--colors
plotOptions-pie--colors.title: colors
plotOptions-pie--colors.description: A series specific or series type specific color set to use instead of the global colors.

plotOptions-errorbar--pointWidth.name: plotOptions-errorbar--pointWidth
plotOptions-errorbar--pointWidth.title: pointWidth
plotOptions-errorbar--pointWidth.description: A pixel value specifying a fixed width for each column or bar. When null, the width is calculated from the pointPadding and groupPadding.

plotOptions-spline--visible.name: plotOptions-spline--visible
plotOptions-spline--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-spline--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

plotOptions-areaspline--shadow.name: plotOptions-areaspline--shadow
plotOptions-areaspline--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-areaspline--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the graph line. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--dateTimeLab.name: plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--dateTimeLab.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--dateTimeLab.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-gauge--visible.name: plotOptions-gauge--visible
plotOptions-gauge--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-gauge--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

title--margin.name: title--margin
title--margin.title: margin
title--margin.description: The margin between the title and the plot area, or if a subtitle is present, the margin between the subtitle and the plot area.

xAxis--units.name: xAxis--units
xAxis--units.title: units

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--yHigh.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--yHigh
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--yHigh.title: yHigh
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--yHigh.description: Y offset of the higher data labels relative to the point value.

plotOptions-area--pointStart.name: plotOptions-area--pointStart
plotOptions-area--pointStart.title: pointStart
plotOptions-area--pointStart.description: If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointStart defines on what value to start. For example, if a series contains one yearly value starting from 1945, set pointStart to 1945.

plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-halo.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-halo.title: size
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-halo.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-scatter--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-scatter--linkedTo
plotOptions-scatter--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-scatter--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-line--stacking.name: plotOptions-line--stacking
plotOptions-line--stacking.title: stacking
plotOptions-line--stacking.description: Whether to stack the values of each series on top of each other. Possible values are null to disable, "normal" to stack by value or "percent".

plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--pointFormat.name: plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--pointFormat.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--pointFormat.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-columnrange-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-columnrange-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-columnrange-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-columnrange-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--rotation.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--rotation.title: rotation
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--rotat.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--rotat.title: rotation
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--rotat.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

yAxis--startOnTick.name: yAxis--startOnTick
yAxis--startOnTick.title: startOnTick
yAxis--startOnTick.description: Whether to force the axis to start on a tick. Use this option with the maxPadding option to control the axis start.

plotOptions-scatter--threshold.name: plotOptions-scatter--threshold
plotOptions-scatter--threshold.title: threshold
plotOptions-scatter--threshold.description: The threshold, also called zero level or base level. For line type series this is only used in conjunction with negativeColor.

plotOptions-scatter--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-scatter--showCheckbox
plotOptions-scatter--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-scatter--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--borderWidth.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover--lineW.name: plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover--lineW.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover--lineW.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.name: plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-columnrange--minPointLength.name: plotOptions-columnrange--minPointLength
plotOptions-columnrange--minPointLength.title: minPointLength
plotOptions-columnrange--minPointLength.description: The minimal height for a column or width for a bar. By default, 0 values are not shown. To visualize a 0 (or close to zero) point, set the minimal point length to a  pixel value like 3. In stacked column charts, minPointLength might not be respected for tightly packed values.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--borderCo.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--borderCo.title: borderColor
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--borderCo.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.name: plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--dateTimeLabe.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.name: plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.title: height
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-line--shadow.name: plotOptions-line--shadow
plotOptions-line--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-line--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the graph line. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-area--stacking.name: plotOptions-area--stacking
plotOptions-area--stacking.title: stacking
plotOptions-area--stacking.description: Whether to stack the values of each series on top of each other. Possible values are null to disable, "normal" to stack by value or "percent".

plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-halo-.name: plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-halo-.title: attributes
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-halo-.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--zIndex.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--zIndex.title: zIndex
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--zIndex.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--borde.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--borde.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--borde.description: The border width in pixels for the gauge data label.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-sel.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-select--lineColor
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-sel.title: lineColor
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-sel.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-bar-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFo.name: plotOptions-bar-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFo.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFo.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-line-marker--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-line-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-line-marker--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-line-marker--lineWidth.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--followPoint.name: plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--followPoint.title: followPointer
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--followPoint.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--fi.name: plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--fillColor
plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--fi.title: fillColor
plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--fi.description: The fill color of the marker in hover state.

plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--followTouchMo.name: plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--followTouchMo.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--followTouchMo.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover--ena.name: plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover--ena.title: enabled
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover--ena.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: borderColor
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select--lineWidth
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-areaspline--negativeFillColo.name: plotOptions-areaspline--negativeFillColor
plotOptions-areaspline--negativeFillColo.title: negativeFillColor
plotOptions-areaspline--negativeFillColo.description: A separate color for the negative part of the area.

plotOptions-bubble-zones--value.name: plotOptions-bubble-zones--value
plotOptions-bubble-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-bubble-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--border.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--border.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--border.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-polygon--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-polygon--zoneAxis
plotOptions-polygon--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-polygon--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-series--cropThreshold.name: plotOptions-series--cropThreshold
plotOptions-series--cropThreshold.title: cropThreshold
plotOptions-series--cropThreshold.description: When the series contains less points than the crop threshold, all points are drawn,  event if the points fall outside the visible plot area at the current zoom. The advantage of drawing all points (including markers and columns), is that animation is performed on updates. On the other hand, when the series contains more points than the crop threshold, the series data is cropped to only contain points that fall within the plot area. The advantage of cropping away invisible points is to increase performance on large series.  .

plotOptions-waterfall--enableMouseTracki.name: plotOptions-waterfall--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-waterfall--enableMouseTracki.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-waterfall--enableMouseTracki.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-boxplot--edgeColor.name: plotOptions-boxplot--edgeColor
plotOptions-boxplot--edgeColor.title: edgeColor
plotOptions-boxplot--edgeColor.description: 3D columns only. The color of the edges. Similar to borderColor, except it defaults to the same color as the column.

plotOptions-funnel--cursor.name: plotOptions-funnel--cursor
plotOptions-funnel--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-funnel--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

yAxis--lineWidth.name: yAxis--lineWidth
yAxis--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
yAxis--lineWidth.description: The width of the line marking the axis itself.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--shadow.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--shadow.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-pie--shadow.name: plotOptions-pie--shadow
plotOptions-pie--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-pie--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the graph line. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--vertical.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--vertical.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--vertical.description: The vertical alignment of a data label. Can be one of top, middle or bottom. The default value depends on the data, for instance in a column chart, the label is above positive values and below negative values.

plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-halo--s.name: plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-halo--s.title: size
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-halo--s.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

yAxis--maxColor.name: yAxis--maxColor
yAxis--maxColor.title: maxColor
yAxis--maxColor.description: Solid gauge only. Unless stops are set, the color to represent the maximum value of the Y axis.

plotOptions-bar--pointIntervalUnit.name: plotOptions-bar--pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-bar--pointIntervalUnit.title: pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-bar--pointIntervalUnit.description: On datetime series, this allows for setting the pointInterval to the two irregular time units, month and year. Combine it with pointInterval to draw quarters, 6 months, 10 years etc.

chart--spacingLeft.name: chart--spacingLeft
chart--spacingLeft.title: spacingLeft
chart--spacingLeft.description: The space between the left edge of the chart and the content (plot area, axis title and labels, title, subtitle or legend in top position).

xAxis--alternateGridColor.name: xAxis--alternateGridColor
xAxis--alternateGridColor.title: alternateGridColor
xAxis--alternateGridColor.description: When using an alternate grid color, a band is painted across the plot area between every other grid line.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--zInde.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--zInde.title: zIndex
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--zInde.description: The Z index of the data labels. A value of 2 display them behind the dial.

yAxis--gridLineColor.name: yAxis--gridLineColor
yAxis--gridLineColor.title: gridLineColor
yAxis--gridLineColor.description: Color of the grid lines extending the ticks across the plot area.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--footerForma.name: plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--footerForma.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--footerForma.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-bar--animation.name: plotOptions-bar--animation
plotOptions-bar--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-bar--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object.
