Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--form.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--form.title: format
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--form.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-bar-states-hover-halo--opaci.name: plotOptions-bar-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-bar-states-hover-halo--opaci.title: opacity
plotOptions-bar-states-hover-halo--opaci.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

chart--alignTicks.name: chart--alignTicks
chart--alignTicks.title: alignTicks
chart--alignTicks.description: When using multiple axis, the ticks of two or more opposite axes will automatically be aligned by adding ticks to the axis or axes with the least ticks. This can be prevented by setting alignTicks to false. If the grid lines look messy, it's a good idea to hide them for the secondary axis by setting gridLineWidth to 0.

plotOptions-heatmap--visible.name: plotOptions-heatmap--visible
plotOptions-heatmap--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-heatmap--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

chart--inverted.name: chart--inverted
chart--inverted.title: inverted
chart--inverted.description: Whether to invert the axes so that the x axis is vertical and y axis is horizontal. When true, the x axis is reversed by default. If a bar series is present in the chart, it will be inverted automatically.

navigation-buttonOptions--symbolStroke.name: navigation-buttonOptions--symbolStroke
navigation-buttonOptions--symbolStroke.title: symbolStroke
navigation-buttonOptions--symbolStroke.description: The color of the symbol's stroke or line.

plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.title: symbol
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-series-marker--fillColor.name: plotOptions-series-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-series-marker--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-series-marker--fillColor.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--li.name: plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--li.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--li.description: The additional line width for a hovered point.

plotOptions-series--connectEnds.name: plotOptions-series--connectEnds
plotOptions-series--connectEnds.title: connectEnds
plotOptions-series--connectEnds.description: Polar charts only. Whether to connect the ends of a line series plot across the extremes.

plotOptions-arearange-states-hover--line.name: plotOptions-arearange-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover--line.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover--line.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--selected.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--selected
plotOptions-areasplinerange--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-areasplinerange--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.title: symbol
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-polygon--animation.name: plotOptions-polygon--animation
plotOptions-polygon--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-polygon--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--valueDecimal.name: plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--valueDecimal.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--valueDecimal.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--overf.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--overf.title: overflow
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--overf.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--l.name: plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--l.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--l.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-errorbar-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-errorbar-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-errorbar-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-errorbar-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

xAxis--tickLength.name: xAxis--tickLength
xAxis--tickLength.title: tickLength
xAxis--tickLength.description: The pixel length of the main tick marks.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--fi.name: plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--fillColor
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--fi.title: fillColor
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--fi.description: The fill color of the marker in hover state.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-bubble-marker--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-bubble-marker--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-bubble-marker--lineWidth.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--fol.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--fol.title: followPointer
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--fol.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--inside.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.title: height
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-funnel--minSize.name: plotOptions-funnel--minSize
plotOptions-funnel--minSize.title: minSize
plotOptions-funnel--minSize.description: The minimum size for a pie in response to auto margins. The pie will try to shrink to make room for data labels in side the plot area, but only to this size.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

xAxis--lineWidth.name: xAxis--lineWidth
xAxis--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
xAxis--lineWidth.description: The width of the line marking the axis itself.

xAxis--tickPositions.name: xAxis--tickPositions
xAxis--tickPositions.title: tickPositions
xAxis--tickPositions.description: An array defining where the ticks are laid out on the axis. This overrides the default behaviour of tickPixelInterval and tickInterval.

legend--itemStyle.name: legend--itemStyle
legend--itemStyle.title: itemStyle
legend--itemStyle.description: CSS styles for each legend item. Only a subset of CSS is supported, notably those options related to text.

plotOptions-area-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-area-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-area-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-area-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--padding.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--padding.title: padding
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--padding.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--rotation.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--rotation.title: rotation
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

plotOptions-area--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-area--lineWidth
plotOptions-area--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-area--lineWidth.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--footerForma.name: plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--footerForma.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--footerForma.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

data--csv.name: data--csv
data--csv.title: csv
data--csv.description: A comma delimited string to be parsed. Related options are startRow, endRow, startColumn and endColumn to delimit what part of the table is used. The lineDelimiter and itemDelimiter options define the CSV delimiter formats.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-spline--cropThreshold.name: plotOptions-spline--cropThreshold
plotOptions-spline--cropThreshold.title: cropThreshold
plotOptions-spline--cropThreshold.description: When the series contains less points than the crop threshold, all points are drawn,  event if the points fall outside the visible plot area at the current zoom. The advantage of drawing all points (including markers and columns), is that animation is performed on updates. On the other hand, when the series contains more points than the crop threshold, the series data is cropped to only contain points that fall within the plot area. The advantage of cropping away invisible points is to increase performance on large series.  .

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--backgroundC.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--backgroundC.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--backgroundC.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover--lineWi.name: plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover--lineWi.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover--lineWi.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--ra.name: plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--radius
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--ra.title: radius
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--ra.description: The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults to the normal state's radius + 2 as per the radiusPlus option.

exporting-buttons-contextButton--y.name: exporting-buttons-contextButton--y
exporting-buttons-contextButton--y.title: y
exporting-buttons-contextButton--y.description: The vertical offset of the button's position relative to its verticalAlign. .

plotOptions-funnel--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-funnel--showInLegend
plotOptions-funnel--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-funnel--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. Since 2.1, pies are not shown in the legend by default.

plotOptions-gauge-pivot--radius.name: plotOptions-gauge-pivot--radius
plotOptions-gauge-pivot--radius.title: radius
plotOptions-gauge-pivot--radius.description: The pixel radius of the pivot.

plotOptions-bar-states-hover--lineWidthP.name: plotOptions-bar-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-bar-states-hover--lineWidthP.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-bar-states-hover--lineWidthP.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

exporting-buttons-contextButton--x.name: exporting-buttons-contextButton--x
exporting-buttons-contextButton--x.title: x
exporting-buttons-contextButton--x.description: The horizontal position of the button relative to the align option.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--l.name: plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--lineColor
plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--l.title: lineColor
plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--l.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-waterfall--pointInterval.name: plotOptions-waterfall--pointInterval
plotOptions-waterfall--pointInterval.title: pointInterval
plotOptions-waterfall--pointInterval.description:
If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointInterval defines the interval of the x values. For example, if a series contains one value every decade starting from year 0, set pointInterval to 10.

Since Highcharts 4.1, it can be combined with pointIntervalUnit to draw irregular intervals.

plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--followPo.name: plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--followPo.title: followPointer
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--followPo.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--fillColor.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--fillColor
plotOptions-areasplinerange--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-areasplinerange--fillColor.description: Fill color or gradient for the area. When null, the series' color is used with the series' fillOpacity.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.title: opacity
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--li.name: plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--li.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--li.description: The additional line width for a hovered point.

plotOptions-scatter-marker--height.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker--height
plotOptions-scatter-marker--height.title: height
plotOptions-scatter-marker--height.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

xAxis-labels--staggerLines.name: xAxis-labels--staggerLines
xAxis-labels--staggerLines.title: staggerLines
xAxis-labels--staggerLines.description: Horizontal axes only. The number of lines to spread the labels over to make room or tighter labels.  .

plotOptions-treemap--selected.name: plotOptions-treemap--selected
plotOptions-treemap--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-treemap--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--align
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: align
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: The alignment of the data label compared to the point. If right, the right side of the label should be touching the point. For points with an extent, like columns, the alignments also dictates how to align it inside the box, as given with the inside option. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right".

legend--rtl.name: legend--rtl
legend--rtl.title: rtl
legend--rtl.description: Whether to show the symbol on the right side of the text rather than the left side.  This is common in Arabic and Hebraic.

plotOptions-boxplot--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-boxplot--showInLegend
plotOptions-boxplot--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-boxplot--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.name: plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.title: symbol
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

xAxis--minorTickPosition.name: xAxis--minorTickPosition
xAxis--minorTickPosition.title: minorTickPosition
xAxis--minorTickPosition.description: The position of the minor tick marks relative to the axis line. Can be one of inside and outside.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-treemap--layoutStartingDirec.name: plotOptions-treemap--layoutStartingDirection
plotOptions-treemap--layoutStartingDirec.title: layoutStartingDirection
plotOptions-treemap--layoutStartingDirec.description: Defines which direction the layout algorithm will start drawing. Possible values are "vertical" and "horizontal".

plotOptions-funnel--reversed.name: plotOptions-funnel--reversed
plotOptions-funnel--reversed.title: reversed
plotOptions-funnel--reversed.description: A reversed funnel has the widest area down. A reversed funnel with no neck width and neck height is a pyramid.

plotOptions-bubble--cropThreshold.name: plotOptions-bubble--cropThreshold
plotOptions-bubble--cropThreshold.title: cropThreshold
plotOptions-bubble--cropThreshold.description: When the series contains less points than the crop threshold, all points are drawn,  event if the points fall outside the visible plot area at the current zoom. The advantage of drawing all points (including markers and columns), is that animation is performed on updates. On the other hand, when the series contains more points than the crop threshold, the series data is cropped to only contain points that fall within the plot area. The advantage of cropping away invisible points is to increase performance on large series.  .

plotOptions-arearange--pointIntervalUnit.name: plotOptions-arearange--pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-arearange--pointIntervalUnit.title: pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-arearange--pointIntervalUnit.description: On datetime series, this allows for setting the pointInterval to the two irregular time units, month and year. Combine it with pointInterval to draw quarters, 6 months, 10 years etc.

plotOptions-solidgauge--visible.name: plotOptions-solidgauge--visible
plotOptions-solidgauge--visible.title: visible
plotOptions-solidgauge--visible.description: Set the initial visibility of the series.

plotOptions-line--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-line--zoneAxis
plotOptions-line--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-line--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-spline-marker--width.name: plotOptions-spline-marker--width
plotOptions-spline-marker--width.title: width
plotOptions-spline-marker--width.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker--symbol.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker--symbol
plotOptions-areaspline-marker--symbol.title: symbol
plotOptions-areaspline-marker--symbol.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

title--floating.name: title--floating
title--floating.title: floating
title--floating.description: When the title is floating, the plot area will not move to make space for it.

plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--e.name: plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--enabled
plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--e.title: enabled
plotOptions-area-marker-states-select--e.description: Enable or disable visible feedback for selection.

plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--fillColor
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.title: fillColor
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.description: The fill color of the marker in hover state.

plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-bubble--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-bubble--dashStyle
plotOptions-bubble--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-bubble--dashStyle.description:
A name for the dash style to use for the graph. Applies only to series type having a graph, like line, spline, area and scatter in case it has a lineWidth. The value for the dashStyle include:
  • Solid
  • ShortDash
  • ShortDot
  • ShortDashDot
  • ShortDashDotDot
  • Dot
  • Dash
  • LongDash
  • DashDot
  • LongDashDot
  • LongDashDotDot

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--backgrou.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--backgrou.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--backgrou.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--enabled.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

yAxis-labels--step.name: yAxis-labels--step
yAxis-labels--step.title: step
yAxis-labels--step.description:
To show only every n'th label on the axis, set the step to n. Setting the step to 2 shows every other label.

By default, the step is calculated automatically to avoid overlap. To prevent this, set it to 1. This usually only happens on a category axis, and is often a sign that you have chosen the wrong axis type. Read more at Axis docs => What axis should I use?

yAxis-title--style.name: yAxis-title--style
yAxis-title--style.title: style
yAxis-title--style.description: CSS styles for the title. When titles are rotated they are rendered using vector graphic techniques and not all styles are applicable.

plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.name: plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.title: enabled
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-hover-.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--followTouch.name: plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--followTouch.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--followTouch.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--pointStart.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--pointStart
plotOptions-areasplinerange--pointStart.title: pointStart
plotOptions-areasplinerange--pointStart.description: If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointStart defines on what value to start. For example, if a series contains one yearly value starting from 1945, set pointStart to 1945.

plotOptions-arearange--fillColor.name: plotOptions-arearange--fillColor
plotOptions-arearange--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-arearange--fillColor.description: Fill color or gradient for the area. When null, the series' color is used with the series' fillOpacity.

plotOptions-errorbar--stemDashStyle.name: plotOptions-errorbar--stemDashStyle
plotOptions-errorbar--stemDashStyle.title: stemDashStyle
plotOptions-errorbar--stemDashStyle.description: The dash style of the stem, the vertical line extending from the box to the whiskers.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--borderRa.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--borderRa.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--borderRa.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-series--color.name: plotOptions-series--color
plotOptions-series--color.title: color
plotOptions-series--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-columnrange--edgeColor.name: plotOptions-columnrange--edgeColor
plotOptions-columnrange--edgeColor.title: edgeColor
plotOptions-columnrange--edgeColor.description: 3D columns only. The color of the edges. Similar to borderColor, except it defaults to the same color as the column.

plotOptions-funnel--allowPointSelect.name: plotOptions-funnel--allowPointSelect
plotOptions-funnel--allowPointSelect.title: allowPointSelect
plotOptions-funnel--allowPointSelect.description: Allow this series' points to be selected by clicking on the markers, bars or pie slices.

plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover--li.name: plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover--li.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover--li.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--trackByArea.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--trackByArea
plotOptions-areasplinerange--trackByArea.title: trackByArea
plotOptions-areasplinerange--trackByArea.description: Whether the whole area or just the line should respond to mouseover tooltips and other mouse or touch events.

plotOptions-pie-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-pie-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--hideDel.name: plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--hideDel.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--hideDel.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: shadow
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--l.name: plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--l.title: lineColor
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--l.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

yAxis--tickmarkPlacement.name: yAxis--tickmarkPlacement
yAxis--tickmarkPlacement.title: tickmarkPlacement
yAxis--tickmarkPlacement.description: For categorized axes only. If on the tick mark is placed in the center of the category, if between the tick mark is placed between categories. The default is between if the tickInterval is 1, else on.

plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.name: plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.title: enabled
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-spline-marker--radius.name: plotOptions-spline-marker--radius
plotOptions-spline-marker--radius.title: radius
plotOptions-spline-marker--radius.description: The radius of the point marker.

lang--decimalPoint.name: lang--decimalPoint
lang--decimalPoint.title: decimalPoint
lang--decimalPoint.description: The default decimal point used in the Highcharts.numberFormat method unless otherwise specified in the function arguments.

plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.title: enabled
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.title: enabled
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

yAxis-labels--distance.name: yAxis-labels--distance
yAxis-labels--distance.title: distance
yAxis-labels--distance.description: Angular gauges and solid gauges only. The label's pixel distance from the perimeter of the plot area.

plotOptions-line--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-line--showCheckbox
plotOptions-line--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-line--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--shadow.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--shadow.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-bar--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-bar--showInLegend
plotOptions-bar--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-bar--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select-.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select--lineColor
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select-.title: lineColor
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select-.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-heatmap--shadow.name: plotOptions-heatmap--shadow
plotOptions-heatmap--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-heatmap--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the graph line. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-polygon--pointStart.name: plotOptions-polygon--pointStart
plotOptions-polygon--pointStart.title: pointStart
plotOptions-polygon--pointStart.description: If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointStart defines on what value to start. For example, if a series contains one yearly value starting from 1945, set pointStart to 1945.

plotOptions-gauge-states-hover--enabled.name: plotOptions-gauge-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover--enabled.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-halo--a.name: plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-halo--a.title: attributes
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-halo--a.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-spline-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-spline-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-spline-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-spline-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

xAxis--gridZIndex.name: xAxis--gridZIndex
xAxis--gridZIndex.title: gridZIndex
xAxis--gridZIndex.description: The Z index of the grid lines.

plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.name: plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.title: radius
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-halo--s.name: plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-halo--s.title: size
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-halo--s.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.name: plotOptions-series-marker-states-select--lineWidth
plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.name: plotOptions-series-marker-states-select--radius
plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.title: radius
plotOptions-series-marker-states-select-.description:
The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults
		to the normal state's radius + 2.

plotOptions-series--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-series--showInLegend
plotOptions-series--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-series--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--dateTime.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--dateTime.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--dateTime.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

xAxis--minorTickWidth.name: xAxis--minorTickWidth
xAxis--minorTickWidth.title: minorTickWidth
xAxis--minorTickWidth.description: The pixel width of the minor tick mark.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--overf.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--overf.title: overflow
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--overf.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-series--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-series--zoneAxis
plotOptions-series--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-series--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--hideDela.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--hideDela.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--hideDela.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--colo.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--colo.title: color
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--colo.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-heatmap--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-heatmap--linkedTo
plotOptions-heatmap--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-heatmap--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-boxplot--pointRange.name: plotOptions-boxplot--pointRange
plotOptions-boxplot--pointRange.title: pointRange
plotOptions-boxplot--pointRange.description: The X axis range that each point is valid for. This determines the width of the column. On a categorized axis, the range will be 1 by default (one category unit). On linear and datetime axes, the range will be computed as the distance between the two closest data points.

plotOptions-gauge--negativeColor.name: plotOptions-gauge--negativeColor
plotOptions-gauge--negativeColor.title: negativeColor
plotOptions-gauge--negativeColor.description: The color for the parts of the graph or points that are below the threshold.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--verticalA.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--verticalA.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--verticalA.description: The vertical alignment of a data label. Can be one of top, middle or bottom. The default value depends on the data, for instance in a column chart, the label is above positive values and below negative values.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--shadow.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--shadow.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-series-states-hover-halo--si.name: plotOptions-series-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-series-states-hover-halo--si.title: size
plotOptions-series-states-hover-halo--si.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

navigation-buttonOptions--symbolFill.name: navigation-buttonOptions--symbolFill
navigation-buttonOptions--symbolFill.title: symbolFill
navigation-buttonOptions--symbolFill.description: Fill color for the symbol within the button.

chart--selectionMarkerFill.name: chart--selectionMarkerFill
chart--selectionMarkerFill.title: selectionMarkerFill
chart--selectionMarkerFill.description: The background color of the marker square when selecting (zooming in on) an area of the chart.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

yAxis-title--margin.name: yAxis-title--margin
yAxis-title--margin.title: margin
yAxis-title--margin.description: The pixel distance between the axis labels and the title. Positive values are outside the axis line, negative are inside.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--stickyTrack.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--stickyTracking
plotOptions-areasplinerange--stickyTrack.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-areasplinerange--stickyTrack.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series. Defaults to true for line and area type series, but to false for columns, pies etc.

data--itemDelimiter.name: data--itemDelimiter
data--itemDelimiter.title: itemDelimiter
data--itemDelimiter.description: Item or cell delimiter for parsing CSV. Defaults to the tab character \t if a tab character is found in the CSV string, if not it defaults to ,.

plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.name: plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.title: enabled
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-marke.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-columnrange--groupZPadding.name: plotOptions-columnrange--groupZPadding
plotOptions-columnrange--groupZPadding.title: groupZPadding
plotOptions-columnrange--groupZPadding.description: The spacing between columns on the Z Axis in a 3D chart. Requires highcharts-3d.js.

plotOptions-treemap-zones--value.name: plotOptions-treemap-zones--value
plotOptions-treemap-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-treemap-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--animation.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--animation
plotOptions-areasplinerange--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-areasplinerange--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: color
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

xAxis--showFirstLabel.name: xAxis--showFirstLabel
xAxis--showFirstLabel.title: showFirstLabel
xAxis--showFirstLabel.description: Whether to show the first tick label.

plotOptions-column--stacking.name: plotOptions-column--stacking
plotOptions-column--stacking.title: stacking
plotOptions-column--stacking.description: Whether to stack the values of each series on top of each other. Possible values are null to disable, "normal" to stack by value or "percent".

plotOptions-treemap-states-hover--lineWi.name: plotOptions-treemap-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover--lineWi.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover--lineWi.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--followPoint.name: plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--followPoint.title: followPointer
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--followPoint.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--xDateFormat.name: plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--xDateFormat.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--xDateFormat.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--useHTM.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--useHTM.title: useHTML
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--useHTM.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-columnrange--borderColor.name: plotOptions-columnrange--borderColor
plotOptions-columnrange--borderColor.title: borderColor
plotOptions-columnrange--borderColor.description: The color of the border surrounding each column or bar.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--enab.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--enab.title: enabled
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--enab.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--borderWid.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--borderWid.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--borderWid.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-series--pointIntervalUnit.name: plotOptions-series--pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-series--pointIntervalUnit.title: pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-series--pointIntervalUnit.description: On datetime series, this allows for setting the pointInterval to the two irregular time units, month and year. Combine it with pointInterval to draw quarters, 6 months, 10 years etc.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--negativeFil.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--negativeFillColor
plotOptions-areasplinerange--negativeFil.title: negativeFillColor
plotOptions-areasplinerange--negativeFil.description: A separate color for the negative part of the area.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--borderRadi.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--borderRadi.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--borderRadi.description: The border radius in pixels for the gauge's data label.

plotOptions-column--color.name: plotOptions-column--color
plotOptions-column--color.title: color
plotOptions-column--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-areaspline--fillColor.name: plotOptions-areaspline--fillColor
plotOptions-areaspline--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-areaspline--fillColor.description: Fill color or gradient for the area. When null, the series' color is used with the series' fillOpacity.

plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.name: plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.title: lineColor
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

yAxis--offset.name: yAxis--offset
yAxis--offset.title: offset
yAxis--offset.description: The distance in pixels from the plot area to the axis line. A positive offset moves the axis with it's line, labels and ticks away from the plot area. This is typically used when two or more axes are displayed on the same side of the plot.

plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--followTouch.name: plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--followTouch.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--followTouch.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-errorbar--stemColor.name: plotOptions-errorbar--stemColor
plotOptions-errorbar--stemColor.title: stemColor
plotOptions-errorbar--stemColor.description: The color of the stem, the vertical line extending from the box to the whiskers. If null, the series color is used.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-gauge-dial--baseLength.name: plotOptions-gauge-dial--baseLength
plotOptions-gauge-dial--baseLength.title: baseLength
plotOptions-gauge-dial--baseLength.description: The length of the dial's base part, relative to the total radius or length of the dial.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--verticalA.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--verticalA.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--verticalA.description: The vertical alignment of a data label. Can be one of top, middle or bottom. The default value depends on the data, for instance in a column chart, the label is above positive values and below negative values.

plotOptions-gauge-zones--value.name: plotOptions-gauge-zones--value
plotOptions-gauge-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-gauge-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-columnrange--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-columnrange--linkedTo
plotOptions-columnrange--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-columnrange--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-scatter--selected.name: plotOptions-scatter--selected
plotOptions-scatter--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-scatter--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-pyramid--enableMouseTracking.name: plotOptions-pyramid--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-pyramid--enableMouseTracking.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-pyramid--enableMouseTracking.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

xAxis--offset.name: xAxis--offset
xAxis--offset.title: offset
xAxis--offset.description: The distance in pixels from the plot area to the axis line. A positive offset moves the axis with it's line, labels and ticks away from the plot area. This is typically used when two or more axes are displayed on the same side of the plot.

plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--headerFor.name: plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--headerFor.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--headerFor.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-pie--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-pie--stickyTracking
plotOptions-pie--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-pie--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series.

yAxis--floor.name: yAxis--floor
yAxis--floor.title: floor
yAxis--floor.description: The lowest allowed value for automatically computed axis extremes.

plotOptions-pyramid--cursor.name: plotOptions-pyramid--cursor
plotOptions-pyramid--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-pyramid--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-bar-states-hover--enabled.name: plotOptions-bar-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-bar-states-hover--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-bar-states-hover--enabled.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--connectorWid.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--connectorWidth
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--connectorWid.title: connectorWidth
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--connectorWid.description: The width of the line connecting the data label to the pie slice.

subtitle--x.name: subtitle--x
subtitle--x.title: x
subtitle--x.description: The x position of the subtitle relative to the alignment within chart.spacingLeft and chart.spacingRight.

plotOptions-treemap--color.name: plotOptions-treemap--color
plotOptions-treemap--color.title: color
plotOptions-treemap--color.description: The main color of the series. In heat maps this color is rarely used, as we mostly use the color to denote the value of each point. Unless options are set in the colorAxis, the default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

subtitle--y.name: subtitle--y
subtitle--y.title: y
subtitle--y.description: The y position of the subtitle relative to the alignment within chart.spacingTop and chart.spacingBottom. By default the subtitle is laid out below the title unless the title is floating.

plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--valuePref.name: plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--valuePref.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--valuePref.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

yAxis-labels--zIndex.name: yAxis-labels--zIndex
yAxis-labels--zIndex.title: zIndex
yAxis-labels--zIndex.description: The Z index for the axis labels.

plotOptions-bar-zones--value.name: plotOptions-bar-zones--value
plotOptions-bar-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-bar-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-series-marker--lineColor.name: plotOptions-series-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-series-marker--lineColor.title: lineColor
plotOptions-series-marker--lineColor.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-bubble--sizeBy.name: plotOptions-bubble--sizeBy
plotOptions-bubble--sizeBy.title: sizeBy
plotOptions-bubble--sizeBy.description: Whether the bubble's value should be represented by the area or the width of the bubble. The default, area, corresponds best to the human perception of the size of each bubble.

yAxis--tickColor.name: yAxis--tickColor
yAxis--tickColor.title: tickColor
yAxis--tickColor.description: Color for the main tick marks.

plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-polygon--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-polygon--stickyTracking
plotOptions-polygon--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-polygon--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--insi.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--insi.title: inside
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--insi.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.title: height
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-waterfall--lineColor.name: plotOptions-waterfall--lineColor
plotOptions-waterfall--lineColor.title: lineColor
plotOptions-waterfall--lineColor.description: The color of the line that connects columns in a waterfall series.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--fillC.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--fillC.title: fillColor
plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--fillC.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-solidgauge--animation.name: plotOptions-solidgauge--animation
plotOptions-solidgauge--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-solidgauge--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

xAxis--tickAmount.name: xAxis--tickAmount
xAxis--tickAmount.title: tickAmount
xAxis--tickAmount.description:
The amount of ticks to draw on the axis. This opens up for aligning the ticks of multiple charts or panes within a chart. This option overrides the tickPixelInterval option.

This option only has an effect on linear axes. Datetime, logarithmic or category axes are not affected.

plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.title: lineColor
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-line-tooltip--xDateFormat.name: plotOptions-line-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-line-tooltip--xDateFormat.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-line-tooltip--xDateFormat.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

loading--showDuration.name: loading--showDuration
loading--showDuration.title: showDuration
loading--showDuration.description: The duration in milliseconds of the fade in effect.

plotOptions-boxplot--whiskerWidth.name: plotOptions-boxplot--whiskerWidth
plotOptions-boxplot--whiskerWidth.title: whiskerWidth
plotOptions-boxplot--whiskerWidth.description: The line width of the whiskers, the horizontal lines marking low and high values. When null, the general lineWidth applies.

exporting--url.name: exporting--url
exporting--url.title: url
exporting--url.description: The URL for the server module converting the SVG string to an image format. By default this points to Highslide Software's free web service.

plotOptions-areaspline--negativeColor.name: plotOptions-areaspline--negativeColor
plotOptions-areaspline--negativeColor.title: negativeColor
plotOptions-areaspline--negativeColor.description: The color for the parts of the graph or points that are below the threshold.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--style
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: style
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: Styles for the label.

plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--he.name: plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--he.title: height
plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--he.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-halo--a.name: plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-halo--a.title: attributes
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-halo--a.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

chart-options3d--depth.name: chart-options3d--depth
chart-options3d--depth.title: depth
chart-options3d--depth.description: The total depth of the chart.

plotOptions-pie--ignoreHiddenPoint.name: plotOptions-pie--ignoreHiddenPoint
plotOptions-pie--ignoreHiddenPoint.title: ignoreHiddenPoint
plotOptions-pie--ignoreHiddenPoint.description:
Equivalent to chart.ignoreHiddenSeries, this option tells whether the series shall be redrawn as if the hidden point were null.

The default value changed from false to true with Highcharts 3.0.

plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--li.name: plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--li.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-line-marker-states-hover--li.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-errorbar--groupZPadding.name: plotOptions-errorbar--groupZPadding
plotOptions-errorbar--groupZPadding.title: groupZPadding
plotOptions-errorbar--groupZPadding.description: The spacing between columns on the Z Axis in a 3D chart. Requires highcharts-3d.js.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--valueDecima.name: plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--valueDecima.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--valueDecima.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-boxplot--whiskerColor.name: plotOptions-boxplot--whiskerColor
plotOptions-boxplot--whiskerColor.title: whiskerColor
plotOptions-boxplot--whiskerColor.description: The color of the whiskers, the horizontal lines marking low and high values. When null, the general series color is used.

plotOptions-column--groupZPadding.name: plotOptions-column--groupZPadding
plotOptions-column--groupZPadding.title: groupZPadding
plotOptions-column--groupZPadding.description: The spacing between columns on the Z Axis in a 3D chart. Requires highcharts-3d.js.

plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover--lineWi.name: plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover--lineWi.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover--lineWi.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-arearange-zones--color.name: plotOptions-arearange-zones--color
plotOptions-arearange-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-arearange-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--borderWidt.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--borderWidt.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--borderWidt.description: The border width in pixels for the gauge data label.

plotOptions-column-states-hover--enabled.name: plotOptions-column-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-column-states-hover--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-column-states-hover--enabled.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

subtitle--verticalAlign.name: subtitle--verticalAlign
subtitle--verticalAlign.title: verticalAlign
subtitle--verticalAlign.description: The vertical alignment of the title. Can be one of "top", "middle" and "bottom". When a value is given, the title behaves as floating.

plotOptions-bar--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-bar--zoneAxis
plotOptions-bar--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-bar--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-sel.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-select--lineWidth
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-sel.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-sel.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

yAxis--tickWidth.name: yAxis--tickWidth
yAxis--tickWidth.title: tickWidth
yAxis--tickWidth.description: The pixel width of the major tick marks.

plotOptions-columnrange--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-columnrange--borderWidth
plotOptions-columnrange--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-columnrange--borderWidth.description: The width of the border surrounding each column or bar.

plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover--lineWi.name: plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover--lineWi.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover--lineWi.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--pointForma.name: plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--pointForma.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--pointForma.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

navigation-buttonOptions--symbolStrokeWi.name: navigation-buttonOptions--symbolStrokeWidth
navigation-buttonOptions--symbolStrokeWi.title: symbolStrokeWidth
navigation-buttonOptions--symbolStrokeWi.description: The pixel stroke width of the symbol on the button.

yAxis--minTickInterval.name: yAxis--minTickInterval
yAxis--minTickInterval.title: minTickInterval
yAxis--minTickInterval.description: The minimum tick interval allowed in axis values. For example on zooming in on an axis with daily data, this can be used to prevent the axis from showing hours. Defaults to the closest distance between two points on the axis.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-halo--o.name: plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-halo--o.title: opacity
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-halo--o.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

chart--backgroundColor.name: chart--backgroundColor
chart--backgroundColor.title: backgroundColor
chart--backgroundColor.description: The background color or gradient for the outer chart area.

plotOptions-polygon-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-polygon-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-polygon-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-polygon-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

lang--loading.name: lang--loading
lang--loading.title: loading
lang--loading.description: The loading text that appears when the chart is set into the loading state following a call to chart.showLoading.

plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-waterfall--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-waterfall--showCheckbox
plotOptions-waterfall--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-waterfall--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-column-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-column-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-column-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-column-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--radiusPlus
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--.title: radiusPlus
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--.description: The number of pixels to increase the radius of the hovered point.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--padding.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--padding.title: padding
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--padding.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.title: fillColor
plotOptions-heatmap-states-hover-marker-.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-column--depth.name: plotOptions-column--depth
plotOptions-column--depth.title: depth
plotOptions-column--depth.description: Depth of the columns in a 3D column chart. Requires highcharts-3d.js.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
