plotOptions-column-dataLabels--inside.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--borderRad.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--borderRad.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--borderRad.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

exporting--type.name: exporting--type
exporting--type.title: type
exporting--type.description: Default MIME type for exporting if chart.exportChart() is called without specifying a type option. Possible values are image/png, image/jpeg, application/pdf and image/svg+xml.

plotOptions-pie-zones--color.name: plotOptions-pie-zones--color
plotOptions-pie-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-pie-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-pie-tooltip--pointFormat.name: plotOptions-pie-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--pointFormat.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--pointFormat.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--xDateFormat.name: plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--xDateFormat.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--xDateFormat.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--r.name: plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--radius
plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--r.title: radius
plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--r.description:
The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults
		to the normal state's radius + 2.

plotOptions-pyramid--center.name: plotOptions-pyramid--center
plotOptions-pyramid--center.title: center
plotOptions-pyramid--center.description: The center of the series. By default, it is centered in the middle of the plot area, so it fills the plot area height.

legend--itemMarginBottom.name: legend--itemMarginBottom
legend--itemMarginBottom.title: itemMarginBottom
legend--itemMarginBottom.description: The pixel bottom margin for each legend item.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--allowOve.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--allowOve.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--allowOve.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

xAxis--tickmarkPlacement.name: xAxis--tickmarkPlacement
xAxis--tickmarkPlacement.title: tickmarkPlacement
xAxis--tickmarkPlacement.description: For categorized axes only. If on the tick mark is placed in the center of the category, if between the tick mark is placed between categories. The default is between if the tickInterval is 1, else on.

plotOptions-waterfall--pointPadding.name: plotOptions-waterfall--pointPadding
plotOptions-waterfall--pointPadding.title: pointPadding
plotOptions-waterfall--pointPadding.description: Padding between each column or bar, in x axis units.

plotOptions-pie-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-pie-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-pie-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-pie-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-areaspline--cropThreshold.name: plotOptions-areaspline--cropThreshold
plotOptions-areaspline--cropThreshold.title: cropThreshold
plotOptions-areaspline--cropThreshold.description: When the series contains less points than the crop threshold, all points are drawn,  event if the points fall outside the visible plot area at the current zoom. The advantage of drawing all points (including markers and columns), is that animation is performed on updates. On the other hand, when the series contains more points than the crop threshold, the series data is cropped to only contain points that fall within the plot area. The advantage of cropping away invisible points is to increase performance on large series.  .

yAxis--showEmpty.name: yAxis--showEmpty
yAxis--showEmpty.title: showEmpty
yAxis--showEmpty.description: Whether to show the axis line and title when the axis has no data.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--allowO.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--allowO.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--allowO.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--shado.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--shado.title: shadow
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--shado.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--enabled.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--borderCo.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--borderCo.title: borderColor
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--borderCo.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-treemap--allowPointSelect.name: plotOptions-treemap--allowPointSelect
plotOptions-treemap--allowPointSelect.title: allowPointSelect
plotOptions-treemap--allowPointSelect.description: Allow this series' points to be selected by clicking on the markers, bars or pie slices.

plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--backgroun.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--backgroun.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--backgroun.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--cursor.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--cursor
plotOptions-areasplinerange--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-areasplinerange--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--borde.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--borde.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--borde.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--valueSuff.name: plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--valueSuff.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--valueSuff.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-halo--si.name: plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-halo--si.title: size
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-halo--si.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-line-tooltip--dateTimeLabelF.name: plotOptions-line-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-line-tooltip--dateTimeLabelF.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-line-tooltip--dateTimeLabelF.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-series--shadow.name: plotOptions-series--shadow
plotOptions-series--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-series--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the graph line. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-polygon--pointInterval.name: plotOptions-polygon--pointInterval
plotOptions-polygon--pointInterval.title: pointInterval
plotOptions-polygon--pointInterval.description:
If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointInterval defines the interval of the x values. For example, if a series contains one value every decade starting from year 0, set pointInterval to 10.

Since Highcharts 4.1, it can be combined with pointIntervalUnit to draw irregular intervals.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--step.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--step
plotOptions-areasplinerange--step.title: step
plotOptions-areasplinerange--step.description: Whether to apply steps to the line. Possible values are left, center and right. Prior to 2.3.5, only left was supported.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--padding.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--padding.title: padding
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--padding.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-area-marker--height.name: plotOptions-area-marker--height
plotOptions-area-marker--height.title: height
plotOptions-area-marker--height.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--sym.name: plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--sym.title: symbol
plotOptions-bar-states-hover-marker--sym.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-columnrange--enableMouseTrac.name: plotOptions-columnrange--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-columnrange--enableMouseTrac.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-columnrange--enableMouseTrac.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-boxplot--fillColor.name: plotOptions-boxplot--fillColor
plotOptions-boxplot--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-boxplot--fillColor.description: The fill color of the box.

plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--followTouchM.name: plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--followTouchM.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--followTouchM.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-errorbar-zones--value.name: plotOptions-errorbar-zones--value
plotOptions-errorbar-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-errorbar-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

xAxis--tickPixelInterval.name: xAxis--tickPixelInterval
xAxis--tickPixelInterval.title: tickPixelInterval
xAxis--tickPixelInterval.description: If tickInterval is null this option sets the approximate pixel interval of the tick marks. Not applicable to categorized axis. Defaults to 72 for the Y axis and 100 for the X axis.

plotOptions-line--step.name: plotOptions-line--step
plotOptions-line--step.title: step
plotOptions-line--step.description: Whether to apply steps to the line. Possible values are left, center and right. Prior to 2.3.5, only left was supported.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--xHigh
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: xHigh
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: X offset of the higher data labels relative to the point value.

plotOptions-heatmap--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-heatmap--borderWidth
plotOptions-heatmap--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-heatmap--borderWidth.description: The width of the border surrounding each column or bar.

tooltip--borderWidth.name: tooltip--borderWidth
tooltip--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
tooltip--borderWidth.description: The pixel width of the tooltip border.

noData--position.name: noData--position
noData--position.title: position
noData--position.description: The position of the no-data label, relative to the plot area.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-columnrange--allowPointSelec.name: plotOptions-columnrange--allowPointSelect
plotOptions-columnrange--allowPointSelec.title: allowPointSelect
plotOptions-columnrange--allowPointSelec.description: Allow this series' points to be selected by clicking on the markers, bars or pie slices.

yAxis--alternateGridColor.name: yAxis--alternateGridColor
yAxis--alternateGridColor.title: alternateGridColor
yAxis--alternateGridColor.description: When using an alternate grid color, a band is painted across the plot area between every other grid line.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-boxplot--pointIntervalUnit.name: plotOptions-boxplot--pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-boxplot--pointIntervalUnit.title: pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-boxplot--pointIntervalUnit.description: On datetime series, this allows for setting the pointInterval to the two irregular time units, month and year. Combine it with pointInterval to draw quarters, 6 months, 10 years etc.

plotOptions-bar--pointPlacement.name: plotOptions-bar--pointPlacement
plotOptions-bar--pointPlacement.title: pointPlacement
plotOptions-bar--pointPlacement.description:
Possible values: null, "on", "between".

In a column chart, when pointPlacement is "on", the point will not create any padding of the X axis. In a polar column chart this means that the first column points directly north. If the pointPlacement is "between", the columns will be laid out between ticks. This is useful for example for visualising an amount between two points in time or in a certain sector of a polar chart.

Since Highcharts 3.0.2, the point placement can also be numeric, where 0 is on the axis value, -0.5 is between this value and the previous, and 0.5 is between this value and the next. Unlike the textual options, numeric point placement options won't affect axis padding.

Defaults to null in cartesian charts, "between" in polar charts.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--connectNull.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--connectNulls
plotOptions-areasplinerange--connectNull.title: connectNulls
plotOptions-areasplinerange--connectNull.description: Whether to connect a graph line across null points.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--rotation.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--rotation.title: rotation
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--rotation.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

xAxis--linkedTo.name: xAxis--linkedTo
xAxis--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
xAxis--linkedTo.description: Index of another axis that this axis is linked to. When an axis is linked to a master axis, it will take the same extremes as the master, but as assigned by min or max or by setExtremes. It can be used to show additional info, or to ease reading the chart by duplicating the scales.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--inside.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-errorbar--cursor.name: plotOptions-errorbar--cursor
plotOptions-errorbar--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-errorbar--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.title: radius
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--backgrou.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--backgrou.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--backgrou.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-errorbar--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-errorbar--lineWidth
plotOptions-errorbar--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-errorbar--lineWidth.description: The width of the line surrounding the box. If any of stemWidth, medianWidth or whiskerWidth are null, the lineWidth also applies to these lines.

xAxis--minPadding.name: xAxis--minPadding
xAxis--minPadding.title: minPadding
xAxis--minPadding.description: Padding of the min value relative to the length of the axis. A padding of 0.05 will make a 100px axis 5px longer. This is useful when you don't want the lowest data value to appear on the edge of the plot area. When the axis' min option is set or a min extreme is set using axis.setExtremes(), the minPadding will be ignored.

plotOptions-gauge--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-gauge--linkedTo
plotOptions-gauge--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-gauge--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: padding
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--connecto.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--connectorColor
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--connecto.title: connectorColor
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--connecto.description: The color of the line connecting the data label to the pie slice. The default color is the same as the point's color.

plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.title: height
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--rotati.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--rotati.title: rotation
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--rotati.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

chart--spacingRight.name: chart--spacingRight
chart--spacingRight.title: spacingRight
chart--spacingRight.description: The space between the right edge of the chart and the content (plot area, axis title and labels, title, subtitle or legend in top position).

plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--hei.name: plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--hei.title: height
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--hei.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-pyramid--reversed.name: plotOptions-pyramid--reversed
plotOptions-pyramid--reversed.title: reversed
plotOptions-pyramid--reversed.description: The pyramid is reversed by default, as opposed to the funnel, which shares the layout engine, and is not reversed.

plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-halo.name: plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-halo.title: opacity
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-halo.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--allow.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--allow.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--allow.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

chart--marginBottom.name: chart--marginBottom
chart--marginBottom.title: marginBottom
chart--marginBottom.description: The margin between the bottom outer edge of the chart and the plot area. Use this to set a fixed pixel value for the margin as opposed to the default dynamic margin. See also spacingBottom.

plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-halo-.name: plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-halo-.title: opacity
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-halo-.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-column--pointWidth.name: plotOptions-column--pointWidth
plotOptions-column--pointWidth.title: pointWidth
plotOptions-column--pointWidth.description: A pixel value specifying a fixed width for each column or bar. When null, the width is calculated from the pointPadding and groupPadding.

plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-halo--op.name: plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-halo--op.title: opacity
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-halo--op.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-column-states-hover-halo--at.name: plotOptions-column-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-column-states-hover-halo--at.title: attributes
plotOptions-column-states-hover-halo--at.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--border.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--border.title: borderColor
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--border.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-series-tooltip--headerFormat.name: plotOptions-series-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-series-tooltip--headerFormat.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-series-tooltip--headerFormat.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--forma.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--forma.title: format
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--forma.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

xAxis-labels--padding.name: xAxis-labels--padding
xAxis-labels--padding.title: padding
xAxis-labels--padding.description: The pixel padding for axis labels, to ensure white space between them.

plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.title: radius
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--backgroundCo.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--backgroundCo.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--backgroundCo.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

chart--plotBorderWidth.name: chart--plotBorderWidth
chart--plotBorderWidth.title: plotBorderWidth
chart--plotBorderWidth.description: The pixel width of the plot area border.

plotOptions-waterfall--grouping.name: plotOptions-waterfall--grouping
plotOptions-waterfall--grouping.title: grouping
plotOptions-waterfall--grouping.description: Whether to group non-stacked columns or to let them render independent of each other. Non-grouped columns will be laid out individually and overlap each other.

plotOptions-heatmap--enableMouseTracking.name: plotOptions-heatmap--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-heatmap--enableMouseTracking.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-heatmap--enableMouseTracking.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-gauge-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-gauge-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-gauge-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-gauge-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.title: radius
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-marker-.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--bord.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--bord.title: borderColor
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--bord.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

legend--borderWidth.name: legend--borderWidth
legend--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
legend--borderWidth.description: The width of the drawn border around the legend.

plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--rad.name: plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--rad.title: radius
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--rad.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-gauge--animation.name: plotOptions-gauge--animation
plotOptions-gauge--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-gauge--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

plotOptions-bar--enableMouseTracking.name: plotOptions-bar--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-bar--enableMouseTracking.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-bar--enableMouseTracking.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--valueDecima.name: plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--valueDecima.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-pyramid-tooltip--valueDecima.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-areaspline--selected.name: plotOptions-areaspline--selected
plotOptions-areaspline--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-areaspline--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-columnrange--pointWidth.name: plotOptions-columnrange--pointWidth
plotOptions-columnrange--pointWidth.title: pointWidth
plotOptions-columnrange--pointWidth.description: A pixel value specifying a fixed width for each column or bar. When null, the width is calculated from the pointPadding and groupPadding.

plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.title: fillColor
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-marker-.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-areaspline--enableMouseTrack.name: plotOptions-areaspline--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-areaspline--enableMouseTrack.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-areaspline--enableMouseTrack.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover--ena.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover--ena.title: enabled
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover--ena.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-polygon-states-hover--enable.name: plotOptions-polygon-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover--enable.title: enabled
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover--enable.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--borderRadiu.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--borderRadiu.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--borderRadiu.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--linkedTo
plotOptions-areasplinerange--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-areasplinerange--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-scatter--cropThreshold.name: plotOptions-scatter--cropThreshold
plotOptions-scatter--cropThreshold.title: cropThreshold
plotOptions-scatter--cropThreshold.description: When the series contains less points than the crop threshold, all points are drawn,  event if the points fall outside the visible plot area at the current zoom. The advantage of drawing all points (including markers and columns), is that animation is performed on updates. On the other hand, when the series contains more points than the crop threshold, the series data is cropped to only contain points that fall within the plot area. The advantage of cropping away invisible points is to increase performance on large series.  .

credits--text.name: credits--text
credits--text.title: text
credits--text.description: The text for the credits label.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--align.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--align
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--align.title: align
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--align.description: The alignment of the data label compared to the point. If right, the right side of the label should be touching the point. For points with an extent, like columns, the alignments also dictates how to align it inside the box, as given with the inside option. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right".

plotOptions-boxplot--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-boxplot--linkedTo
plotOptions-boxplot--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-boxplot--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-arearange--fillOpacity.name: plotOptions-arearange--fillOpacity
plotOptions-arearange--fillOpacity.title: fillOpacity
plotOptions-arearange--fillOpacity.description: Fill opacity for the area. Note that when you set an explicit fillColor, the fillOpacity is not applied. Instead, you should define the opacity in the fillColor with an rgba color definition.

plotOptions-heatmap--color.name: plotOptions-heatmap--color
plotOptions-heatmap--color.title: color
plotOptions-heatmap--color.description: The main color of the series. In heat maps this color is rarely used, as we mostly use the color to denote the value of each point. Unless options are set in the colorAxis, the default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-solidgauge-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-solidgauge-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-solidgauge-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

yAxis--type.name: yAxis--type
yAxis--type.title: type
yAxis--type.description: The type of axis. Can be one of "linear", "logarithmic", "datetime" or "category". In a datetime axis, the numbers are given in milliseconds, and tick marks are placed on appropriate values like full hours or days. In a category axis, the point names of the chart's series are used for categories, if not a categories array is defined.

plotOptions-series-tooltip--xDateFormat.name: plotOptions-series-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-series-tooltip--xDateFormat.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-series-tooltip--xDateFormat.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--borderCol.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--borderCol.title: borderColor
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--borderCol.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hover--radiusPlus
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.title: radiusPlus
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.description: The number of pixels to increase the radius of the hovered point.

plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover-.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover-.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover-.description: The additional line width for a hovered point.

plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-halo--o.name: plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-halo--o.title: opacity
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-halo--o.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-heatmap--allowPointSelect.name: plotOptions-heatmap--allowPointSelect
plotOptions-heatmap--allowPointSelect.title: allowPointSelect
plotOptions-heatmap--allowPointSelect.description: Allow this series' points to be selected by clicking on the markers, bars or pie slices.

plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-halo--at.name: plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-halo--at.title: attributes
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-halo--at.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-columnrange--pointPlacement.name: plotOptions-columnrange--pointPlacement
plotOptions-columnrange--pointPlacement.title: pointPlacement
plotOptions-columnrange--pointPlacement.description:
Possible values: null, "on", "between".

In a column chart, when pointPlacement is "on", the point will not create any padding of the X axis. In a polar column chart this means that the first column points directly north. If the pointPlacement is "between", the columns will be laid out between ticks. This is useful for example for visualising an amount between two points in time or in a certain sector of a polar chart.

Since Highcharts 3.0.2, the point placement can also be numeric, where 0 is on the axis value, -0.5 is between this value and the previous, and 0.5 is between this value and the next. Unlike the textual options, numeric point placement options won't affect axis padding.

Defaults to null in cartesian charts, "between" in polar charts.

lang--downloadPNG.name: lang--downloadPNG
lang--downloadPNG.title: downloadPNG
lang--downloadPNG.description: Exporting module only. The text for the PNG download menu item.

plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.name: plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.title: symbol
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-line--turboThreshold.name: plotOptions-line--turboThreshold
plotOptions-line--turboThreshold.title: turboThreshold
plotOptions-line--turboThreshold.description: When a series contains a data array that is longer than this, only one dimensional arrays of numbers, or two dimensional arrays with x and y values are allowed. Also, only the first point is tested, and the rest are assumed to be the same format. This saves expensive data checking and indexing in long series. Set it to 0 disable.

plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--radius
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--.title: radius
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--.description: The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults to the normal state's radius + 2 as per the radiusPlus option.

plotOptions-errorbar--enableMouseTrackin.name: plotOptions-errorbar--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-errorbar--enableMouseTrackin.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-errorbar--enableMouseTrackin.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.name: plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.title: fillColor
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--valueDeci.name: plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--valueDeci.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-waterfall-tooltip--valueDeci.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--borderWidth.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-series-zones--value.name: plotOptions-series-zones--value
plotOptions-series-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-series-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-series--pointStart.name: plotOptions-series--pointStart
plotOptions-series--pointStart.title: pointStart
plotOptions-series--pointStart.description: If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointStart defines on what value to start. For example, if a series contains one yearly value starting from 1945, set pointStart to 1945.

plotOptions-series--connectNulls.name: plotOptions-series--connectNulls
plotOptions-series--connectNulls.title: connectNulls
plotOptions-series--connectNulls.description: Whether to connect a graph line across null points.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: zIndex
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--footerFo.name: plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--footerFo.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--footerFo.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.name: plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--vertic.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--vertic.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--vertic.description: The vertical alignment of a data label. Can be one of top, middle or bottom. The default value depends on the data, for instance in a column chart, the label is above positive values and below negative values.

plotOptions-funnel-zones--color.name: plotOptions-funnel-zones--color
plotOptions-funnel-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-funnel-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover--lin.name: plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover--lin.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover--lin.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--color.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--color
plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--lineColor
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--.title: lineColor
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-hover--.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-waterfall--groupZPadding.name: plotOptions-waterfall--groupZPadding
plotOptions-waterfall--groupZPadding.title: groupZPadding
plotOptions-waterfall--groupZPadding.description: The spacing between columns on the Z Axis in a 3D chart. Requires highcharts-3d.js.

plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--radius
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.title: radius
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.description: The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults to the normal state's radius + 2 as per the radiusPlus option.

plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--ra.name: plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--radiusPlus
plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--ra.title: radiusPlus
plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--ra.description: The number of pixels to increase the radius of the hovered point.

plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-solidgauge--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-solidgauge--showCheckbox
plotOptions-solidgauge--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-solidgauge--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-line-marker--lineColor.name: plotOptions-line-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-line-marker--lineColor.title: lineColor
plotOptions-line-marker--lineColor.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

chart--marginTop.name: chart--marginTop
chart--marginTop.title: marginTop
chart--marginTop.description: The margin between the top outer edge of the chart and the plot area. Use this to set a fixed pixel value for the margin as opposed to the default dynamic margin. See also spacingTop.

plotOptions-scatter-states-hover--enable.name: plotOptions-scatter-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover--enable.title: enabled
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover--enable.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-waterfall--borderColor.name: plotOptions-waterfall--borderColor
plotOptions-waterfall--borderColor.title: borderColor
plotOptions-waterfall--borderColor.description: The color of the border of each waterfall column.

plotOptions-bar--colorByPoint.name: plotOptions-bar--colorByPoint
plotOptions-bar--colorByPoint.title: colorByPoint
plotOptions-bar--colorByPoint.description: When using automatic point colors pulled from the options.colors collection, this option determines whether the chart should receive one color per series or one color per point.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--zIndex.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--zIndex.title: zIndex
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--zIndex.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

global--Date.name: global--Date
global--Date.title: Date
global--Date.description: A custom Date class for advanced date handling. For example, JDate can be hooked in to handle Jalali dates.

exporting-buttons-contextButton--vertica.name: exporting-buttons-contextButton--verticalAlign
exporting-buttons-contextButton--vertica.title: verticalAlign
exporting-buttons-contextButton--vertica.description: The vertical alignment of the buttons. Can be one of "top", "middle" or "bottom".

plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--li.name: plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--li.title: lineColor
plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--li.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-waterfall--borderRadius.name: plotOptions-waterfall--borderRadius
plotOptions-waterfall--borderRadius.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-waterfall--borderRadius.description: The corner radius of the border surrounding each column or bar.

plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select-.name: plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select--lineWidth
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select-.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select-.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

xAxis--id.name: xAxis--id
xAxis--id.title: id
xAxis--id.description: An id for the axis. This can be used after render time to get a pointer to the axis object through chart.get().

plotOptions-waterfall--pointIntervalUnit.name: plotOptions-waterfall--pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-waterfall--pointIntervalUnit.title: pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-waterfall--pointIntervalUnit.description: On datetime series, this allows for setting the pointInterval to the two irregular time units, month and year. Combine it with pointInterval to draw quarters, 6 months, 10 years etc.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-errorbar-zones--color.name: plotOptions-errorbar-zones--color
plotOptions-errorbar-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-errorbar-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

lang--downloadJPEG.name: lang--downloadJPEG
lang--downloadJPEG.title: downloadJPEG
lang--downloadJPEG.description: Exporting module only. The text for the JPEG download menu item.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--zIndex.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--zIndex.title: zIndex
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--zIndex.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

credits--style.name: credits--style
credits--style.title: style

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: shape
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-pyramid--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-pyramid--linkedTo
plotOptions-pyramid--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-pyramid--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-series-tooltip--followPointe.name: plotOptions-series-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-series-tooltip--followPointe.title: followPointer
plotOptions-series-tooltip--followPointe.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--dateTimeLab.name: plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--dateTimeLab.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--dateTimeLab.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--valueDecim.name: plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--valueDecim.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--valueDecim.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-columnrange--pointIntervalUn.name: plotOptions-columnrange--pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-columnrange--pointIntervalUn.title: pointIntervalUnit
plotOptions-columnrange--pointIntervalUn.description: On datetime series, this allows for setting the pointInterval to the two irregular time units, month and year. Combine it with pointInterval to draw quarters, 6 months, 10 years etc.

plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.name: plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.title: symbol
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-bubble--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-bubble--showInLegend
plotOptions-bubble--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-bubble--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--headerFo.name: plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--headerFo.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--headerFo.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-polygon--cursor.name: plotOptions-polygon--cursor
plotOptions-polygon--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-polygon--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-halo.name: plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-halo.title: attributes
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-halo.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-gauge--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-gauge--zoneAxis
plotOptions-gauge--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-gauge--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

yAxis-breaks--from.name: yAxis-breaks--from
yAxis-breaks--from.title: from
yAxis-breaks--from.description: The point where the break starts.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--softConnecto.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--softConnector
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--softConnecto.title: softConnector
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--softConnecto.description: Whether to render the connector as a soft arc or a line with sharp break.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-halo--a.name: plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-halo--a.title: attributes
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-halo--a.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.title: height
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--borderWid.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--borderWidth
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--borderWid.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--borderWid.description: The border width in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-heatmap--colorByPoint.name: plotOptions-heatmap--colorByPoint
plotOptions-heatmap--colorByPoint.title: colorByPoint
plotOptions-heatmap--colorByPoint.description: When using automatic point colors pulled from the options.colors collection, this option determines whether the chart should receive one color per series or one color per point.

plotOptions-area--cursor.name: plotOptions-area--cursor
plotOptions-area--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-area--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-series-states-hover-halo--at.name: plotOptions-series-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-series-states-hover-halo--at.title: attributes
plotOptions-series-states-hover-halo--at.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-bar-tooltip--valueDecimals.name: plotOptions-bar-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--valueDecimals.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--valueDecimals.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

xAxis-labels--enabled.name: xAxis-labels--enabled
xAxis-labels--enabled.title: enabled
xAxis-labels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the axis labels.

plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--followTouch.name: plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--followTouch.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--followTouch.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-select.name: plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-select--enabled
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-select.title: enabled
plotOptions-polygon-marker-states-select.description: Enable or disable visible feedback for selection.

plotOptions-boxplot--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-boxplot--stickyTracking
plotOptions-boxplot--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-boxplot--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series. Defaults to true for line and area type series, but to false for columns, pies etc.

plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.title: enabled
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-spline--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-spline--dashStyle
plotOptions-spline--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-spline--dashStyle.description:
A name for the dash style to use for the graph. Applies only to series type having a graph, like line, spline, area and scatter in case it has a lineWidth. The value for the dashStyle include:
  • Solid
  • ShortDash
  • ShortDot
  • ShortDashDot
  • ShortDashDotDot
  • Dot
  • Dash
  • LongDash
  • DashDot
  • LongDashDot
  • LongDashDotDot

plotOptions-scatter--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-scatter--dashStyle
plotOptions-scatter--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-scatter--dashStyle.description:
A name for the dash style to use for the graph. Applies only to series type having a graph, like line, spline, area and scatter in case it has a lineWidth. The value for the dashStyle include:
  • Solid
  • ShortDash
  • ShortDot
  • ShortDashDot
  • ShortDashDotDot
  • Dot
  • Dash
  • LongDash
  • DashDot
  • LongDashDot
  • LongDashDotDot

plotOptions-pie--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-pie--showInLegend
plotOptions-pie--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-pie--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. Since 2.1, pies are not shown in the legend by default.

plotOptions-pie-states-hover--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-pie-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-pie-states-hover--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-pie-states-hover--lineWidth.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-bubble-states-hover--enabled.name: plotOptions-bubble-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover--enabled.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--xDateFormat.name: plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--xDateFormat.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--xDateFormat.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--valueDeci.name: plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--valueDeci.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--valueDeci.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-arearange-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-arearange-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-arearange-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-arearange-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-areaspline--pointStart.name: plotOptions-areaspline--pointStart
plotOptions-areaspline--pointStart.title: pointStart
plotOptions-areaspline--pointStart.description: If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointStart defines on what value to start. For example, if a series contains one yearly value starting from 1945, set pointStart to 1945.

plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--ra.name: plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--ra.title: radius
plotOptions-line-states-hover-marker--ra.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover-.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover--fillColor
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover-.title: fillColor
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-hover-.description: The fill color of the marker in hover state.

plotOptions-series--cursor.name: plotOptions-series--cursor
plotOptions-series--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-series--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--valueDec.name: plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--valueDec.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--valueDec.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-scatter-zones--value.name: plotOptions-scatter-zones--value
plotOptions-scatter-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-scatter-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-area-marker--enabled.name: plotOptions-area-marker--enabled
plotOptions-area-marker--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-area-marker--enabled.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-treemap--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-treemap--stickyTracking
plotOptions-treemap--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-treemap--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series. Defaults to true for line and area type series, but to false for columns, pies etc.

plotOptions-scatter-marker--symbol.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker--symbol
plotOptions-scatter-marker--symbol.title: symbol
plotOptions-scatter-marker--symbol.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

xAxis--minorTickColor.name: xAxis--minorTickColor
xAxis--minorTickColor.title: minorTickColor
xAxis--minorTickColor.description: Color for the minor tick marks.

legend--x.name: legend--x
legend--x.title: x
legend--x.description: The x offset of the legend relative to its horizontal alignment align within chart.spacingLeft and chart.spacingRight. Negative x moves it to the left, positive x moves it to the right.

plotOptions-column-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-column-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-column-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-column-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-scatter--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-scatter--showInLegend
plotOptions-scatter--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-scatter--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

legend--y.name: legend--y
legend--y.title: y
legend--y.description: The vertical offset of the legend relative to it's vertical alignment verticalAlign within chart.spacingTop and chart.spacingBottom. Negative y moves it up, positive y moves it down.

plotOptions-series-states-hover--lineWid.name: plotOptions-series-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-series-states-hover--lineWid.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-series-states-hover--lineWid.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-halo--siz.name: plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-halo--siz.title: size
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-halo--siz.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--x.description: The x position of the data label relative to the data point.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--xDa.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--xDa.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--xDa.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.title: width
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--foo.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--foo.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-areasplinerange-tooltip--foo.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select--lineColor
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select.title: lineColor
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

lang--downloadPDF.name: lang--downloadPDF
lang--downloadPDF.title: downloadPDF
lang--downloadPDF.description: Exporting module only. The text for the PDF download menu item.

plotOptions-areaspline--allowPointSelect.name: plotOptions-areaspline--allowPointSelect
plotOptions-areaspline--allowPointSelect.title: allowPointSelect
plotOptions-areaspline--allowPointSelect.description: Allow this series' points to be selected by clicking on the markers, bars or pie slices.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.title: width
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--pointFormat.name: plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--pointFormat.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-polygon-tooltip--pointFormat.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
plotOptions-treemap-dataLabels--inside.description: Whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point.

plotOptions-solidgauge--enableMouseTrack.name: plotOptions-solidgauge--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-solidgauge--enableMouseTrack.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-solidgauge--enableMouseTrack.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

title--verticalAlign.name: title--verticalAlign
title--verticalAlign.title: verticalAlign
title--verticalAlign.description: The vertical alignment of the title. Can be one of "top", "middle" and "bottom". When a value is given, the title behaves as floating.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover--lin.name: plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover--lin.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover--lin.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-line-states-hover--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-line-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-line-states-hover--lineWidth.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-line-states-hover--lineWidth.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-pie-states-hover--enabled.name: plotOptions-pie-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-pie-states-hover--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-pie-states-hover--enabled.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-line--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-line--showInLegend
plotOptions-line--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-line--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

plotOptions-spline--selected.name: plotOptions-spline--selected
plotOptions-spline--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-spline--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-areaspline--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-areaspline--showCheckbox
plotOptions-areaspline--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-areaspline--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-pie-tooltip--headerFormat.name: plotOptions-pie-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--headerFormat.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--headerFormat.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects.
