The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-line--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-line--linkedTo
plotOptions-line--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-line--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--allowOver.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--allowOver.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--allowOver.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-halo.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-halo.title: opacity
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-halo.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-bar-zones--color.name: plotOptions-bar-zones--color
plotOptions-bar-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-bar-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

tooltip--date.name: tooltip--date
tooltip--date.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
tooltip--date.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-line--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-line--dashStyle
plotOptions-line--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-line--dashStyle.description:
A name for the dash style to use for the graph. Applies only to series type having a graph, like line, spline, area and scatter in case it has a lineWidth. The value for the dashStyle include:
  • Solid
  • ShortDash
  • ShortDot
  • ShortDashDot
  • ShortDashDotDot
  • Dot
  • Dash
  • LongDash
  • DashDot
  • LongDashDot
  • LongDashDotDot

plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-halo--si.name: plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-halo--si.title: size
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-halo--si.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-line-states-hover--enabled.name: plotOptions-line-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-line-states-hover--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-line-states-hover--enabled.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-area-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-area-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-area-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-area-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-arearange--allowPointSelect.name: plotOptions-arearange--allowPointSelect
plotOptions-arearange--allowPointSelect.title: allowPointSelect
plotOptions-arearange--allowPointSelect.description: Allow this series' points to be selected by clicking on the markers, bars or pie slices.

plotOptions-scatter-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-scatter-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-scatter-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-scatter-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-scatter--pointInterval.name: plotOptions-scatter--pointInterval
plotOptions-scatter--pointInterval.title: pointInterval
plotOptions-scatter--pointInterval.description:
If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointInterval defines the interval of the x values. For example, if a series contains one value every decade starting from year 0, set pointInterval to 10.

Since Highcharts 4.1, it can be combined with pointIntervalUnit to draw irregular intervals.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--allowOver.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--allowOverlap
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--allowOver.title: allowOverlap
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--allowOver.description: Whether to allow data labels to overlap. To make the labels less sensitive for overlapping, the dataLabels.padding can be set to 0.

plotOptions-line-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-line-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-line-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-line-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.name: plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.title: symbol
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-marke.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-funnel--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-funnel--linkedTo
plotOptions-funnel--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-funnel--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

chart--width.name: chart--width
chart--width.title: width
chart--width.description: An explicit width for the chart. By default the width is calculated from the offset width of the containing element.

plotOptions-treemap-levels--color.name: plotOptions-treemap-levels--color
plotOptions-treemap-levels--color.title: color
plotOptions-treemap-levels--color.description: Can set a color on all points which lies on the same level.

plotOptions-polygon--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-polygon--lineWidth
plotOptions-polygon--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-polygon--lineWidth.description: The width of the line connecting the data points.

yAxis--linkedTo.name: yAxis--linkedTo
yAxis--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
yAxis--linkedTo.description: Index of another axis that this axis is linked to. When an axis is linked to a master axis, it will take the same extremes as the master, but as assigned by min or max or by setExtremes. It can be used to show additional info, or to ease reading the chart by duplicating the scales.

plotOptions-column-zones--color.name: plotOptions-column-zones--color
plotOptions-column-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-column-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-heatmap--colsize.name: plotOptions-heatmap--colsize
plotOptions-heatmap--colsize.title: colsize
plotOptions-heatmap--colsize.description: The column size - how many X axis units each column in the heatmap should span.

plotOptions-spline--allowPointSelect.name: plotOptions-spline--allowPointSelect
plotOptions-spline--allowPointSelect.title: allowPointSelect
plotOptions-spline--allowPointSelect.description: Allow this series' points to be selected by clicking on the markers, bars or pie slices.

chart--marginLeft.name: chart--marginLeft
chart--marginLeft.title: marginLeft
chart--marginLeft.description: The margin between the left outer edge of the chart and the plot area. Use this to set a fixed pixel value for the margin as opposed to the default dynamic margin. See also spacingLeft.

xAxis-labels--autoRotation.name: xAxis-labels--autoRotation
xAxis-labels--autoRotation.title: autoRotation
xAxis-labels--autoRotation.description: For horizontal axes, the allowed degrees of label rotation to prevent overlapping labels. If there is enough space, labels are not rotated. As the chart gets narrower, it will start rotating the labels -45 degrees, then remove every second label and try again with rotations 0 and -45 etc. Set it to false to disable rotation, which will cause the labels to word-wrap if possible.

plotOptions-scatter-zones--color.name: plotOptions-scatter-zones--color
plotOptions-scatter-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-scatter-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-column--negativeColor.name: plotOptions-column--negativeColor
plotOptions-column--negativeColor.title: negativeColor
plotOptions-column--negativeColor.description: The color for the parts of the graph or points that are below the threshold.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--borde.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--borde.title: borderColor
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--borde.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

yAxis--minorTickPosition.name: yAxis--minorTickPosition
yAxis--minorTickPosition.title: minorTickPosition
yAxis--minorTickPosition.description: The position of the minor tick marks relative to the axis line. Can be one of inside and outside.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--verti.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--verti.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--verti.description: The vertical alignment of the data label.

plotOptions-treemap-levels--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-treemap-levels--borderWidth
plotOptions-treemap-levels--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-treemap-levels--borderWidth.description: Can set the borderWidth on all points which lies on the same level.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--enableMouse.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-areasplinerange--enableMouse.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-areasplinerange--enableMouse.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

legend--symbolRadius.name: legend--symbolRadius
legend--symbolRadius.title: symbolRadius
legend--symbolRadius.description: The border radius of the symbol for series types that use a rectangle in the legend.

plotOptions-spline--animation.name: plotOptions-spline--animation
plotOptions-spline--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-spline--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--enabled.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

tooltip--crosshairs.name: tooltip--crosshairs
tooltip--crosshairs.title: crosshairs
tooltip--crosshairs.description:
Display crosshairs to connect the points with their corresponding axis values. The crosshairs can be defined as a boolean, an array of booleans or an object.
Boolean
If the crosshairs option is true, a single crosshair relating to the x axis will be shown.
Array of booleans
In an array of booleans, the first value turns on the x axis crosshair and the second value to the y axis crosshair. Use [true, true] to show complete crosshairs.
Array of objects
In an array of objects, the first value applies to the x axis crosshair and the second value to the y axis crosshair. For each dimension, a width, color, dashStyle and zIndex can be given.
Defaults to null.

plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--followPoint.name: plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--followPoint.title: followPointer
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--followPoint.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-scatter-marker--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-scatter-marker--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-scatter-marker--lineWidth.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-spline--pointPlacement.name: plotOptions-spline--pointPlacement
plotOptions-spline--pointPlacement.title: pointPlacement
plotOptions-spline--pointPlacement.description:
Possible values: null, "on", "between".

In a column chart, when pointPlacement is "on", the point will not create any padding of the X axis. In a polar column chart this means that the first column points directly north. If the pointPlacement is "between", the columns will be laid out between ticks. This is useful for example for visualising an amount between two points in time or in a certain sector of a polar chart.

Since Highcharts 3.0.2, the point placement can also be numeric, where 0 is on the axis value, -0.5 is between this value and the previous, and 0.5 is between this value and the next. Unlike the textual options, numeric point placement options won't affect axis padding.

Defaults to null in cartesian charts, "between" in polar charts.

plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select--fillColor
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select.title: fillColor
plotOptions-scatter-marker-states-select.description: The fill color of the point marker.

plotOptions-areaspline--connectNulls.name: plotOptions-areaspline--connectNulls
plotOptions-areaspline--connectNulls.title: connectNulls
plotOptions-areaspline--connectNulls.description: Whether to connect a graph line across null points.

plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--dateTimeLabel.name: plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--dateTimeLabel.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--dateTimeLabel.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-halo--o.name: plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-halo--o.title: opacity
plotOptions-boxplot-states-hover-halo--o.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-scatter--negativeColor.name: plotOptions-scatter--negativeColor
plotOptions-scatter--negativeColor.title: negativeColor
plotOptions-scatter--negativeColor.description: The color for the parts of the graph or points that are below the threshold.

plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--valueSuf.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--valueSuf.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--valueSuf.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--connector.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--connectorPadding
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--connector.title: connectorPadding
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--connector.description: The distance from the data label to the connector.

plotOptions-series--enableMouseTracking.name: plotOptions-series--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-series--enableMouseTracking.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-series--enableMouseTracking.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.title: width
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-marker--.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-spline--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-spline--stickyTracking
plotOptions-spline--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-spline--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series. Defaults to true for line and area type series, but to false for columns, pies etc.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-spline-tooltip--xDateFormat.name: plotOptions-spline-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--xDateFormat.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-spline-tooltip--xDateFormat.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover--lin.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover--lin.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover--lin.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-funnel--stickyTracking.name: plotOptions-funnel--stickyTracking
plotOptions-funnel--stickyTracking.title: stickyTracking
plotOptions-funnel--stickyTracking.description: Sticky tracking of mouse events. When true, the mouseOut event on a series isn't triggered until the mouse moves over another series, or out of the plot area. When false, the mouseOut event on a series is triggered when the mouse leaves the area around the series' graph or markers. This also implies the tooltip. When stickyTracking is false and tooltip.shared is false, the tooltip will be hidden when moving the mouse between series.

subtitle--align.name: subtitle--align
subtitle--align.title: align
subtitle--align.description: The horizontal alignment of the subtitle. Can be one of "left", "center" and "right".

plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

lang--resetZoomTitle.name: lang--resetZoomTitle
lang--resetZoomTitle.title: resetZoomTitle
lang--resetZoomTitle.description: The tooltip title for the label appearing when a chart is zoomed.

chart--polar.name: chart--polar
chart--polar.title: polar
chart--polar.description: When true, cartesian charts like line, spline, area and column are transformed into the polar coordinate system. Requires highcharts-more.js.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--shadow.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--shadow.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--borderRadiu.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--borderRadiu.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--borderRadiu.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.title: symbol
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hover--lineColor
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.title: lineColor
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

yAxis--tickAmount.name: yAxis--tickAmount
yAxis--tickAmount.title: tickAmount
yAxis--tickAmount.description:
The amount of ticks to draw on the axis. This opens up for aligning the ticks of multiple charts or panes within a chart. This option overrides the tickPixelInterval option.

This option only has an effect on linear axes. Datetime, logarithmic or category axes are not affected.

plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.title: height
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-scatter--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-scatter--lineWidth
plotOptions-scatter--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-scatter--lineWidth.description: The width of the line connecting the data points.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-areaspline-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-halo-.name: plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-halo-.title: size
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover-halo-.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-pie--startAngle.name: plotOptions-pie--startAngle
plotOptions-pie--startAngle.title: startAngle
plotOptions-pie--startAngle.description: The start angle of the pie slices in degrees where 0 is top and 90 right.

tooltip--backgroundColor.name: tooltip--backgroundColor
tooltip--backgroundColor.title: backgroundColor
tooltip--backgroundColor.description: The background color or gradient for the tooltip.

plotOptions-area-states-hover--enabled.name: plotOptions-area-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-area-states-hover--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-area-states-hover--enabled.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.name: plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.title: enabled
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-funnel--selected.name: plotOptions-funnel--selected
plotOptions-funnel--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-funnel--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-gauge-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-gauge-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-gauge-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-gauge-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-funnel-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-scatter--color.name: plotOptions-scatter--color
plotOptions-scatter--color.title: color
plotOptions-scatter--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--enabled.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--enabled.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-bubble-marker--symbol.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker--symbol
plotOptions-bubble-marker--symbol.title: symbol
plotOptions-bubble-marker--symbol.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-arearange--step.name: plotOptions-arearange--step
plotOptions-arearange--step.title: step
plotOptions-arearange--step.description: Whether to apply steps to the line. Possible values are left, center and right. Prior to 2.3.5, only left was supported.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--backgroun.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--backgroundColor
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--backgroun.title: backgroundColor
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--backgroun.description: The background color or gradient for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-errorbar--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-errorbar--zoneAxis
plotOptions-errorbar--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-errorbar--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

data--table.name: data--table
data--table.title: table
data--table.description: A HTML table or the id of such to be parsed as input data. Related options are startRow, endRow, startColumn and endColumn to delimit what part of the table is used.

plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.title: fillColor
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-gauge-dial--topWidth.name: plotOptions-gauge-dial--topWidth
plotOptions-gauge-dial--topWidth.title: topWidth
plotOptions-gauge-dial--topWidth.description: The width of the top of the dial, closest to the perimeter. The pivot narrows in from the base to the top.

yAxis-title--rotation.name: yAxis-title--rotation
yAxis-title--rotation.title: rotation
yAxis-title--rotation.description: The rotation of the text in degrees. 0 is horizontal, 270 is  vertical reading from bottom to top.

plotOptions-waterfall--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-waterfall--borderWidth
plotOptions-waterfall--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-waterfall--borderWidth.description: The width of the border surrounding each column or bar.

yAxis-stackLabels--x.name: yAxis-stackLabels--x
yAxis-stackLabels--x.title: x
yAxis-stackLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the left of the stacked bar. The default value is calculated at runtime and depends on orientation and whether the stack is positive or negative.

plotOptions-errorbar--colorByPoint.name: plotOptions-errorbar--colorByPoint
plotOptions-errorbar--colorByPoint.title: colorByPoint
plotOptions-errorbar--colorByPoint.description: When using automatic point colors pulled from the options.colors collection, this option determines whether the chart should receive one color per series or one color per point.

yAxis-stackLabels--y.name: yAxis-stackLabels--y
yAxis-stackLabels--y.title: y
yAxis-stackLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the tick position on the axis. The default value is calculated at runtime and depends on orientation and whether  the stack is positive or negative.

plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--radiusPlus
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.title: radiusPlus
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.description: The number of pixels to increase the radius of the hovered point.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-column--colorByPoint.name: plotOptions-column--colorByPoint
plotOptions-column--colorByPoint.title: colorByPoint
plotOptions-column--colorByPoint.description: When using automatic point colors pulled from the options.colors collection, this option determines whether the chart should receive one color per series or one color per point.

xAxis--tickWidth.name: xAxis--tickWidth
xAxis--tickWidth.title: tickWidth
xAxis--tickWidth.description: The pixel width of the major tick marks.

plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--valueDecimals.name: plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--valueDecimals
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--valueDecimals.title: valueDecimals
plotOptions-gauge-tooltip--valueDecimals.description: How many decimals to show in each series' y value. This is overridable in each series' tooltip options object. The default is to preserve all decimals.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.title: fillColor
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-pie--depth.name: plotOptions-pie--depth
plotOptions-pie--depth.title: depth
plotOptions-pie--depth.description: The thickness of a 3D pie. Requires highcharts-3d.js

plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.name: plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.title: radius
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--valuePrefi.name: plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--valuePrefi.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--valuePrefi.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-boxplot--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-boxplot--showCheckbox
plotOptions-boxplot--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-boxplot--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--valueSuffi.name: plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--valueSuffi.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-errorbar-tooltip--valueSuffi.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.name: plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.title: height
plotOptions-columnrange-states-hover-mar.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--borderRad.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--borderRad.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--borderRad.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-scatter--cursor.name: plotOptions-scatter--cursor
plotOptions-scatter--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-scatter--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

legend--width.name: legend--width
legend--width.title: width
legend--width.description: The width of the legend box.

plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.title: width
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover-marker--.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--followPoint.name: plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--followPoint.title: followPointer
plotOptions-scatter-tooltip--followPoint.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--dateTim.name: plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--dateTim.title: dateTimeLabelFormats
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--dateTim.description:
For series on a datetime axes, the date format in the tooltip's header will by default be guessed based on the closest data points. This member gives the default string representations used for each unit. For an overview of the replacement codes, see dateFormat.

Defaults to: 

{
    millisecond:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S.%L",
    second:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M:%S",
    minute:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    hour:"%A, %b %e, %H:%M",
    day:"%A, %b %e, %Y",
    week:"Week from %A, %b %e, %Y",
    month:"%B %Y",
    year:"%Y"
}

plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--headerFo.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--headerFo.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--headerFo.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-bar-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-bar-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-bar-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-bar-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-bubble--animation.name: plotOptions-bubble--animation
plotOptions-bubble--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-bubble--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

tooltip--headerFormat.name: tooltip--headerFormat
tooltip--headerFormat.title: headerFormat
tooltip--headerFormat.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

plotOptions-boxplot--depth.name: plotOptions-boxplot--depth
plotOptions-boxplot--depth.title: depth
plotOptions-boxplot--depth.description: Depth of the columns in a 3D column chart. Requires highcharts-3d.js.

plotOptions-bubble--color.name: plotOptions-bubble--color
plotOptions-bubble--color.title: color
plotOptions-bubble--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.title: symbol
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--en.name: plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--en.title: enabled
plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--en.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-line-states-hover-halo--opac.name: plotOptions-line-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-line-states-hover-halo--opac.title: opacity
plotOptions-line-states-hover-halo--opac.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--verticalA.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--verticalA.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--verticalA.description: The vertical alignment of a data label. Can be one of top, middle or bottom. The default value depends on the data, for instance in a column chart, the label is above positive values and below negative values.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-areaspline-marker--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-areaspline-marker--lineWidth.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--shadow.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--shadow.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-area--trackByArea.name: plotOptions-area--trackByArea
plotOptions-area--trackByArea.title: trackByArea
plotOptions-area--trackByArea.description: Whether the whole area or just the line should respond to mouseover tooltips and other mouse or touch events.

plotOptions-pie--endAngle.name: plotOptions-pie--endAngle
plotOptions-pie--endAngle.title: endAngle
plotOptions-pie--endAngle.description: The end angle of the pie in degrees where 0 is top and 90 is right. Defaults to startAngle plus 360.

plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.title: enabled
plotOptions-pyramid-states-hover-marker-.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-treemap--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-treemap--showInLegend
plotOptions-treemap--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-treemap--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this series type or specific series item in the legend.

plotOptions-area--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-area--zoneAxis
plotOptions-area--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-area--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--li.name: plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--lineColor
plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--li.title: lineColor
plotOptions-area-marker-states-hover--li.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-pie--innerSize.name: plotOptions-pie--innerSize
plotOptions-pie--innerSize.title: innerSize
plotOptions-pie--innerSize.description:
The size of the inner diameter for the pie. A size greater than 0 renders a donut chart. Can be a percentage or pixel value. Percentages are relative to the pie size. Pixel values are given as integers.

Note: in Highcharts < 4.1.2, the percentage was relative to the plot area, not the pie size.

plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-pyramid-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-bar--groupPadding.name: plotOptions-bar--groupPadding
plotOptions-bar--groupPadding.title: groupPadding
plotOptions-bar--groupPadding.description: Padding between each value groups, in x axis units.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

chart--className.name: chart--className
chart--className.title: className
chart--className.description: A CSS class name to apply to the charts container div, allowing unique CSS styling for each chart.

plotOptions-spline--enableMouseTracking.name: plotOptions-spline--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-spline--enableMouseTracking.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-spline--enableMouseTracking.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-boxplot--pointPlacement.name: plotOptions-boxplot--pointPlacement
plotOptions-boxplot--pointPlacement.title: pointPlacement
plotOptions-boxplot--pointPlacement.description:
Possible values: null, "on", "between".

In a column chart, when pointPlacement is "on", the point will not create any padding of the X axis. In a polar column chart this means that the first column points directly north. If the pointPlacement is "between", the columns will be laid out between ticks. This is useful for example for visualising an amount between two points in time or in a certain sector of a polar chart.

Since Highcharts 3.0.2, the point placement can also be numeric, where 0 is on the axis value, -0.5 is between this value and the previous, and 0.5 is between this value and the next. Unlike the textual options, numeric point placement options won't affect axis padding.

Defaults to null in cartesian charts, "between" in polar charts.

plotOptions-heatmap--cursor.name: plotOptions-heatmap--cursor
plotOptions-heatmap--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-heatmap--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--borderRad.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--borderRad.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--borderRad.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

plotOptions-treemap--alternateStartingDi.name: plotOptions-treemap--alternateStartingDirection
plotOptions-treemap--alternateStartingDi.title: alternateStartingDirection
plotOptions-treemap--alternateStartingDi.description:
Enabling this option will make the treemap alternate the drawing direction between vertical and horizontal.
The next levels starting direction will always be the opposite of the previous.

plotOptions-funnel-zones--value.name: plotOptions-funnel-zones--value
plotOptions-funnel-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-funnel-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hover--radius
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.title: radius
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-hov.description: The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults to the normal state's radius + 2 as per the radiusPlus option.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--zInd.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--zInd.title: zIndex
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--zInd.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

plotOptions-heatmap--turboThreshold.name: plotOptions-heatmap--turboThreshold
plotOptions-heatmap--turboThreshold.title: turboThreshold
plotOptions-heatmap--turboThreshold.description: When a series contains a data array that is longer than this, only one dimensional arrays of numbers, or two dimensional arrays with x and y values are allowed. Also, only the first point is tested, and the rest are assumed to be the same format. This saves expensive data checking and indexing in long series. Set it to 0 disable.

chart--zoomType.name: chart--zoomType
chart--zoomType.title: zoomType
chart--zoomType.description: Decides in what dimensions the user can zoom by dragging the mouse. Can be one of x, y or xy.

plotOptions-bar--borderColor.name: plotOptions-bar--borderColor
plotOptions-bar--borderColor.title: borderColor
plotOptions-bar--borderColor.description: The color of the border surrounding each column or bar.

yAxis-labels--y.name: yAxis-labels--y
yAxis-labels--y.title: y
yAxis-labels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the tick position on the axis.

yAxis-labels--x.name: yAxis-labels--x
yAxis-labels--x.title: x
yAxis-labels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the tick position on the axis. Defaults to -15 for left axis, 15 for right axis.

xAxis--max.name: xAxis--max
xAxis--max.title: max
xAxis--max.description: The maximum value of the axis. If null, the max value is automatically calculated. If the endOnTick option is true, the max value might be rounded up. The actual maximum value is also influenced by chart.alignTicks.

plotOptions-series--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-series--dashStyle
plotOptions-series--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-series--dashStyle.description:
A name for the dash style to use for the graph. Applies only to series type having a graph, like line, spline, area and scatter in case it has a lineWidth. The value for the dashStyle include:
  • Solid
  • ShortDash
  • ShortDot
  • ShortDashDot
  • ShortDashDotDot
  • Dot
  • Dash
  • LongDash
  • DashDot
  • LongDashDot
  • LongDashDotDot

plotOptions-area-tooltip--followPointer.name: plotOptions-area-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-area-tooltip--followPointer.title: followPointer
plotOptions-area-tooltip--followPointer.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--f.name: plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--fillColor
plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--f.title: fillColor
plotOptions-line-marker-states-select--f.description: The fill color of the point marker.

plotOptions-bubble-marker--width.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker--width
plotOptions-bubble-marker--width.title: width
plotOptions-bubble-marker--width.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-heatmap--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-heatmap--showCheckbox
plotOptions-heatmap--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-heatmap--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--followTouch.name: plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--followTouch.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-heatmap-tooltip--followTouch.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-polygon--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-polygon--linkedTo
plotOptions-polygon--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-polygon--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-areaspline--stacking.name: plotOptions-areaspline--stacking
plotOptions-areaspline--stacking.title: stacking
plotOptions-areaspline--stacking.description: Whether to stack the values of each series on top of each other. Possible values are null to disable, "normal" to stack by value or "percent".

plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--footerFormat.name: plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--footerFormat
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--footerFormat.title: footerFormat
plotOptions-bubble-tooltip--footerFormat.description: A string to append to the tooltip format.

plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--xDateFor.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--xDateFormat
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--xDateFor.title: xDateFormat
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--xDateFor.description: The format for the date in the tooltip header if the X axis is a datetime axis. The default is a best guess based on the smallest distance between points in the chart.

data--columns.name: data--columns
data--columns.title: columns
data--columns.description: A two-dimensional array representing the input data on tabular form. This input can be used when the data is already parsed, for example from a grid view component. Each cell can be a string or number. If not switchRowsAndColumns is set, the columns are interpreted as series.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--useHTML.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--useHTML.title: useHTML
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-scatter-marker--fillColor.name: plotOptions-scatter-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-scatter-marker--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-scatter-marker--fillColor.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-series-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-series-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-series-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-arearange--showInLegend.name: plotOptions-arearange--showInLegend
plotOptions-arearange--showInLegend.title: showInLegend
plotOptions-arearange--showInLegend.description: Whether to display this particular series or series type in the legend. The default value is true for standalone series, false for linked series.

plotOptions-line--enableMouseTracking.name: plotOptions-line--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-line--enableMouseTracking.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-line--enableMouseTracking.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--borderColor.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--borderColor.title: borderColor
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--borderColor.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

chart--reflow.name: chart--reflow
chart--reflow.title: reflow
chart--reflow.description: Whether to reflow the chart to fit the width of the container div on resizing the window.

plotOptions-column-tooltip--pointFormat.name: plotOptions-column-tooltip--pointFormat
plotOptions-column-tooltip--pointFormat.title: pointFormat
plotOptions-column-tooltip--pointFormat.description: The HTML of the point's line in the tooltip. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.x, point.y, series.name and series.color and other properties on the same form. Furthermore, point.y can be extended by the tooltip.yPrefix and tooltip.ySuffix variables. This can also be overridden for each series, which makes it a good hook for displaying units.

plotOptions-pie--center.name: plotOptions-pie--center
plotOptions-pie--center.title: center
plotOptions-pie--center.description: The center of the pie chart relative to the plot area. Can be percentages or pixel values. The default behaviour (as of 3.0) is to center the pie so that all slices and data labels are within the plot area. As a consequence, the pie may actually jump around in a chart with dynamic values, as the data labels move. In that case, the center should be explicitly set, for example to ["50%", "50%"].

plotOptions-line--color.name: plotOptions-line--color
plotOptions-line--color.title: color
plotOptions-line--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-series-zones--color.name: plotOptions-series-zones--color
plotOptions-series-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-series-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.name: plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.title: enabled
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--format.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--format
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--format.title: format
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-hover--.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-pie-states-hover-halo--size.name: plotOptions-pie-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-halo--size.title: size
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-halo--size.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.title: fillColor
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--value.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--value
plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-areasplinerange-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--borderCol.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--borderCol.title: borderColor
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--borderCol.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--border.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--border.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--border.description: The border radius in pixels for the data label.

xAxis--startOfWeek.name: xAxis--startOfWeek
xAxis--startOfWeek.title: startOfWeek
xAxis--startOfWeek.description: For datetime axes, this decides where to put the tick between weeks. 0 = Sunday, 1 = Monday.

plotOptions-columnrange--threshold.name: plotOptions-columnrange--threshold
plotOptions-columnrange--threshold.title: threshold
plotOptions-columnrange--threshold.description: The Y axis value to serve as the base for the columns, for distinguishing between values above and below a threshold. If null, the columns extend from the padding Y axis minimum.

plotOptions-line--negativeColor.name: plotOptions-line--negativeColor
plotOptions-line--negativeColor.title: negativeColor
plotOptions-line--negativeColor.description: The color for the parts of the graph or points that are below the threshold.

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--enabled.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--enabled
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--enabled.description: Enable or disable the data labels.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--zIndex.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--zIndex.title: zIndex
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--zIndex.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

plotOptions-funnel-states-hover--lineWid.name: plotOptions-funnel-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover--lineWid.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-funnel-states-hover--lineWid.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-boxplot--cursor.name: plotOptions-boxplot--cursor
plotOptions-boxplot--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-boxplot--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-area-dataLabels--align.name: plotOptions-area-dataLabels--align
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--align.title: align
plotOptions-area-dataLabels--align.description: The alignment of the data label compared to the point. If right, the right side of the label should be touching the point. For points with an extent, like columns, the alignments also dictates how to align it inside the box, as given with the inside option. Can be one of "left", "center" or "right".

plotOptions-bar--shadow.name: plotOptions-bar--shadow
plotOptions-bar--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-bar--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the graph line. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-halo--a.name: plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-halo--a.title: attributes
plotOptions-polygon-states-hover-halo--a.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-areaspline-marker--lineColor.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-areaspline-marker--lineColor.title: lineColor
plotOptions-areaspline-marker--lineColor.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-pie-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-pie-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-pie-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-bar-tooltip--headerFormat.name: plotOptions-bar-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--headerFormat.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-bar-tooltip--headerFormat.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

data--endColumn.name: data--endColumn
data--endColumn.title: endColumn
data--endColumn.description: In tabular input data, the last column (indexed by 0) to use. Defaults to the last column containing data.

plotOptions-line--cropThreshold.name: plotOptions-line--cropThreshold
plotOptions-line--cropThreshold.title: cropThreshold
plotOptions-line--cropThreshold.description: When the series contains less points than the crop threshold, all points are drawn,  event if the points fall outside the visible plot area at the current zoom. The advantage of drawing all points (including markers and columns), is that animation is performed on updates. On the other hand, when the series contains more points than the crop threshold, the series data is cropped to only contain points that fall within the plot area. The advantage of cropping away invisible points is to increase performance on large series.  .

plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--sym.name: plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--sym.title: symbol
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--sym.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: useHTML
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-arearange-states-hover--enab.name: plotOptions-arearange-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover--enab.title: enabled
plotOptions-arearange-states-hover--enab.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

series--zIndex.name: series--zIndex
series--zIndex.title: zIndex
series--zIndex.description: Define the visual z index of the series.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--inside.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-columnrange--cursor.name: plotOptions-columnrange--cursor
plotOptions-columnrange--cursor.title: cursor
plotOptions-columnrange--cursor.description: You can set the cursor to "pointer" if you have click events attached to  the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.

plotOptions-boxplot--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-boxplot--lineWidth
plotOptions-boxplot--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-boxplot--lineWidth.description: The width of the line surrounding the box. If any of stemWidth, medianWidth or whiskerWidth are null, the lineWidth also applies to these lines.

plotOptions-treemap--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-treemap--borderWidth
plotOptions-treemap--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-treemap--borderWidth.description: The width of the border surrounding each column or bar.

exporting-buttons-contextButton--text.name: exporting-buttons-contextButton--text
exporting-buttons-contextButton--text.title: text
exporting-buttons-contextButton--text.description: A text string to add to the individual button.

plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.title: enabled
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.title: enabled
plotOptions-series-states-hover-marker--.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--borderCo.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--borderColor
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--borderCo.title: borderColor
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--borderCo.description: The border color for the data label. Defaults to undefined.

plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-spline-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.title: symbol
plotOptions-column-states-hover-marker--.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

xAxis--showEmpty.name: xAxis--showEmpty
xAxis--showEmpty.title: showEmpty
xAxis--showEmpty.description: Whether to show the axis line and title when the axis has no data.

plotOptions-spline--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-spline--linkedTo
plotOptions-spline--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-spline--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.name: plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-marker--symbol
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.title: symbol
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.description:
A predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Other possible values are "circle", "square", "diamond", "triangle" and "triangle-down".

Additionally, the URL to a graphic can be given on this form: "url(graphic.png)". Note that for the image to be applied to exported charts, its URL needs to be accessible by the export server.

Custom callbacks for symbol path generation can also be added to Highcharts.SVGRenderer.prototype.symbols. The callback is then used by its method name, as shown in the demo.

plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.name: plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.title: width
plotOptions-errorbar-states-hover-marker.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-polygon--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-polygon--showCheckbox
plotOptions-polygon--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-polygon--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-pie--minSize.name: plotOptions-pie--minSize
plotOptions-pie--minSize.title: minSize
plotOptions-pie--minSize.description: The minimum size for a pie in response to auto margins. The pie will try to shrink to make room for data labels in side the plot area, but only to this size.

plotOptions-gauge-dial--borderWidth.name: plotOptions-gauge-dial--borderWidth
plotOptions-gauge-dial--borderWidth.title: borderWidth
plotOptions-gauge-dial--borderWidth.description: The width of the gauge dial border in pixels.

plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.title: lineColor
plotOptions-solidgauge-states-hover-mark.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-halo.name: plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-halo.title: size
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-halo.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

chart--panning.name: chart--panning
chart--panning.title: panning
chart--panning.description: Allow panning in a chart. Best used with panKey to combine zooming and panning.

subtitle--style.name: subtitle--style
subtitle--style.title: style
subtitle--style.description: CSS styles for the title. Exact positioning of the title can be achieved by changing the margin property, or by adding position: "absolute" and left and top properties.

exporting--scale.name: exporting--scale
exporting--scale.title: scale
exporting--scale.description: Defines the scale or zoom factor for the exported image compared to the on-screen display. While for instance a 600px wide chart may look good on a website, it will look bad in print. The default scale of 2 makes this chart export to a 1200px PNG or JPG.

chart--spacingTop.name: chart--spacingTop
chart--spacingTop.title: spacingTop
chart--spacingTop.description: The space between the top edge of the chart and the content (plot area, axis title and labels, title, subtitle or legend in top position).

plotOptions-polygon-marker--fillColor.name: plotOptions-polygon-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-polygon-marker--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-polygon-marker--fillColor.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

data--rows.name: data--rows
data--rows.title: rows
data--rows.description: The same as the columns input option, but defining rows intead of columns.

tooltip--snap.name: tooltip--snap
tooltip--snap.title: snap
tooltip--snap.description: Proximity snap for graphs or single points. Does not apply to bars, columns and pie slices. It defaults to 10 for mouse-powered devices and 25 for touch devices. Note that since Highcharts 4.1 the whole plot area by default captures pointer events in order to show the tooltip, so for tooltip.snap to make sense, stickyTracking must be false.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--useHT.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--useHT.title: useHTML
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--useHT.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

subtitle--useHTML.name: subtitle--useHTML
