subtitle--useHTML.title: useHTML
subtitle--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the text.

plotOptions-area-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-area-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-area-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-area-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--followPo.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--followPo.title: followPointer
plotOptions-solidgauge-tooltip--followPo.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-treemap--allowDrillToNode.name: plotOptions-treemap--allowDrillToNode
plotOptions-treemap--allowDrillToNode.title: allowDrillToNode
plotOptions-treemap--allowDrillToNode.description: When enabled the user can click on a point which is a parent and zoom in on its children.

plotOptions-waterfall--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-waterfall--zoneAxis
plotOptions-waterfall--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-waterfall--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-scatter-states-hover--lineWi.name: plotOptions-scatter-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover--lineWi.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover--lineWi.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--headerForma.name: plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--headerForma.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--headerForma.description:
The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

Defaults to <span style="font-size: 10px">{point.key}</span><br/>

global--useUTC.name: global--useUTC
global--useUTC.title: useUTC
global--useUTC.description: Whether to use UTC time for axis scaling, tickmark placement and time display in Highcharts.dateFormat. Advantages of using UTC is that the time displays equally regardless of the user agent's time zone settings. Local time can be used when the data is loaded in real time or when correct Daylight Saving Time transitions are required.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--shape.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--shape
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the label. Symbols are predefined functions on the Renderer object.

plotOptions-gauge-states-hover--lineWidt.name: plotOptions-gauge-states-hover--lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover--lineWidt.title: lineWidthPlus
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover--lineWidt.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

plotOptions-treemap--animation.name: plotOptions-treemap--animation
plotOptions-treemap--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-treemap--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

tooltip--borderColor.name: tooltip--borderColor
tooltip--borderColor.title: borderColor
tooltip--borderColor.description: The color of the tooltip border. When null, the border takes the color of the corresponding series or point.

plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-halo--o.name: plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-halo--o.title: opacity
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-halo--o.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--headerForma.name: plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--headerFormat
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--headerForma.title: headerFormat
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--headerForma.description: The HTML of the tooltip header line. Variables are enclosed by curly brackets. Available variables	are point.key, series.name, series.color and other members from the point and series objects. The point.key variable contains the category name, x value or datetime string depending on the type of axis. For datetime axes, the point.key date format can be set using tooltip.xDateFormat.

exporting--formAttributes.name: exporting--formAttributes
exporting--formAttributes.title: formAttributes
exporting--formAttributes.description: An object containing additional attributes for the POST form that sends the SVG to the export server. For example, a target can be set to make sure the generated image is received in another frame, or a custom enctype or encoding can be set.

plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.title: radius
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-line-marker--enabled.name: plotOptions-line-marker--enabled
plotOptions-line-marker--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-line-marker--enabled.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.name: plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-marker--lineWidth
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-areaspline-states-hover-mark.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-halo--s.name: plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-halo--s.title: size
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-halo--s.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-scatter--animation.name: plotOptions-scatter--animation
plotOptions-scatter--animation.title: animation
plotOptions-scatter--animation.description:
Enable or disable the initial animation when a series is displayed. The animation can also be set as a configuration object. Please note that this option only applies to the initial animation of the series itself. For other animations, see chart.animation and the animation parameter under the API methods. The following properties are supported:

duration
The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
easing
When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.

Due to poor performance, animation is disabled in old IE browsers for column charts and polar charts.

plotOptions-area-states-hover--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-area-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-area-states-hover--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-area-states-hover--lineWidth.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

legend--symbolHeight.name: legend--symbolHeight
legend--symbolHeight.title: symbolHeight
legend--symbolHeight.description: The pixel height of the symbol for series types that use a rectangle in the legend.

plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.title: radius
plotOptions-scatter-states-hover-marker-.description: The radius of the point marker.

chart--spacing.name: chart--spacing
chart--spacing.title: spacing
chart--spacing.description: The distance between the outer edge of the chart and the content, like title, legend, axis title or labels. The numbers in the array designate top, right, bottom and left respectively. Use the options spacingTop, spacingRight, spacingBottom and spacingLeft options for shorthand setting of one option.

plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--borde.name: plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--borderRadius
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--borde.title: borderRadius
plotOptions-solidgauge-dataLabels--borde.description: The border radius in pixels for the gauge's data label.

plotOptions-bar-zones--fillColor.name: plotOptions-bar-zones--fillColor
plotOptions-bar-zones--fillColor.title: fillColor
plotOptions-bar-zones--fillColor.description: Defines the fill color for the series (in area type series)

plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-sel.name: plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-select--radius
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-sel.title: radius
plotOptions-areaspline-marker-states-sel.description:
The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults
		to the normal state's radius + 2.

plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--valuePrefix.name: plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--valuePrefix
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--valuePrefix.title: valuePrefix
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--valuePrefix.description: A string to prepend to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--shad.name: plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--shad.title: shadow
plotOptions-columnrange-dataLabels--shad.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-errorbar--whiskerColor.name: plotOptions-errorbar--whiskerColor
plotOptions-errorbar--whiskerColor.title: whiskerColor
plotOptions-errorbar--whiskerColor.description: The color of the whiskers, the horizontal lines marking low and high values. When null, the general series color is used.

plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--ena.name: plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--ena.title: enabled
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--ena.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-line-dataLabels--crop.name: plotOptions-line-dataLabels--crop
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--crop.title: crop
plotOptions-line-dataLabels--crop.description: Whether to hide data labels that are outside the plot area. By default, the data label is moved inside the plot area according to the overflow option.

plotOptions-bar--grouping.name: plotOptions-bar--grouping
plotOptions-bar--grouping.title: grouping
plotOptions-bar--grouping.description: Whether to group non-stacked columns or to let them render independent of each other. Non-grouped columns will be laid out individually and overlap each other.

plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--followTo.name: plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--followTouchMove
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--followTo.title: followTouchMove
plotOptions-areaspline-tooltip--followTo.description: Whether the tooltip should follow the finger as it moves on a touch device. If chart.zoomType is set, it will override followTouchMove.

plotOptions-spline-states-hover-halo--at.name: plotOptions-spline-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-halo--at.title: attributes
plotOptions-spline-states-hover-halo--at.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-areaspline-zones--value.name: plotOptions-areaspline-zones--value
plotOptions-areaspline-zones--value.title: value
plotOptions-areaspline-zones--value.description: The value up to where the zone extends, if undefined the zones stretches to the last value in the series.

plotOptions-treemap--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-treemap--zoneAxis
plotOptions-treemap--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-treemap--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-area--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-area--linkedTo
plotOptions-area--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-area--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.name: plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.title: width
plotOptions-bubble-states-hover-marker--.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--zIndex.name: plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--zIndex.title: zIndex
plotOptions-polygon-dataLabels--zIndex.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

xAxis--gridLineWidth.name: xAxis--gridLineWidth
xAxis--gridLineWidth.title: gridLineWidth
xAxis--gridLineWidth.description: The width of the grid lines extending the ticks across the plot area.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--inside.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-waterfall--color.name: plotOptions-waterfall--color
plotOptions-waterfall--color.title: color
plotOptions-waterfall--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.title: attributes
plotOptions-areasplinerange-states-hover.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

plotOptions-gauge--enableMouseTracking.name: plotOptions-gauge--enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-gauge--enableMouseTracking.title: enableMouseTracking
plotOptions-gauge--enableMouseTracking.description: Enable or disable the mouse tracking for a specific series. This includes point tooltips and click events on graphs and points. For large datasets it improves performance.

plotOptions-areaspline--zoneAxis.name: plotOptions-areaspline--zoneAxis
plotOptions-areaspline--zoneAxis.title: zoneAxis
plotOptions-areaspline--zoneAxis.description: Defines the Axis on which the zones are applied.

plotOptions-bar-states-hover-halo--attri.name: plotOptions-bar-states-hover-halo--attributes
plotOptions-bar-states-hover-halo--attri.title: attributes
plotOptions-bar-states-hover-halo--attri.description: A collection of SVG attributes to override the appearance of the halo, for example fill, stroke and stroke-width.

chart-options3d--viewDistance.name: chart-options3d--viewDistance
chart-options3d--viewDistance.title: viewDistance
chart-options3d--viewDistance.description:
Defines the distance the viewer is standing in front of the chart, this setting is important to calculate the perspective effect in column and scatter charts.
It is not used for 3D pie charts.

plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--wid.name: plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--width
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--wid.title: width
plotOptions-pie-states-hover-marker--wid.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a height must also be set.

plotOptions-line-states-hover--lineWidth.name: plotOptions-line-states-hover--lineWidth
plotOptions-line-states-hover--lineWidth.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-line-states-hover--lineWidth.description: Pixel with of the graph line.

plotOptions-areaspline-zones--color.name: plotOptions-areaspline-zones--color
plotOptions-areaspline-zones--color.title: color
plotOptions-areaspline-zones--color.description: Defines the color of the series.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--useHTM.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--useHTML
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--useHTM.title: useHTML
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--useHTM.description: Whether to use HTML to render the labels.

yAxis-labels--format.name: yAxis-labels--format
yAxis-labels--format.title: format
yAxis-labels--format.description: A format string for the axis label.

exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolS.name: exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolSize
exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolS.title: symbolSize
exporting-buttons-contextButton--symbolS.description: The pixel size of the symbol on the button.

plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--overflow.name: plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--overflow
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--overflow.title: overflow
plotOptions-heatmap-dataLabels--overflow.description: How to handle data labels that flow outside the plot area. The default is justify, which aligns them inside the plot area. For columns and bars, this means it will be moved inside the bar. To display data labels outside the plot area, set crop to false and overflow to "none".

plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.name: plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker--radius
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.title: radius
plotOptions-treemap-states-hover-marker-.description: The radius of the point marker.

plotOptions-column-tooltip--shape.name: plotOptions-column-tooltip--shape
plotOptions-column-tooltip--shape.title: shape
plotOptions-column-tooltip--shape.description: The name of a symbol to use for the border around the tooltip. In Highcharts 3.x and less, the shape was square.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

xAxis--floor.name: xAxis--floor
xAxis--floor.title: floor
xAxis--floor.description: The lowest allowed value for automatically computed axis extremes.

chart--plotBorderColor.name: chart--plotBorderColor
chart--plotBorderColor.title: plotBorderColor
chart--plotBorderColor.description: The color of the inner chart or plot area border.

plotOptions-column--threshold.name: plotOptions-column--threshold
plotOptions-column--threshold.title: threshold
plotOptions-column--threshold.description: The Y axis value to serve as the base for the columns, for distinguishing between values above and below a threshold. If null, the columns extend from the padding Y axis minimum.

plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-gauge-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the center of the gauge.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--connectorCol.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--connectorColor
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--connectorCol.title: connectorColor
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--connectorCol.description: The color of the line connecting the data label to the pie slice. The default color is the same as the point's color.

xAxis-title--align.name: xAxis-title--align
xAxis-title--align.title: align
xAxis-title--align.description:
Alignment of the title relative to the axis values. Possible values
 are "low", "middle" or "high".

plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--inside.name: plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--inside
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--inside.title: inside
plotOptions-bubble-dataLabels--inside.description: For points with an extent, like columns, whether to align the data label inside the box or to the actual value point. Defaults to false in most cases, true in stacked columns.

plotOptions-pie--linkedTo.name: plotOptions-pie--linkedTo
plotOptions-pie--linkedTo.title: linkedTo
plotOptions-pie--linkedTo.description: The id of another series to link to. Additionally, the value can be ":previous" to link to the previous series. When two series are linked, only the first one appears in the legend. Toggling the visibility of this also toggles the linked series.

plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--shadow.name: plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--shadow
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--shadow.title: shadow
plotOptions-bar-dataLabels--shadow.description: The shadow of the box. Works best with borderWidth or backgroundColor. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-line--pointStart.name: plotOptions-line--pointStart
plotOptions-line--pointStart.title: pointStart
plotOptions-line--pointStart.description: If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointStart defines on what value to start. For example, if a series contains one yearly value starting from 1945, set pointStart to 1945.

tooltip--shadow.name: tooltip--shadow
tooltip--shadow.title: shadow
tooltip--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the tooltip.

plotOptions-solidgauge--wrap.name: plotOptions-solidgauge--wrap
plotOptions-solidgauge--wrap.title: wrap
plotOptions-solidgauge--wrap.description: When this option is true, the dial will wrap around the axes. For instance, in a full-range gauge going from 0 to 360, a value of 400 will point to 40. When wrap is false, the dial stops at 360.

plotOptions-polygon-marker--lineColor.name: plotOptions-polygon-marker--lineColor
plotOptions-polygon-marker--lineColor.title: lineColor
plotOptions-polygon-marker--lineColor.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-errorbar--pointPadding.name: plotOptions-errorbar--pointPadding
plotOptions-errorbar--pointPadding.title: pointPadding
plotOptions-errorbar--pointPadding.description: Padding between each column or bar, in x axis units.

plotOptions-line--connectEnds.name: plotOptions-line--connectEnds
plotOptions-line--connectEnds.title: connectEnds
plotOptions-line--connectEnds.description: Polar charts only. Whether to connect the ends of a line series plot across the extremes.

plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--followP.name: plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--followPointer
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--followP.title: followPointer
plotOptions-columnrange-tooltip--followP.description:
Whether the tooltip should follow the mouse as it moves across columns, pie slices and other point types with an extent. By default it behaves this way for scatter, bubble and pie series by override in the plotOptions for those series types.

For touch moves to behave the same way, followTouchMove must be true also.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--defer.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--defer
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--defer.title: defer
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--defer.description: Whether to defer displaying the data labels until the initial series animation has finished.

plotOptions-spline--pointInterval.name: plotOptions-spline--pointInterval
plotOptions-spline--pointInterval.title: pointInterval
plotOptions-spline--pointInterval.description:
If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointInterval defines the interval of the x values. For example, if a series contains one value every decade starting from year 0, set pointInterval to 10.

Since Highcharts 4.1, it can be combined with pointIntervalUnit to draw irregular intervals.

plotOptions-errorbar--pointPlacement.name: plotOptions-errorbar--pointPlacement
plotOptions-errorbar--pointPlacement.title: pointPlacement
plotOptions-errorbar--pointPlacement.description:
Possible values: null, "on", "between".

In a column chart, when pointPlacement is "on", the point will not create any padding of the X axis. In a polar column chart this means that the first column points directly north. If the pointPlacement is "between", the columns will be laid out between ticks. This is useful for example for visualising an amount between two points in time or in a certain sector of a polar chart.

Since Highcharts 3.0.2, the point placement can also be numeric, where 0 is on the axis value, -0.5 is between this value and the previous, and 0.5 is between this value and the next. Unlike the textual options, numeric point placement options won't affect axis padding.

Defaults to null in cartesian charts, "between" in polar charts.

yAxis--minRange.name: yAxis--minRange
yAxis--minRange.title: minRange
yAxis--minRange.description:
The minimum range to display on this axis. The entire axis will not be allowed to span over a smaller interval than this. For example, for a datetime axis the main unit is milliseconds. If minRange is set to 3600000, you can't zoom in more than to one hour.

The default minRange for the x axis is five times the smallest interval between any of the data points.

On a logarithmic axis, the unit for the minimum range is the power. So a minRange of 1 means that the axis can be zoomed to 10-100, 100-1000, 1000-10000 etc.

plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--rotation
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.title: rotation
plotOptions-areasplinerange-dataLabels--.description: Text rotation in degrees. Note that due to a more complex structure, backgrounds, borders and padding will be lost on a rotated data label.

yAxis-stackLabels--format.name: yAxis-stackLabels--format
yAxis-stackLabels--format.title: format
yAxis-stackLabels--format.description: A format string for the data label. Available variables are the same as for formatter.

plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--en.name: plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--enabled
plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--en.title: enabled
plotOptions-area-states-hover-marker--en.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--f.name: plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--fillColor
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--f.title: fillColor
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--f.description: The fill color of the point marker. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

exporting--sourceWidth.name: exporting--sourceWidth
exporting--sourceWidth.title: sourceWidth
exporting--sourceWidth.description: The width of the original chart when exported, unless an explicit chart.width is set. The width exported raster image is then multiplied by scale.

plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--h.name: plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--height
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--h.title: height
plotOptions-gauge-states-hover-marker--h.description: Image markers only. Set the image width explicitly. When using this option, a width must also be set.

plotOptions-series--pointInterval.name: plotOptions-series--pointInterval
plotOptions-series--pointInterval.title: pointInterval
plotOptions-series--pointInterval.description:
If no x values are given for the points in a series, pointInterval defines the interval of the x values. For example, if a series contains one value every decade starting from year 0, set pointInterval to 10.

Since Highcharts 4.1, it can be combined with pointIntervalUnit to draw irregular intervals.

legend--useHTML.name: legend--useHTML
legend--useHTML.title: useHTML
legend--useHTML.description: Whether to use HTML to render the legend item texts. When using HTML, legend.navigation is disabled.

chart--shadow.name: chart--shadow
chart--shadow.title: shadow
chart--shadow.description: Whether to apply a drop shadow to the outer chart area. Requires that backgroundColor be set. Since 2.3 the shadow can be an object configuration containing color, offsetX, offsetY, opacity and width.

plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-pie-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-treemap-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--y.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--y
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--y.title: y
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--y.description: The y position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--x.name: plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--x
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--x.title: x
plotOptions-scatter-dataLabels--x.description: The x position offset of the label relative to the point.

plotOptions-column-states-hover-halo--op.name: plotOptions-column-states-hover-halo--opacity
plotOptions-column-states-hover-halo--op.title: opacity
plotOptions-column-states-hover-halo--op.description: Opacity for the halo unless a specific fill is overridden using the attributes setting. Note that Highcharts is only able to apply opacity to colors of hex or rgb(a) formats.

plotOptions-areasplinerange--color.name: plotOptions-areasplinerange--color
plotOptions-areasplinerange--color.title: color
plotOptions-areasplinerange--color.description: The main color or the series. In line type series it applies to the line and the point markers unless otherwise specified. In bar type series it applies to the bars unless a color is specified per point. The default value is pulled from the options.colors array.

data--complete.name: data--complete
data--complete.title: complete
data--complete.description: The callback that is evaluated when the data is finished loading, optionally from an external source, and parsed. The first argument passed is a finished chart options object, containing the series. These options can be extended with additional options and passed directly to the chart constructor.

plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--zIndex.name: plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--zIndex
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--zIndex.title: zIndex
plotOptions-waterfall-dataLabels--zIndex.description: The Z index of the data labels. The default Z index puts it above the series. Use a Z index of 2 to display it behind the series.

plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select-.name: plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select--lineWidth
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select-.title: lineWidth
plotOptions-bubble-marker-states-select-.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--verticalA.name: plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--verticalAlign
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--verticalA.title: verticalAlign
plotOptions-funnel-dataLabels--verticalA.description: The vertical alignment of a data label. Can be one of top, middle or bottom. The default value depends on the data, for instance in a column chart, the label is above positive values and below negative values.

plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select-.name: plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select--lineColor
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select-.title: lineColor
plotOptions-spline-marker-states-select-.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used.

plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.name: plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.title: enabled
plotOptions-series-marker-states-hover--.description: Enable or disable the point marker.

plotOptions-series-states-hover--enabled.name: plotOptions-series-states-hover--enabled
plotOptions-series-states-hover--enabled.title: enabled
plotOptions-series-states-hover--enabled.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.			.

xAxis-breaks--to.name: xAxis-breaks--to
xAxis-breaks--to.title: to
xAxis-breaks--to.description: The point where the break ends.

plotOptions-column-dataLabels--padding.name: plotOptions-column-dataLabels--padding
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--padding.title: padding
plotOptions-column-dataLabels--padding.description: When either the borderWidth or the backgroundColor is set, this is the padding within the box.

plotOptions-pyramid-zones--dashStyle.name: plotOptions-pyramid-zones--dashStyle
plotOptions-pyramid-zones--dashStyle.title: dashStyle
plotOptions-pyramid-zones--dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the graph.

plotOptions-area--selected.name: plotOptions-area--selected
plotOptions-area--selected.title: selected
plotOptions-area--selected.description: Whether to select the series initially. If showCheckbox is true, the checkbox next to the series name will be checked for a selected series.

plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--color.name: plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--color
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--color.title: color
plotOptions-arearange-dataLabels--color.description: The text color for the data labels. Defaults to null.

plotOptions-line--pointPlacement.name: plotOptions-line--pointPlacement
plotOptions-line--pointPlacement.title: pointPlacement
plotOptions-line--pointPlacement.description:
Possible values: null, "on", "between".

In a column chart, when pointPlacement is "on", the point will not create any padding of the X axis. In a polar column chart this means that the first column points directly north. If the pointPlacement is "between", the columns will be laid out between ticks. This is useful for example for visualising an amount between two points in time or in a certain sector of a polar chart.

Since Highcharts 3.0.2, the point placement can also be numeric, where 0 is on the axis value, -0.5 is between this value and the previous, and 0.5 is between this value and the next. Unlike the textual options, numeric point placement options won't affect axis padding.

Defaults to null in cartesian charts, "between" in polar charts.

plotOptions-area--pointPlacement.name: plotOptions-area--pointPlacement
plotOptions-area--pointPlacement.title: pointPlacement
plotOptions-area--pointPlacement.description:
Possible values: null, "on", "between".

In a column chart, when pointPlacement is "on", the point will not create any padding of the X axis. In a polar column chart this means that the first column points directly north. If the pointPlacement is "between", the columns will be laid out between ticks. This is useful for example for visualising an amount between two points in time or in a certain sector of a polar chart.

Since Highcharts 3.0.2, the point placement can also be numeric, where 0 is on the axis value, -0.5 is between this value and the previous, and 0.5 is between this value and the next. Unlike the textual options, numeric point placement options won't affect axis padding.

Defaults to null in cartesian charts, "between" in polar charts.

plotOptions-gauge--showCheckbox.name: plotOptions-gauge--showCheckbox
plotOptions-gauge--showCheckbox.title: showCheckbox
plotOptions-gauge--showCheckbox.description: If true, a checkbox is displayed next to the legend item to allow selecting the series. The state of the checkbox is determined by the selected option.

plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-halo-.name: plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-halo--size
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-halo-.title: size
plotOptions-waterfall-states-hover-halo-.description: The pixel size of the halo. For point markers this is the radius of the halo. For pie slices it is the width of the halo outside the slice. For bubbles it defaults to 5 and is the width of the halo outside the bubble.

plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--valueSuffix.name: plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--valueSuffix
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--valueSuffix.title: valueSuffix
plotOptions-boxplot-tooltip--valueSuffix.description: A string to append to each series' y value. Overridable in each series' tooltip options object.

plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--hideDelay.name: plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--hideDelay
plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--hideDelay.title: hideDelay
plotOptions-arearange-tooltip--hideDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until the tooltip is hidden when mouse out from a point or chart.
